Много слышала про Life Is Strange, но желанием играть не горела. Но всё-таки мне было интересно, почему игра про подростков, хипстеров и неформалов наделала столько шума, получая сплошь восторженные отзывы. Поиграв в Life Is Strange, могу теперь высказать своё мнение. Это не квест, не интерактивное кино. Это самый настоящий, мать его, интерактивный сериал с 3D графикой. Почему сериал? Потому что игра поделена на эпизоды (их 5), на момент написания отзыва вышло 3 эпизода, а 2 оставшихся приходится ждать. Да-да, ждать :( В игре есть немного квестовой составляющей, когда порой надо действительно подумать, но основное время тратится на исследование игрового мира, просмотр роликов/кат-сцен и разговоры. Уфф, как же сложно что-либо писать о сюжете без спойлеров. Главный герой игры - девушка Максин (Макс) Колфрид. Ей исполнилось 18 лет и она учится в высшей школе. Мечтает обзавестись крутой фототехникой, фанатеет со своего препода, любит винтаж, ретро, селфи на полароид и инди музыку. В общем, Макс - хипстер. Вроде кажется, да что тут интересного, типичное начало любого подросткового шлака, если бы не одно но... В игре есть детективная составляющая сюжета, которая начинает постепенно раскрываться. Появляется тонна вопросов, и что удивительно, на все эти вопросы игра постепенно даёт ответы. Сюжет проработан до мельчайших подробностей! Хвала сценаристам! Никаких недоговорок и упущений. Значительный упор сюжета сделан на том, что вы сами решаете его дальнейшую судьбу. Все ваши поступки имеют последствия (хорошие, нейтральные или плохие). О некоторых последствиях вы узнаёте практически сразу, в остальных случаях гораздо позже, вплоть до следующего эпизода. Поэтому в Life Is Strange надо мыслить масштабно, принимая какой-либо выбор. Но порой, даже при скрупулёзном обдумывании того или иного выбора, сюжет преподносит неожиданный поворот. Угадать дальнейшее развитие сюжета невозможно. Приятная картинка, красивые локации и пейзажи. В общем, глазам приятно. Но если вы   гурман в сфере компьютерной графики, то можете сразу проходить мимо Life Is Strange. Эта игра создана для погружения в сюжет и атмосферу, а не ради гонки за качеством графики. 1) Управление меня не совсем устраивает. Точнее его часть, где мышью выбирается нужное действие. Когда надо быстро выполнить действие и счёт идёт на секунды, это вообще неудобно. 2) Не совсем понравился 1-й эпизод. Он через чур насыщен этой подростковой жизнью, "масштабными" проблемами подростков и ежедневной школьной рутиной. Возможно, будь мне лет 15-18, я бы прониклась глубиной проблем персонажей игры. Но теперь мне кажется всё это смешным и нелепым. К счастью, все эти "глобальные" проблемы в дальнейшем  забываются и уходят на дальний план. Хотя, тут можно найти плюс: наверняка игра напомнит о вашем подростковом периоде, вас посетит ностальгия о славных беззаботных деньках, встретятся знакомые ситуации из прошлой жизни... Или вы просто сделаете фейспальм от такой ностальгии. В общем, если игра вызывает хоть какие-либо эмоции, это хорошо. 3) Деление игры на эпизоды. Некоторые считают, что это способ выкачивания денег, другим это не нравится из-за ожидания. Мне не нравится именно по 2-й причине. Если вы тоже не любите ждать, пока забудьте про игру. Купите её после выхода всех эпизодов. Конечно же любителям быстро пробежать тупо по сюжету, не обращая внимания на сторонние вещи и их исследование. Если вы предпочитаете быстрое прохождение игр, лучше не покупайте. Какое мнение может сложиться об игре, если её пройти забивая на всё, кроме основного сюжета? Правильно, никакое. В эту игру надо погрузиться и вникнуть, чтобы собрать все факты и сложить всё вместе. Ещё игра может не понравиться людям, привыкшим к сплошному экшену. И просто нетерпеливым людям, не способными монотонно выполнять одни и те же действия без возникновения негатива/злости/бешенства. Игра меня поразила и просто затянула. Life Is Strange моя первая игра в подобном жанре, поделенная на эпизоды. Что ж, она смогла меня заинтересовать и оставить положительные впечатления. Она смогла подарить ощущение, когда тебе настолько интересно, что пусть весь мир подождёт! Заслуженно ставлю игре 9.5/10 и продолжаю примерять на себя роль Хатико. Ждать, ждать и ещё раз ждать.

It’s 1930. After an inadvertent brush with the mafia, cabdriver Tommy Angelo is reluctantly thrust into the world of organized crime. Initially, he is uneasy about falling in with the Salieri family, but soon the rewards become too big to ignore. As he rises through the ranks, the paydays keep getting bigger, but the jobs get even dirtier. Tommy may ultimately earn the respect of the Salieris, but becoming a Made Man will leave him more conflicted than ever with the new life he has chosen. Experience New Heaven Explore more than 12 square miles of New Heaven, a quintessential 1930's American city based on historic Depression-era architecture and culture. Authentic Story and Action-packed Gameplay Play more than 20 thrilling missions inspired by events from the 1930’s. Rise through the ranks of the Salieri family from foot-soldier to Made Man, taking on mob hits, car chases, bootlegging, shootouts, bank robberies and more. Era-inspired Vehicles and Weapons As a daring getaway driver, get behind the wheel of more than 60 historically-inspired cars featuring realistic physics and real-time damage.  Complete those grittier jobs with more than a dozen weapons at your disposal. Choose from baseball bats, sawed-off shotguns, magnums and the renowned Tommy gun to deal with any wise guy who dares to cross you.

Great game!  If you like puzzle games in general this game won't disappoint. If you like mechanical and technical puzzles in particular, this is most definitely the game for you. Building on from Room 1, this game features more rooms and more features. As a physicist, I particularly enjoyed electrocuting things in the lab! Most puzzles were logical and not too difficult, however, if you do get stuck there's a handy hint feature to get you back on track. Letters left around the place drip-feed information about a sinister back-story whilst cutscenes between rooms give depth to the whole experience.  The game culminates in a neat conclusion with one final end scene.

Скажу свои ощущения от игры. Да, игра может и сложная и в этом ее изюминка, но поверьте не только в этом. Вы будете психовать что будете убивать некоторых боссов с 5, 10, 15, а может даже с 50 раза. Но когда вы сражаетесь, испытывали ли вы чувства именно отработки тактики, каждой мелочи подходу к каждому боссу? В любой другой игре вам достаточно тупо размениваться здоровьем с боссом и убивать его. Тут же буквально пару ошибок подряд и ты труп. Нужно учить атаки противника, знать их.  Отдельно скажу про музыку в игре. Она божественна. Когда сражаешься с боссом, то ты чувствуешь себя в фильме. От музыки и битвы с боссом аж мурашки идут. С освещением и тенями поработали тоже хорошо. Особенно хорошо поработали игроки со своими полезными, пошлыми, ложными и многими другими подсказками)) Игра хороша как ни крути, но может не понравиться только тем, у кого не хватает терпения и все. Спасибо Bandai Namco за такую игру! А ТЕПЕРЬ ДА ВОССЛАВЬ СОЛНЦЕ!

On part sur un de mes GOTY 2020, sans aucun doute. Jouer à Ikenfell, c'est l'équivalent vidéoludique de boire un chocolat chaud en étant emmitouflé dans un plaid. Les personnages sont tous attachants, l'histoire, même si assez convenue, est plaisante à suivre, le pixel art et les animations sont superbes, la bande-son est déjà un de mes albums préférés de l'année (en même temps, venant de aivi & surasshu j'avais peu de doutes) et le système de combat est vraiment efficace (même si pas original pour un sou, mais comme hommage aux tactical-RPG de type Paper Mario et La Porte Millénaire ça fonctionne parfaitement).  Le jeu est bienveillant avec ses personnages et bienveillant avec son public, il y a beaucoup d'options de personnalisation et d'équilibrage pour les personnes moins à l'aise avec ce type de jeu, mais qui voudraient tout de même profiter de l'aventure.  Il comporte quelques petits bugs et défauts bien sûr, mais ça se sent vraiment qu'il a été fait avec le cœur, le jeu respire la passion et l'envie de bien faire et ça fait beaucoup de bien. Je pense qu'en ce moment, tout le monde a besoin d'un petit cocon moelleux et Ikenfell remplit parfaitement ce rôle.

Essa DLC é bem melhor do que o jogo base. As receitas são bem explicadas e fáceis de fazer, tem vários itens de personalização, os ingredientes e utensílios são mais fáceis de manipular e o smartphone no lugar do computador deixa tudo bem mais prático, dá pra olhar as receitas e comprar itens em qualquer lugar da cozinha, não tem mais a necessidade de ficar olhando televisões e ainda dá pra tirar fotos. O funcionamento da padaria é completamente diferente do restaurante, você pode escolher a receita que quer fazer e personalizar o resultado do jeito que quiser. Os dois modos de jogo da DLC são praticamente iguais, a diferença é que no modo Padaria você tem que gastar dinheiro e pontos de experiência pra comprar ingredientes e desbloquear receitas e utensílios, enquanto no modo Sandbox já vem tudo desbloqueado e com dinheiro ilimitado. Além disso, no modo Padaria aparecem algumas encomendas que você pode aceitar ou não fazer dentro de um prazo em troca de dinheiro, enquanto no modo Sandbox o dia nunca acaba e os doces não vendem. O jogo ainda tem muitos problemas, tem um bug onde o bolo continua com a textura de cru depois de assado, já aconteceu inclusive de ficar com a textura certa e depois que eu saí e voltei no jogo o bolo tinha ficado com a textura da massa crua de novo. Seria legal se desse pra cortar os bolos e ver eles por dentro com camadas de recheios, infelizmente por fora as massas são todas parecidas, algumas só mudam a cor de acordo com a receita. Sinto falta de um zoom na hora de aplicar as decorações nos bolos, a câmera fica muito longe da bancada e não dá pra enxergar direito. Fora esses e outros pequenos problemas, é divertido para passar o tempo.

(읽기 전 다소 오글거릴수 있는 찬양에 주의하세요 하지만 그 오글거림을 감수하고도 전 이 글을 써야겠습니다.) 전 위쳐 소설을 읽어본적도 없고 3가 입문작이라 스토리를 전혀 모르고 시작한 상태여서 뭐가 뭔지도 모르고 처음엔 살짝 지루하다고 생각하며 시작했습니다.(앞서 말했듯 전편을 안해봐서 스토리를 몰라 얘네가 뭐라고 하는질 모르니..) 하지만 피의남작 퀘스트부터 슬슬 발동이 걸리기 시작하더니 그 후 스토리는 진짜 미치도록 빠져들어서 했는데, 스토리를 이렇게 빠져서 한 게임이 있나 싶을정도입니다. 스토리가 메인이지만 RPG의 큰 재미 중 하나인 탐험이나 수집, 캐릭터 육성 요소, 게임의 볼륨 등 뭐 하나 대충 만든게 없습니다.(서브퀘 조차도 소름돋는 퀄리티..) 본편은 딴짓 안하고 메인만 달려도 35시간정도이며 서브퀘를 다 하면 100시간은 우습게 넘어갑니다. 특히 혜자 Dlc라고 칭송받는 위쳐3의 확장팩 볼륨은 CDPR이 사기 친걸로도 유명한데 출시전 인터뷰에서 블러드앤와인의 플탐이 20시간 정도라고 밝혔습니다만, 해보니 40시간 가량되더군요. 맵도 상당히 큰데 무식하게 크기만 한게 아니라 아주 꽉꽉 차있습니다. 특히 노비그라드나 옥센푸르트는 제작진들이 갈려 나갔을 정도의 퀄리티를 자랑하며, 이 퀄리티는 확장팩 블러드앤와인에서 정점을 찍습니다. 이런 미친 재미와 볼륨에 가격도 너무 혜자라 도저히 깔 건덕지가 없습니다.. 메타스코어도 DLC포함 전부 90점이 넘어가고 스팀평가도 압도적으로 긍정적입니다. 더 이상 말이 필요하다고 보십니까..? 저 처럼 위쳐를 3로 입문하시는분들은 초반의 지루함이나 이런걸 견디지 못하고 중도 하차 하시는분들도 많은걸로 아는데 그 초반만 견디시면 왜 이런 평가가 나오는지 아시게 될겁니다. 사시면서 확장팩 DLC 두개 역시도 무조건 구매하세요. 웬만한 게임 뺨 후려치는 퀄리티와 볼륨을 자랑합니다. 다른 게임회사들은 DLC 쪼개 팔기나 돈값 못하는 퀄리티가 대부분인데 제발 위쳐 dlc의 반이라도 좋으니 보고 배웠으면 좋겠습니다. 마지막으로 위쳐3 안한 뇌 삽니다.

Только когда я покупал ведьмака,я знал,что деньги отдаю за действительно качественный продукт. Но так же,это произошло и с Машинариумом. Эта игра прекрасна.Вот просто.В нее приятно играть,в нее хочется играть,ведь здесь для этого есть все;Лучший саунтрек,который я когда-либо слышал.Красивейшая рисовка,персонажи и мир идеально подходят друг для друга,этот мир прекрасен.Интересный сюжет,отличные головоломки.А что еще нужно?Проходил миллион раз на пиратках,но решил "поддержать" разработчиков,и совершенно не жалею.Такое было только с ведьмаком.

It's a blast, an improvement in every way over the first.  I do recommend buying at full price. You'll get many hours of enjoyment if you don't mind investing an initial 20-40 hours to get used to gameplay mechanics and lvl characters. It takes time to get to the actual game: Champion and Legend. This is not friendly to the casual gamer, however. The game is balanced around these two difficulties, as was V1 back in the day. It's a plus if you're looking to specialize, but a definite minus to anyone who's looking to while away a saturday night.  Many other reviews detail what's so great about it, so I'll list my grievances instead. This is coming from a place of love.  1) No servers (they're working on it, or so I've heard. yet to see anything besides balance patches and map fixes; just a loooot of balance patches) Having a stable connection is so important for this type of game; as of now, you have to grit your teeth 80% of the time as rats wander around midair poking the bald spots on salty. Running around with your block up is a must on champion and legend...though that's usually a good practice anyways.  2) It's very intimidating if you've never played a left 4 dead game/clone. And even if you have, at higher difficulties this game will hand your ass to you. With enough hours you can adapt to the sheer amount of specials thrown your way (I've had two packmasters, 1 blightstormer, a boss, a fire-rat, and a glitched-out patrol ♥♥♥♥ me over), but sometimes you have to pray to RNJesus. In the middle of hordes and boss fights some combinations of specials will straight wipe your team so fast in succession in borders on unfair. Especially with so many things that can slow or disable your movement, stopping you from otherwise dodging that pouncing assasin or lunging hookrat.  3) It's been a month or two since release and the game is only marginally better than it was in beta. I played in closed beta and had a blast. Issues of course, but the meat was there. The meat is still here, and to be fair, it's been cooked a medium rare. But I don't want my meat bleeding; i want it well-done and fully dead. Strange steak metaphor aside, where are cosmetics? Keep decorations? Character skins?  It's not major, but not having it makes clear the amount of polishing this uncut gem still requires. For full release, it took only until the latest patch to fix broken maps. People do still fall through the map as packmasters inexorably drag them down.  4 ) I'd love more character voice lines. (some have been added a patch or two ago). Almost 150 hours in and I've only heard 1 real conversation between kerillian and krubz, with none heard for the rest. The rest have uniformally consisted of one-liners and non-sequiters. I have over 500 hours in V1 and heard almost every line and conversation by 90 hours. (which is actually a pretty lengthy amount of time to not hear the rarest ones) But here? Either the rarity is far too low or they only trigger under very strict circumstances. I want to hear bardin's old stories about cousin okri. I want to hear saltzpyre give out his repetoire of rousing insults. They have added a few more "darlings" and "auntie sienna" lines, which i like.  And nobody wants to hear elf!  5) I don't want to go too into different weapons and their balance and all that jazz, but I will mention something that bothers me greatly. This section is pretty much only for the Vermintide vets out there (feel free to skip): I hate playing elf, (but i have to lvl her to get all the damn achievements) so when I do end up playing her I love her two handed weapons. Spear, glaive, two-handed sword. The first two have flawless animations; its smooth, you can block-cancel with no hiccups, and the animations make it clear what you're doing. The two-handed sword?? Hamburger-helper no! I don't know what's wrong with it, but there is an immense amount of input lag. (at least .3-.5 seconds) When you fight you usually rapidly click your mouse, occasionally hitting your block as you dodge dance in hordes. With elf's two-hander there's an actual pause as your character keeps swinging away, refusing to block as another rubber-banding rat comes in and pokes her on her elf-face instead of bouncing off her block. Worse yet, there's also a pause when she drops her block, so you end up block-pushing instead of dropping your block and then swinging your weapon. I don't know why it bothers me so much, but I love the slower style of most two-handers. I love dancing in and out and timing my attacks. Blocking and block-cancelling are integral parts of the horde-fighting experience. The two-handed sword looks dapper, has elegant animations, and that charge attack is pure porn. I don't know if this got borked in the last patch or its always been this way (I've never played elf until 140 hours in V2 lol; not even in beta) but it bothers me in a game past release.  6) Toxicity. Yada yada yada, people have already mentioned this a thousand times; but you either get the silent protagonists, the fellowship of the ring, or saddam hussein making sweet love to satan, south park style. Each have their own special strengths and drawbacks. Protagagonists will get the job done, but don't expect to be warned about that assassin making googly eyes at your booty. Fellowships of the ring can be great, but entering into the middle of an established group dynamic can be really intimidating, especially if you just want to get this map done. And Saddams just want to type racial slurs in chat. Straight-up: this is just a part of life. Some people use games to vent, some people use games to insult others to vent, and some people just enjoy feeling superior. V2 just amplifies this for whatever reason (probably cuz it's labelled as a "skill-based" game. People sit on sticks for this moniker.) It isn't as bad as  c y k a  man in many a COD or fortnight game, but it's definitely worse than other popular games like TF2. (i loaf tf2, i be  f u c c b o i  for heavy and med fanfic)  7) RPG-lite. Very, very lite. It's almost insulting how lite it really is. The perk choices usually have a clear contender, or maybe an alternate option if your specc'd for a single build. Otherwise expect to see the dreaded META in repeater-pistol toting bounty hunters. Gods, I am ♥♥♥♥♥♥♥ tired of hearing that word. META. Get ♥♥♥♥♥♥. The statistics, however, do a slightly better job. Seeing a 5.5% increase vs Chaos is pretty underwhelming tho.  8) Confusing loot progression. This never affected me as I stockpiled 22 chests on a single char then went on opening spree. I got plenty of greens and blues since I just switched weapons out for higher power ones as they became available. I didn't touch crafting until 2 of my chars were over lvl 25 and dropping mostly oranges.  9) Bugs. An endless amount. Maybe because of the amount of time I've put in, but stuff like bugs become that much more glaring an issue. Legend runs can be ruined by silent patrols, packmasters sucking people deep into the earth, flying hordes, hyper-density (i'll count as bug lol), talents not working, all of the various boss glitches, and dreaded chaos warrior teleportation. It's come a long way since beta, when music and sound worked tenously at best... but that doesn't excuse the sheer amount of bugs. I would've gladly waited another month if it meant a month of solid bug-squashing.  10) The grind. You come to love it, but missing out on that empy cuz ranald was off blessing someone who wasn't saltzpye is not my definition of fun. You do everything right. You get the tomes. You get the grims. You live through all the ♥♥♥♥♥♥♥♥ special spawns and surprise hordes. You even kill a loot-rat!  Nope. You get a general's and a participation award you can't even show off cuz they haven't implimented keep customization. REEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEE This is a long a rambling mess, but I've laid my problems before the altar of the Steam. I love this game.

2차세계대전 당시 쯤의 이탈리아 볼테라 지역  정신병원을 배경으로한 공포 게임 . 1938년에 입원하게 된 르네라는 여자아이를 주인공으로 이야기가 펼쳐지는데 꿈도 희망도 없는 열악한 환경속에서 인권 유린을 당하며 고통받고 좌절하는 모습을 매우 적나라하게 보여준다. 중도에 지문을 선택해 분기가 갈리는곳이 두곳정도 있지만 그래봤자 바뀌는건 과정일뿐... 결과는 항상 같다. 이 이야기가 실화를 바탕으로 만들어졌다하니 서글픈 느낌이 지워지지않는다. 게임을 클리어하면 특전처럼 주어지는 영상과 르네의 다이어리가 있는데 이걸 보면 개발자들이 고통받는 소녀의 심리를 게임에 담아내기위해 고민하고 심혈을 기울인 흔적을 엿볼수있다. 인게임내에 완벽에 가깝게 재현된 폐건물과 아름다운 자연환경이 잘 어우러져 평화로운 분위기도 느껴지므로 무거운 감정을 조금이나마 희석해준다. 8 / 10

Oyunumuz "Viktor Crysworth" bilim kurgu tabanlı bir görsel romandır. MISADREF adlı Türk geliştiricilerden oluşan bu grubun bizlere sunmuş olduğu oyun, görsel roman türündeki oyunları seven kişiler için veyahut oyunlarda hikaye ve olayları ön planda tutan kişiler için ilgi çekici güzel bir yapım olmuş. Geliştiricilerin ilk kez bu türde bir oyun yapmasından dolayıdır ki iyimser karşılayabileceğiniz eksiklikler ve küçük hatalar tabii ki var. Ama genel resme baktığımızda başarılı bir oyun olduğunu söyleyebilirim. Oyunu daha ayrıntılı bir şekilde başlıklar halinde incelemek gerekirse: Bu tür için en önemli başlıklardan biri olduğunu düşündüğüm hikaye/içerik kısmını oyun çok güzel ele alıyor. Oyunun ileriki bölümlerinde daha da açılan ve akıcı bir hale gelen hikaye anlatımı gayet tatmin edici bir düzeyde. Alt metinler güzel hazırlanmış. Cümle yapıları özenle kurulmuş ve hikaye ile birleştiğinde olaylar sizi içine çekiyor. Sırf oynanış süresini uzatmak için araya iliştirilmiş gereksiz cümlelerden kaçınılmış bu güzel bir detay. Fakat oyun süresi bir hayli kısa, bunu çok net bir şekilde fark edeceksiniz. Oyunun animasyonlu görsellerden oluşması hoşuma gitti, görsel romanlarda pek tercih edilen bir özellik değil. Görsellerin ve efektlerin daha yüksek çözünürlükte, göz alıcı bir yapıda beklerdim. Görsellerin tasarımları ve oluşturduğu atmosfer gayet güzelken görüntü kalitesi yetersiz gibi. Görsellerdeki kararıp aydınlanma olayının çok sık ve her sahne için yapılması ve bundan ayrı olarak ara ara görüntünün (kısa bir süre için) tamamen kesilmesi gibi olaylar beni rahatsız etti. Olması gerektiği gibi; basit ve yeterli bir oynanışa sahip. Bölüm geçişlerinde oyun size hikayeye yön verebileceğiniz diyalog seçimleri de sunuyor. Ses ve müzikler gayet başarılı ve oyunun yapısına uyuyor. Döngü halindeki müziklerin tekrar başlamadan önce beklemesi (aradaki o kısa kopukluk) biraz rahatsız edebiliyor. Ortaya gerçekten kaliteli bir ürün koymak istediklerini varsayaraktan gerek bu oyunu güncelleştirmeler ile geliştireceklerini, gerek de ileriki oyunlarında daha iyi yapımlara imza atacaklarını düşünüyorum. Türü seviyorsanız ve geliştiricilere destek olmak istiyorsanız alabilirsiniz, tavsiye ederim. Okuduğunuz için teşekkürler. Aklıma önemli şeyler geldikçe incelememi ileriki zamanlarda tekrardan güncelleyebilirim.

Давайте по честному. Большинство людей, которые это читают перепробовали ну почтиииии все игры, которые более или менее хороши.  Нас уже сложно удивить чем-то действительно новым. For Honor не имеет какой-то своей изюминки. Новая механика боевки - да, это классно. Под каждого персонажа надо подстраиваться по своему - это тоже считаю хорошей чертой. Кастомизация...в этом ничего сверхъестественного нет, но + тоже хороший.  Но вот не цепляет.  Нет желания сидеть день напролет (да и куда нам, работягам).  Это та игра, в которую нужно заходить по вечерам с чашкой кофе(или бокалом чего покрепче), брать в руки геймпад и действительно отдыхать. Именно поэтому сразу после открытой беты я не пожалел о том, что сделал предзаказ. И очень надеюсь на то, что издатель игру не забросит, а кроме новых плюшек для кастома персонажей будет вводить новые, более масштабные режимы.  Любишь средневековье? Любишь катаной прорубать стальные доспехи? В тебе живет дух викинга, и ты готов топорами крушить все на своем пути? - Тогда не скупись дружище, эта игра явно стоит своих денег!

На выставке представлены полноценные трейлеры ближайших релизов игр, это: Все комнаты оформлены в стилистике каждой игры. На мероприятии можно встретить: 1) Пушку стреляющую упакованными футболками, она не только позволяет одевать манекенов, но и временно выводит из строя охранных роботов. 2) Силовую перчатку, которая позволяет телекинетически бросаться различными предметами. 3) Несколько коллекционных предметов из не анонсированных игр (выглядят как чашка, сумка и книга; всех нужно собрать по 4 шт.) 4) Босса, которого необходимо победить.

+Интересные квесты, многие из которых можно выполнить не так, как задумано игрой, а    так, как решит игрок. +Необычная боёвка с реалистичным уклоном. +Небольшой, но хорошо детализированный, красивый открытый мир, в котором есть    чем заняться. +В целом довольно неплохой сюжет, но пролог затянут. +Уникальная в своём роде рпг от первого лица. +С релиза игру сильно улучшили в техническом плане, и даже не средних настройках    она выглядит неплохо. -Задание в монастыре унылое и затянутое, как и некоторые задания после него. -Масштабных баталий не очень много. -В многолюдных битвах искусственный интеллект просто сходит с ума, для игрока  противостояние с отрядом из 2-3 разбойников опаснее, чем война.          В это игре главный герой не сверхчеловек или избранный, игрока бомжом и   оборванцем просто выбрасывают в средневековую Богемию, где вы должны с полного   нуля обучаться всему сами: махать мечом, стрелять из лука, варить зелья, читать   книги. На кончиках пальцев ощущение того, как вы учитесь вместе с главным героем,   это просто офигенно, строго к ознакомлению всем любителям жанра, 7/10.

Я оставляю этой игре положительный отзыв, но с большой натяжкой. Игра держится на приличном уровне только благодаря графике и озвучке. Хотя и то, и то здесь не на так уж сильно и впечатляет. Во-первых, история очень короткая. Игра в спокойном темпе проходится за 3 часа. А за такую цену (сейчас это 20 долларов) контента должно быть хотя бы раза в два больше. Во-вторых, сама по себе история крайне предсказуема, а концовка разочаровывает. Вместо того, чтобы раскрутить сценарий и выдать неожиданную концовку (здесь бы очень хорошо подошло подобие "Шоу Трумана"), сделали скучную банальщину. А Ктулху приплетен вообще ни к месту. Таким же образом его можно заменить на любого другого мифического персонажа. Процесс рассказа истории хоть и типичен, но не вызывает сильного раздражения. Во многом благодаря надежде, что все-таки произойдет что-нибудь интересное. Ну а так принцип простой - ходишь по локации, разговариваешь по рации, по телефону и решаешь за всю игру 1,5 паззла. Самой не любимой вещью в игре оказалось ориентирование на местности. Особенно в самом начале, когда я несколько раз блуждал по тупикам, пока не нашел, куда собственно можно дойти. PS. Люди, которые пишут в отзывах, что это хоррор, либо не играли в Old Gods Rising вообще, либо их можно испугать как 2-летнего ребенка просто сказав "БУ".

There is always something to do in Destiny 2! Customization is huge in this game too with different armors and shaders, but you can only apply paid appearances to your gear and not ones earned in the game. That is about the only con I can think of.  The season pass seems kind of sketchy as it puts artificial scarcity in the game forcing you to play a lot if you want to collect everything.

A este juego le dediqué muchísimas horas en su momento en PS3. Continua la historia del AC2 buscando un desenlace con los aconteciomiento que tuvieron lugar al final del AC2. El juego, en la mayor parte, transcurre en una ciudad de Roma increíblemente bien diseñada (como Ubisoft ya nos tiene acostumbrados con unos entornos magistrales), que a pesar de los años que ya tiene este título, no le quitan valor alguno. Si eres fan de la saga, y en especial de nuestro querido Ezio, deberías tener este título en tu biblioteca, aunque sea solo por nostalgia. Aunque he de decir, que a nivel de jugabilidad se ha quedado un poco "viejo", pero no obsoleto. Sabrás perdonar su vejez así como los múltiples bugs que recordamos con cariño.

IN MY HONEST OPINION : -------------------------- Great game with amazing co-op. Requires too much focus so sometimes it becomes hard to play for fun,it does surpass L4d2's co-op in term of difficulty by miles,although it's very hard at first but once you get used to it,it does make you feel OP as the time passes. The community is a problem though, in recruit and veteran difficulties,people aren't toxic and salty but once you jump into random champion and legend difficulty games,you'll most probably be instantly kicked after 5 mins or even right after joining,the biggest joke are the "Locally hosted servers" in a game which is HEAVILY based on co-op,if you live somewhere really far then forget getting a decent ping (until or unless you're the host),not only this,the hosts would also occasionally rage quit in the middle which resets the whole level progress making the level to start from beginning again. Another BIG problem is the unbalanced enemy AI hordes which appear out of thin air,I'm not talking about them coming out of cracks of the walls or floor,they literally appear out from plain walls and sometimes even walk in air above your head. Some of the rpg style elements of the game are really interesting though,like getting different gear,weapons,skill points just by playing the game,five heroes in total and each one having their different sub classes which gives you more of a variety to select from,although some heroes are obviously OP then others,quite like moba games. Would I recommend this game to everyone? Yes I will,if cons are ignored (which is really hard to do in this particular game). I still enjoy this game but not more then L4d2,no game beats the fun co-op of that game. I gave it a negative review before because of "local only servers" but imma reconsider my choice and not act to harshly with it cuz it's still the most fun melee focused game I've played yet and it's a good challenging time killer (also kills you from the inside everytime when some bs happens).

Не буду описывать сюжет (его вы можете прочитать на странице игры)   для меня, пожалуй самый большой недостаток - это управление передвижением в игре (напомнило мне Silent Hill 2004 года и это в эпоху современных технологий) персонаж постоянно во что-то упирается, не может пройти, местами даже стопорится (вплоть до перезапуска) и это очень влияет на восприятие игры (как-бы отталкивает от неё) сделали бы упрощённое управление: куда мышкой тыкнул, туда персонаж и отправился, мне кажется так было-бы проще (сразу заметно, что игра затачивалась под джойстик) Камера, самопроизвольно переключающая, часто отображает неудачный ракурс Некоторые диалоги не переведены.  могу отметить, атмосферу игры и сюжет (как и прежде, он меня затянул) Загадки хоть и не сложные, но мне понравились (хотя их не так уж и много) Обрадовало, что нет подсказок (приходится решать загадки самому) За неправильные действия, можно погибнуть.  Перезагрузка не удалась, но поиграть в эту игру стоит.

DISCLOSURE: Since originally writing this review, I was invited to perform design and testing work for the game (mentioned below), for which I receive compensation. The essence of the review remains the same since initial writing. Original/updated review follows: I wasn't expecting much going in. It looked like a basic mobile pinball port. But, no, actually, this is a serious effort. A very well made pinball game overall, with maybe a few rough spots. : * Clever table designs (some   clever like the baseball themed Fastball) * Good, deep, mostly balanced, fun and challenging rulesets (check them all out here:  . * Good atmosphere - art, sound, music * Mod system adds a fun layer of complexity to the game (if you don't mind having to unlock them) * Well designed global cross-platform tournament system! * Lots of well designed achievements! * Quite good physics * Very low system requirements * Fun daily challenge system * Ability to zoom camera * Optional live leaderboard system (though currently it only uses local scores except for the daily event table) * Responsive developer : * Fixed top-down camera view (it's a 2D game, and otherwise the art looks pretty good, though I wouldn't call it "wow graphics" like the store page, except maybe ironically)... but the art is nice.  Fixed!  Seems to no longer be a problem.  Fixed! * I don't think I like the powerball system (a special ball you can launch that costs tickets (scarce game currency) that doubles your points but also moves faster. But I might change my mind on it. At least it's an interesting concept. It just doesn't seem like something I want to worry about when playing for score. It may not actually be a good idea to use though for advanced players because the loss of control may outweigh the point bonus. EDIT: after playing more, these don't seem to be worth the risk anyway The physics are "somewhat" basic (e.g. it's 2D and ball seems to have no spin - although the ball will sometimes slide down flippers instead of bouncing), but what's there works very well. Most of the stuff I would expect to work, works. I feel like I generally have very good ball control. It's quite pleasant. It's very good for a 2D game. * Carnival: currently this is my favorite. Strong multiball element (several mb modes, stacks with other things). Good ruleset in general. Fun DMD video mode. Mirrored lower playfield. * Brix: this is Breakout. You go through 50 levels. I've only gotten through about 10 so far. You can buy checkpoints and start at a later level that you've unlocked. Pretty clever and fun overall. * Fastball: super clever ruleset (incorporates baseball rules very well). Baseball fans will love this, I think. Mini-game that emulates those little tabletop baseball pinball devices. * Treasure Hunter: super tall layout (mandatory scrolling). Lots of flippers. Decent mode oriented ruleset. The higher you go up the table, the harder it is to control the ball / keep it up there. * Wild West: Hard to get into with some difficult shots. Certain mods are particularly powerful on this table. The theme is fun, and the ruleset is interesting once you learn it. * Space Frontier: Another table that's hard to figure out at first, but quite fun with a deep ruleset, interesting shots, and interesting mods. * Bagaball: this is a decent bagatelle design where you want to match the ball color to the appropriate part of the playfield. But the lack of mouse launch control makes perhaps more difficult than it should be. * Apparatus: Added March 2018. I had the opportunity to help test and refine the table pre-release. In my opinion, this is now the best table in the pack and one of the most interesting tables I've ever played. It's very innovative with a complex layout and ruleset, and very well balanced (thanks to the lengthy pre-release testing). * Tradewinds: Added July 2019. I co-designed this table (so obviously I think it's pretty good, but I may be a bit biased here!). It features a double playfield, dynamic scoring, pirates, and more! * Celtic Jukebox: Added early 2020. Unlike the other tables, this one requires a few tasks across other tables to unlock. Rhythm game video mode is among the standout features, along with music track selection linked to the ruleset (similar to Stern AC/DC, Aerosmith, etc).  Layout features two upper flippers that are very important for certain shots. Pretty solid design overall. Ruleset seems fairly well balanced. The game's been around in some form on mobile for quite a while now. You can read more about the history of the game here:

Ну вообщем, что я хочу сказать. Новую Амнезию можно и хвалить и ругать одновременно, дабы у всех точки зрения разные и каждый ждал от игры своего. Конечно же, в первую очередь большинство ждали от игры незабываемого хоррора, каким была первая часть и под впечатлением от которого останешься на долго. Под впечатлением вы конечно же останетесь, но скорее не от хоррора (его тут просто как такового нет), а от атмосферы и подачи сюжета игры. Конечно же сразу стоит отметить, что игра не для любителей тупо пробежать коридоры и затем, грязно выругавшись в сторону разработчиков, удалить её. В A Machine for Pigs играть нужно вдумываясь, читая каждые записки и слушая реплики героя, таким образом полностью погружаясь в игру. В игре были полностью упразднены атрибуты первой части, а именно помутнение рассудка или же инвентарь, здесь это лишнее, тут упор идет только на сюжет. Кстати в плане сюжета я ничего подобного еще не встречал, он просто великолепен и несет гораздо больше смысла, чем первая часть, а после прохождения игры складывается ощущение будто вы прочли какой то фантастический роман. Нужно сказать о самом окружении в игре, оно выполнено в стимпанк стиле (все эти паровые машины, вентиля, смотрятся просто изумительно). Если же вы ждали от игры исключительно хоррора, то проходите мимо, здесь вы этого не увидите. Однако если вы любитель долгих философских рассуждений и готовы проникнуться сюжетом, который после себя оставляет больше вопросов нежели ответов, то тогда вам по адресу. Моя оценка 10/10 ИМХО

This game is so good but also such a disappointment that I don't know if I should really be recommending it. Let's quickly go over the pros: - Easy to learn but doesn't require that much grinding. - No microtransactions, this is so rare from EA but very welcome addition, there are a few things that you can buy nothing really major, just skins and the ability to unlock all locations without finishing the game, no big deal. - A return to the roots of NFS; there is a ton of car customization, the driving feels like an arcade driving experience but is overall very fun, plenty of cop chases and also a simpler sanctioned racing experience that reminds you of Pro Street and also Most Wanted, except way better because cops are actually kinda hard to get rid off early on And for the cons: - The story is incredibly short, I mean this is probably the WORST NFS plot I've ever come across, I mean Jesus, it is so underwhelming. The story starts kinda weak but halfway through the game it actually gets good and keeps you at the edge of your seat wanting to know what happens next, but then it straight up just ends. Like they built up so much of the story, it was hyped so much just to end in a super lame and unclimactic ending. It literally only took me 4 mins to finish the "final" mission. What's worse is the ending cinematic makes it look like there is more to the story coming up but nope. I mean I put in 26 hours and did a lot of side missions but even so it still felt like the entire story fell flat on its face. I mean come on, who wrote this bs, they need to get fired. This is my biggest gripe so far. - The amount of cars is good but I can't help but feel like it was artificially inflated like there are 3 different versions of the same car except its just dumb stuff like some are convertible or a slightly higher performance version. I think I saw like 4 or 5 different versions of the Lamborghini Hurancan. - The music list is absolutely awful, I mean it is pretty much just trap/neo-rap/Latin music and even there's probably like 15-20 songs total. First time I heard music I kept skipping thinking I would find some good stuff but nope, even if you decided to listen to the music it would get awfully repetitive quickly. I just turned off the music and launched Spotify. What is funny is that a lot of my taste in music came from old NFS games because it used to be so good and so diverse I got to sample a lot of music. - Now, the glitches in this game weren't game-breaking but you could tell this game was rushed and not polished, I often came across graphical glitches where the cars would disappear for a moment and then pop back in almost immediately, though the worst were the ones where the screen would blackout for a millisecond or two. It was not game-breaking but sure annoyed the hell out of me. In total, would I recommend this game

(+) yönleri mass effect serisine 2. oyunla girdim diğer oyunları oynama şansım olmadı daha,incelemeyi bunu göz önüne alarak yapacağım.Mekanik olarak pek sizi çekmesede oyunda ilerledikçe hikayenin gidişatı sizi çok etkilicek özellikle gemi mürettabatının yan görevleri çok hoşuma gitti.oyunun ilk saatleri çok sıkılsanız da vakit geçirdikçe nasıl bir serüvenin içine girdiğinizi fark edemeyecksiniz.Mass effect 2 tam anlamıyla bir RPG oyunudur diyebilirz özellikle diyaloglar,karşınıza çıkan diyalog seçimlerin de farklı olaylara sürükleyen seçenekler mevcut,oyunun en iyi yaptığı şey bu diyebilirm.diyalog demişken oyun daki mürettebat ile iyi geçinip onlara yavşayabilirsiniz ve asıl beklenen soru sex var mı? tam anlamıyla olamasa da oyun da ilişki sistemi var .Benim için vurucu olan yanı oyunda "LEZBİYEN"olabiliyorsunuz.bitti mi bitmedi vereceğiniz kararlar sonucun da görevler değişiklik gösterebiliyor.Oyun yarı açık dünya tarzında gidip görebiliceğimz yerler var ama kısıtlı.Oyunun yarı açık dünya demişsek de gezegenlere seyehat edebiliyoruz gemimiz de bulunan "SONDA"lar ile uzay madenciliği yapabiliyoruz bunu dedim ama bunlar çok yüzeysel kalıyor.Çıkardığınız madenler sayesinde gemi geliştirmeleri,silah,zırh vb araştırmalar yapabiliyorsunuz. karakter geliişimi oyunda çok iyi işlenmiş.her karakterin bir alt yapısı var boş hissettirmiyor. (+)hikayesi: Gelelim hikayesine oyunun başlangıcın da gemimiz "TOPLAYICI" gemisi ile karşılaşıyor bunun sonucun da bir arbede çıkıyor ve gemimiz parçalanıyor uzayın boşluğun da sürükleniyoruz.Bizi "CERBERUS" adında bir birlik alıp sağlığımıza kavuşuıyoruz o anda karakterimizi yaratma ekranı çıkıyor (elimden geleni yapmama rağmen karakterim çok çirkin oldu).Toplayıcıları durdurmak amacıyla Cerberus ile güç birliği yapıp takımımızı toplamaya başlıyoruz.Burdan sonrası sizin maceranız sizin seçimleriniz haline geliyor. buraya kadar tamam şimdi gömme zamanı. (-) tarafları -oyunun sizi sürekli yükleme ekranıyla baş başa bırakması.(geminin odalarında gezeyim derseniz geçişler de yükleme ekranına maruz kalabilirsiniz D:) -yapay zeka bazen çuvallıyor,çıktığı seneyi de göz önünde bulundurmak lazım tabi. -karakter yaratma ekranı detaylı olsada,bir türlü karakterimi güzel bir şeye benzetemedim(bu  oyunun bir eksisi mi bilemem) -grafik olarak pek bişi beklemeyin oyunun eksi yanlarını bulmak zor oldu. -gelelim final kısmına kesinlikle oynanmaya değer farklı bir tat RPG türünü seviyorsanız denemeniz gereken bir oyun. -yapımcısı "BİOWARE" RPG türünde iyi işler çıkartmış bir firma olduğu için bu oyunun geliştiricisine baktığımda hemen aldım oyunu.

Blackwacke ist ein Aktionsreiches Spiel. Durch eine brilliante Grafik stellt das erste Multiplayer Open World Multiplayer Spiel andere Simulationen in dem Bereich in den Schatten! Jedoch bietet das Spiel nicht weitere Ideen für die Spiel Ersteller oder es wird schwer interessanten Content raus zu bringen. Von dieser Seite aus kann man nichts voraussehen. Jedoch ist alleine dies ein Actionsreiches Abenteuer was du mit deinen Freunden bestreiten kannst! Mastfire Studios hat dadurch ein Action Reiches Abenteur erstellt was eine oder eine ganze Gruppe bestreiten kann. Jedoch gibt es auch dunkle Seiten, die Comunity muss sich um die Server kümmern, ihr seid dafür verantwortlich das Server offen sind und ihr müsst Geld selber investieren damit ihr Spielmöglichkeiten habt! Von der Seite Extra Ränge für Donater kann man daher nicht erwarten da das Spiel dafür nicht ausgelegt ist sprich ihr müsst selber schauen wie ihr das Geld zusammen kratzt um euren Server selbstständig zu Finanzieren. Jetzt einen Blackwake Server zu erstellen rate ich euch daher nicht da dafür das Spiel leider nicht bereit ist. Jedoch gehe ich mit einem Positiven Fazit aus dem Spiel raus, es bereitet dir eine sehr aktionsreiche Nacht!

is a minimal puzzle game, but not of the conventional variety: Each stage is an illustration spliced into wedges that rotate along a radial axis. Unscramble these layers to reveal the original image. While the bold artworks are splendid and the music relaxing, it's not entirely polished, and all too familiar to a removed game by a very similar name:  , which presumably vanished for its unauthorized use of creative content. ✅ Clean, minimal UI with stylish touches ✅ Excellent artwork* ✅ Well chosen music tracks (original had only one) ✅ No unfair stages like the original (very thinly sliced, high-piece, low detail) ✅ Import your own pictures to create randomized puzzles. But: You can't customize the puzzle. ✅ Minimum price ❌ Some images are gigantic, while others are tiny. No way to change zoom ❌ Some type of annoying jitter has been added to mouse movement, not present in the original ❌ (Minor gripe) The movable pieces don't perfectly line up edge to edge. Snapping would have been preferred ❌ No windowed option. F12 (screenshot function) is disabled... ❌ No volume control. Music can only be toggled at the main menu. ❌ 30 minutes of content *Unknown: Artwork used without permission? If you enjoy these type of quick achievement games with easy puzzles, then this is an obvious buy (on sale). That the original was banned and this one disables screenshots is highly suspect that it might likewise be at risk of removal in the future, so collectors should probably consider purchase. For everyone else, you're not missing out by skipping it. : Solve every puzzle for 100%

[TL;DR no final] The witcher 2 é um dos melhores RPG's que eu já joguei (e um dos poucos que eu tive disposição para zerar, eu ainda não oficialmente zerei, mas estou muito perto), depois de finalizar o The Witcher 1, me deu um grande alivio de ter acabado com aquele jogo, mas você não tem ideia de que alivio que deu de finalmente ir para o The Witcher 2. O jogo melhorou tudo que tinha de ruim no TW1, o combate foi renovado, a tecnica de meditação ficou mais facil e equilibrada, mas eu senti falta de usar porções no meio do combate. O jogo é visualmente lindo, o que faz parecer que é um jogo atual, mas como um bom observador, eu vi que a CD Projekt Red reciclou algumas coisas do primeiro jogo, como gritos no meio da luta, algumas animações como por exemplo as  crianças correndo e etc, mas nada que faça mal.  Os boss são dificeis pra caralho, e as vezes os proprios mini-boss, mesmo com um nivel elevado, eu demorei quase 1 hora pra passar de um mago pra pegar uma amardura rara e isso por que era opcional (e no fim eu descobri que não tinha nada a vê com armadura nenhuma).  O combate novo deve ter sido o maior alivio dos que jogaram o primeiro, afinal o combate do primeiro foi o que compremeteu o jogo quase todo na visão de muitos e pra mim, era até facil depois de um tempo. O combate de TW2 tem uma falha muito grande que para mim, é batalha em grupo, se você for cercado por inimigos de level alto é dificil você sair vivo, com o tempo você pega a tecnica, eu sei que tem talentos para ataque em multiplos adversários, mas não é o mesmo do primeiro jogo, o combate me parece uma versão mais facil e rapida de Dark Souls, você rola pra caralho (e quando eu digo pra caralho, é pra caralho, o talento de deixar 200% mais rapido faz você usar isso como forma de locomoção), é moderadamente dificil e alguns boss são exageradamente overpower. A historia pode ser o ponto mais forte do jogo, mas para mim, o do primeiro me pareceu um pouco mais interessante, os dialogos eram mais faceis, e o que eu acho pior no segundo jogo é o modo que eles metem personagens nos dialogos que você provavelmente nem lembra mais e deixa o dialogo MUITO pesado, e eu perco muito o rumo da historia assim, acho que apenas jogando 2 vezes para entender a historia perfeitamente (no meu caso). Questão de bugs, o jogo tem sim os seus pequenos bugs, mas quando eu digo pequenos, são pequenos mesmo, eu não me lembro de achar um que me fizesse voltar com o save ou algo parecido. Mas eu recomendo baixar mods como Extra Talents per Level (Diferente do primeiro, você ganha 1 ponto pra gastar na arvore de talentos por LEVEL, mano, não da pra encher quase nada com isso, se você achar que deixa o jogo muito facil, ponha este mod e coloque o jogo no Hard) e algum mod que modifica o peso do jogo, porque o peso do jogo é muito limitado e você ta cheio quase sempre, isso por que você sabe que tem itens ali que você vai precisar no futuro mas você não pode largar. Resumo: TW2 é um jogo otimo, mas requer bastante atenção na historia para não se perder, paciencia e um pouco de pratica por que não é um jogo nada facil, o que provavelmente vai fazer você pesquisar mais um pouco sobre algumas coisa na internet para passar de certas quests. Eu acho que é um jogo obrigatorio para se jogar antes de TW3, muito mais que TW1.

The game's been out for barely three days at the time of this review and I already have over 30 hours on it. Definitely recommend it, really fun to play and run! May seem hard at the start but once you get the hang of the rhythm and try out different weapons and sets it gets *really* satisfying to play.  Gets to a point where the ability and shooting restrictions are just natural and don't even feel them. It may even feel too easy, until you get to the last unlock. Some items are OP combined with other guns, and there's some ways to cheese the bosses really easily but they're already working on a patch for that. The soundtrack is great, while running I'm sometimes sad that I don't get to listen to more of it. After you complete your first run you unlock more characters, each have different stats and playstyles so that adds replay value, and each are fun in their unique way. The last unlock will keep you busy for a long time, that's for sure! For a game made essentially by only two developers, this feels like a really polished experience with a few overlooks that are already in the way of being fixed. If it's not your type of game, I'd get it even if it was just for the soundtrack! You can even have auto-rhythm and not worry about that if you're bad with it or just don't think you'll enjoy that part.

Bioshock Grafik: Die Grafik in Bioshock 1 ist sehr gut wenn man beachtet, dass das Spiel von 2007 ist. Für heutige Verhältnisse ist die Grafik trotzdem noch sehr gut. 9/10 Sound: Der Sound ist im großen und ganzen sehr gut. Soundeffekte sind sehr atmosphärisch und der Soundtrack passend. 8,5/10 Atmosphäre: Die Atmosphäre in Bioshock 1 ist schwer zu überbieten. Es gibt keine negativen Sachen die mir aufgefallen sind. 10/10 Handlung: Die Story ist sehr schön und leicht emotional. Es wird viel erzählt und man hat viel zu erledigen. Ebenfalls die Detailverliebtheit ist wunderbar in Bioshock 1. 10/10 Steuerung: Die Steuerung ist für diese Menge an funktionen sehr gut eingestellt. Man muss zwar als neuling etwas nachschauen aber im großen und ganzen ist sie sehr gut gelungen. 9/10 Fazit: Das Spiel eignet sich für jeden Shooterfan, sowie für jeden Action und Storyliebhaber. Mir hat das Spiel sehr gut gefallen. Und ich würde es immer weiterempfehlen! Gesamtpunktzahl: 46,5/50 Punkte.

Новую игру от польских разработчиков OhNoo Studio я ждал с интересом. После неординарной Tormentum - Dark Sorrow было немного неожиданно наблюдать за приключениями маленькой принцессы Чок в сказочном антураже.   не настолько депрессивна и атмосферна как ее предшественница, но фирменная мрачность присутствует и в данном проекте. Теперь она сдобрена прекрасной, вручную нарисованной анимированной графикой, юмором и скрытым посланием, которое добавляет весомости истории.  Начинается все несколько банально. Когда Добрая Королева вынуждена отправиться на битву с ужасным Фениксом, замок попадает под контроль Злого Чародея, а принцесса оказывается в темнице, откуда ей сперва надо сбежать, чтобы затем отправиться в увлекательное путешествие. Чок предстоит дать отпор стражникам, перехитрить опасных существ, населяющих замок, подружиться с местным котом и сразиться с главным злодеем.  Игрок в процессе прохождения столкнется с загадками разной степени сложности. Найденные предметы, необходимые для продвижения по сюжету отправятся на хранение в инвентарь, который со временем Чок улучшит до более вместительного. Будут иметь место QTE на реакцию и смекалку. Чтобы выбить все ачивменты при первом прохождении, придется изучить их заранее. Мне не удалось выполнить все условия, так что будет повод перепройти. Благо игра доставляет эстетическое удовольствие благодаря графической составляющей и музыкальному сопровождению.  В мелочах чувствуется любовь и внимание создателей TSIOQUE к своему детищу. Финальный твист затрагивает серьезную тему и, вероятно, основан на реальных событиях из жизни участника OhNoo Studio. Такая интерпретация, казалось бы, детского сюжета оказывается близка многим людям. В таком контексте нет желания выискивать недостатки в игре. Стоит только отметить ее небольшую продолжительность.     Я не поклонник жанра Point & Click. Знаменитая Deponia оставила равнодушным, но вот полякам удалось зацепить уже дважды. Любопытно, каким получиться сиквел Tormentum. TSIOQUE же уверенно рекомендую всем. Хочется пожелать удачи студии и новых отличных проектов этим талантливым ребятам.

※最後に詳細は書くけど検閲版です。オリジナル版と同様のグラフィックで遊ぶ場合はあるファイルの設定を書き換えると変わる 本来なら2018年12月に発売されるはずが、「児童搾取」というよくわからない理由で具体的にどのシーンが該当するのかValveから提示されず発売未定となっていた台湾グルメを擬人化したシミュレーションゲーム。 台湾のボロボロな夜市を舞台に、ルーロー飯の「ルル」、タピオカミルクティーの「マドカ」、台湾式フライドチキンの「ヒカリ」の三人（三食？）それぞれの主人公との好感度・人気・料理の品質の三つのパラメーターを上げていき、定期的に行われる審査に合格しながら3か月後の本評価を目指すという流れ。 物凄い無駄な検閲・修正作業のために半年以上も延期してようやく発売にこぎつけたが、その発売のために「性的表現のないゲーム」でキャラクターを丸ごと差し替えたという。なんかオリジナル版をプレイしていない海外Steamユーザーがわざわざ修正が入るとのことで憶測でアダルトゲームだったと勘違いして「アダルトパッチが出ない」と騒いでたりするけど、そもそもこれ「アダルトゲームじゃない」です。「最初から全年齢向け」のゲーム。 修正されたキャラクターは「ルル」なのだが、身長が8cm程伸びてぼさぼさだった髪は結ばれジャンパーを着用されたデザインに変更されている。 オリジナル版 Steam版 オリジナル版のルルは幼く見えて初期の服装だとTシャツ1枚といっても別に裸体描写そのものは出てこないし、キャラクター設定も料理の精霊ということで推定100歳以上(イベントシーンで主人公が50年前の写真を見て驚愕する)。このキャラクターだけで「児童搾取」だというのならネプテューヌシリーズや、食用系少女と同じ「Simon Creative」の「東津萌米」はどうだというんだ？ネプテューヌは1桁～10代前半にしか見えないラムロムの触手プレイがあるぞ。 正直ルルの新しいキャラクターデザインはマドカ・ヒカリとダブっている感が否めないし、オリジナル版の方がグルメ擬人化として合っていて各キャラクターの絵柄面の差別化も中途半端になっている。 こういう絵柄のゲームで乱暴な言葉でレビューも書くのもあれだけど、 馬鹿だからこういう馬鹿げた審査を行うんだろうが、審査した奴は馬鹿なんだからさっさとValve辞めた方がいいんじゃねぇのか？と素直に思った。

10 сладких рулетов из 10 Теперь подробнее: 1. Геймплей. Большой открытый мир, сотни персонажей, десятки сотен квестов, и столько же локаций, множество вариантов взаимодействия со всем выше перечисленным. 2. Графика. Для 2011 года это была красивая игра, но и сейчас она выглядит хорошо. Спустя 5 лет стандарты меняются, но никто ведь не запрещает вам достигнуть их с помощью множества модификаций? 3. Музыка. Джереми Соул написал восхитительные композиции для этой замечательной игры, и без его музыки, игра бы ощущалась совсем по-другому. 4. Атмосфера. Этот нарисованный, сотканный из пикселей мир с первых часов погружает в свою неповторимую атмосферу, которая поражает своими грацией, красотой и величием. 5. Реиграбельность. Можно проходить игру десятками разными способами и каждый из них также интересен как и остальные, а поддержка модификаций, коих десятки тысяч, могут изменить игру так, как вы этого хотите. Это легендарная игра и сравнивать её с чем-либо не нужно. Это - Скайрим.

I got the game for free to review but the fact that it's less than a Coke can is definitely worth it!

Gördüğüm şudur ki nasıl Call of Duty bitmek bilmez aksiyonuyla, Battlefield geniş dünyası ve kullanılabilir geniş envanter çeşitleriyle ön plana çıkıyorsa, Insurgency'de Hardcore FPS (Gerçekten Gerçekçi Mekanikler) türünde listenin başını oynuyor. Oyuna alışması ve silahlar üstünde hakimiyet kurması belli bir zamanınızı alsada oyun her noktasıyla size gerçek bir savaş hissi yaşattıracak. Çünkü oyun içinde çeşitli operatörler bulunmakta ve bu öperatörlerin uzmanlık alanlarına göre silahları değişmekte. Keskin Nişansı, Piyade, Tahribatçı, Uzman Takım Lideri gibi.  Sürekli bir yerlere koşarak ateş etmeyi ve düşmanlarınızı etkisiz hale getirmeyi değil, belli planlar kurarak bulunduğunuz yeri iyi tanımalı ve kendinizi koruma altına aldıktan sonra rakiplerinizi etkisiz hale getirmenin ne derece önemli olduğunu anlayacak ve tüm bunların dışındaysa oyun içinde çeşitli görevler, çeşitli zorluklarla sizi bekliyor olacak.  Bir de oyunu Steam Atölyesi üzerinden zevkinize göre modlayabiliyorsunuz, o zamanda çok daha keyifli bir hale dönüşüyor. Her silah, karakter ve harita için ses, desen ve diğer çeşitli özellikler beğeninize sunulmuş... Insurgency'i deneyin, tavsiyemdir.

O jogo é bem divertido. Achei legal você ter a opção de customizar seu personagem, e isso aumentar os stats dele dependendo da gear que você usar. Mas... A maioria dos personagens não tem muita variação de gear. Algumas gear só remove a luva do personagem, ou muda o cinto kkkkkkkkkk.  Mas ainda assim é uma coisa que vai te prender no jogo e vai prender mesmo kkkk, porque nas caixas maternas é foda de tu conseguir a gear que você quer ou habilidade.  E os multiversos lendários tem uns requisitos muito idiota. Tem que ter muita paciência pra poder desbloquear, porque demora. Mesmo sendo só pra dois ou três personagens que você jogue, Ainda sim dará muito trabalho, que dirá pra todos. A jogabilidade de jogo de luta no pc é aquela bosta de sempre kkk, mas a maioria das pessoas joga de controle, então não posso dizer nada sobre, pois joguei no teclado. Os super tão bem legais. O legal desse jogo é que você pode desbloquear habilidades pros personagens, ok, a maioria são uns cocô kkk, mas tem algumas que são legais. Os gráficos são muito bons, as expressões faciais e etc.  A dublagem é boa, alguns personagens que não combinaram muito, tipo o Damian, que tem a voz de Robin genérica. Simplesmente todo Robin que aparece, independente de qual Robin é, os cara bota aquela mesma voz.

Вот это я понимаю, русская атмосферная игра, хорошая графика, игра мне ни разу не наскучила, прошел на Хардкоре и в некоторых моментах было тяжело но а так ничего сложного, игру рекомендую! E' un gioco che conoscevo già in quanto l'ho provato su Xbox one al lancio però, purtroppo, non l'ho mai giocato veramente. Girando su Steam l'ho trovato ad un prezzo davvero ottimo quindi ho deciso di comprarlo. Che dire del gioco?! SPETTACOLO. Storia Romanzata stile FILM, combattimenti belli e intensi, grafica strepitosa e scorrimento del gioco davvero ottimo. Però devo citare anche qualcosa di negativo, la durata del gioco non è delle migliori. Finisce subito e la ripetitività delle varie combo alla lunga può rischiare di stancare il giocatore meno paziente. Diciamo che si va avanti per lo spettacolo del gioco e per la storia. Il comparto Multiplayer offre una sorta di arena da giocare in CO-OP contro delle Orde di nemici dove le esecuzioni in doppio con amici ne fanno da padrona. Commento finale : Gioco da comprare sicuramente e finire il classico triple A però non aspettatevi un gioco da 40ore. Sicuramente  gli amanti dei Action Game lo ameranno per la sua intensità. MARIUS MARIUS MAAARIUS... ROMEEEE IIIISSS POWWWER! Buon Gioco a tutti.

Puzzle platform oyunlarının arasında başarılı bir noktaya erişen Trine ilk oyununu 3 Temmuz 2009 tarihinde piyasaya çıkarmıştı. İkinci oyununu 7 Aralık 2011 tarihinde Windows için piyasaya sürmüş son olarakta 22 Temmuz 2014 tarihinde diğer platformlardan sonra Android sürümünü de piyasaya sürmüştü. Oyunun geliştirici firması olan Frozenbyte ilk oyunu kadar başarılı olan ikinci oyunuyla çizgisini bozmadan yoluna devam etmeyi başarmış ve fantastik dünyanın bütün gizemini oyuna yansıtmıştı. Oyunun ilk serisinde olmayan çoklu oyuncu seçeneği de bu seride mevcut.  Pc ve Mac gibi birbirinden bağımsız platformları bir araya getiren ve oynanışı sağlayan çapraz platform oyun destek modu da bulunuyor. Bu mod farklı platformlardan oyuna girenlerle oynamanıza olanak sağlanıyor

Ну что тут сказать, Red Barrels постарались на все 110% ! Тут вам: - Великолепная оптимизация - Шикарнейший звук ( крайне советую играть в наушниках ) - Хорошая завязка сюжета  - В графическом плане, игра показывает красивую и сочную картинку ( прогресс между Outlast и Outlast 2, виден весьма и весьма сильно ) - 499 рублей! В итоге мы с вами получаем качественный продукт, за небольшие деньги. Казалось бы, что мешало Red Barrels поставить ценник в 1-1,5к? Почему за 4-х часовую игру (RE7) мы должны платить 2к!? По эмоциям и впечатлениям Outlast 2 на полторы головы выше, нежели RE7. Мне понравился новый RE7, но вот после Outlast 2 - чаша весов склоняется в пользу второго проекта... Браво Red Barrels, вы с лихвой превзошли все мои ожидания, браво!

After the disappointing PC version of GTA IV, this is a welcome relief. You’ll have to sacrifice some of the finer details, like the gorgeous depth of field effects and ultra high-res textures, but it’s entirely possible to play and enjoy GTA V without a super powerful PC. If you have the muscle to run it at max settings, the visual fidelity is astonishing. Driving through the city at night in a storm, neon signs reflecting in the puddles and on the rain-slicked hood of your car, it almost looks photorealistic..

Selam dostlarım, oyun hakkında bilgi vermeye başlamadan önce size oyunun fiyatının absürt durmasından bahsedeceğim. İnanın bana bu oyuna 26TL vererek (eskiden) kütüphanenize eklediğinizde oyun içindeki operatörleri açmak için tabiri caizse ananız ağlıyor. Farkındayım bir oyuna 100TL ve üzeri bir fiyat vermek hepimize zor geliyor lakin oyunun Starter Edition (26TL'lik paket) paketine sahip olan biri olarak söylüyorum keşke daha önceden sizin bu incelemeyi okuyor oluşunuz gibi ben de oyunun hangi paketini alacağım hakkında kararsız kalıp incelemeleri okumaya zahmet etseydim. Starter Edition pişmanlıktır. Oyunun ortamını,havasını anlatmaya başlarsak... Bir kere oyun FPS tarzı oyunlar arasında çok farklı bir yere sahip. Bu farklılık oyundan alacağınız zevki aşırı şekilde yükseltiyor. Ayrıca şunu da belirtmek istiyorum ki oyunda haritalar hiçbir şekilde oynayışınızı kısıtlamıyor. Bu sizin için müthiş bir şey! Nereden çıkıp hangi adamı vuracağınız, duvarları kırıp adam arkalamanız, iğne deliğinden kafa vuruşu ile adam vurmanız ve daha neler neler! Hepsi sizin oynayış tarzınıza kalmış. Kendinize ait taktikler ise en önemlisi, rakip takımı mağlup etmek için en iyi yöntem! Arkadaşlarla oynanması durumundaki eğlenceyi bu incelememde belirtemem, böyle bir şey olamaz. Saatlerin su gibi akıp gittiğini fark ettiğinizdeki şaşkınlığınızı tahmin etmek pek de zor değil! Aşağıdan Steam Grubumuza Bekleriz <3

For Honor has some dents in its shiny armor, such as the mediocre campaign, the frugal economy, and the snowballing victories in team modes. But it’s hard to be mad too long when I consider that the melee combat system is second to none and a joy to learn, take your licks, and then learn some more. I could feel myself becoming a better warrior with this deep, flexible, and complete fighting system. The more I play For Honor, the more I want to play For Honor. I hope Ubisoft doubles-down on support, because it’s something truly special. Rating: 8/10

Fun game with some nice powerups. The game does throw some standard stuff around like ice cards that need to played twice. However it also adds ribbons where you need to find scissors to cut them. So its a nice change of pace. The card backs their are only 4 of them and mostly dull. The face cards their are only 2 of those and its border or borderless. So no many choices for cards. I wish their was a lot more.  The sound effects are good and the music I do like. The perfect animation with the cheesy looking fireworks is a bit of a let down. While the sound effect is good the actual fireworks just look bad. I think they could improve that animation by 100%. I have seen screensavers that had better fireworks effect and those were free. The actual gameplay is fun and it makes for a relaxing round of solitaire. If you enjoy cards this is a good one to get.

Wooooooooot So I've decided to make this a proper review. Let's get straight to the point. DoW2, much like it's predecessor, is a RTS set in the grimdark world of Warhammer 40,000. Unlike its predecessor however, your battles are on a far smaller scale. No longer do you have a huge squad of 9 marines per squad for example. Nor can you build more than one Land Raider. Instead squad sizes are far smaller(unless you're 'nids or orks in which case numbers wins the day), and focused more on flanking, tactics, special abilities and the like. In my opinion this actually makes the game more enjoyable for me. DoW1 felt too much like any stereotypical RTS wearing a 40k skin. DoW2 feels unique.  The campaign is basically an adventure, with a neat story, neat gear and the like. Done with campaign and bored of it? RTS battles await. Don't want to play it as a RTS? Last Stand. For a game that is this old now, there's plenty to see and do. If you're a 40k fan, then every now and then it's great to get your 40k kicks in. DoW2 Retribution is perhaps the last great 40k game. None of those released after it so far has been anywhere as epic a journey. Until Sega decides to make a DoW3, this game above all else, is probably THE 40k PC game I'd choose if I had to pick one to play for the rest of my life. And I guess it'd be remiss not to mention that I'm massively into 40k today only because of this game.

The lip syncing and facial animations leave tons to be desired and really took me out of the moment, but other than that, this is a really great series. Not just Episode 1, the whole banana. I recently played Before the Storm before playing this game, and Chloe and Max are the first characters I've cared for in a game in a long time. I can't say that this game enraptured and depressed me like it did some people, but I still thought that the story - which is essentially the game itself - was very well done, mostly unpredictable, and interesting throughout. I got the whole game for $5 and I definitely got more than that out of it.

Bulletstorm: Full Clip Edition flopped. Let's not have any doubt about that. The crime committed here is Gearbox's fault for overpricing the ♥♥♥♥ out of what is one of the best remaster packages I've seen lately.  It runs beautifully, looks fantastic even in 2018 standards (it did come out in 2017 but I only played it now when it was acceptably cheap for myself, who already owned the original) and the game is still the same crazy good shooty explody fun... ...only now with Duke motherf*cking Nukem in it. But I digress, I'll approach this as a game on its own, mention the remaster much later in the review but know that this is a must-buy when anything under 10€ for owners of the original. The rest who never touched this brilliance of a software can feel happy with the purchase if they paid around 25-30€ but no more. Anyway, onwards! If you care about it, you're doing it wrong... To be fair, the story isn't actually all that bad! It's actually a pretty solid tale of a small group of soldiers (some confederate, others rogue) that must overcome differences and work together to get off the planet they crashed in. To do that they must find a general (the confederate want to save and rogues want to kill) to get to the escape ship and in the middle you'll get about 9 hours of extremely fast paced intense gameplay and cringy-yet-well-voiced jokes. You're one of the rogue troopers (ahh references <3), named Gray(son) Hunt, with a macho-man voice, that loves ♥♥♥♥ and tit jokes and exploding heads and flying limbs.  Or if you own the 5€ Duke Nukem DLC, you get to play as... ta-daaaa, Dewk Newkm himself, who is still excellently voiced, has terrible lip-sync and is treated with the same voice acting as Grayson. AKA... others will call him Gray, Grayson or Hunt and not ♥♥♥♥♥♥♥ Dook New-Come, which shows how lazy he was slapped in there. His dialogue is still quite decently written so overall, gets a pass and does warrant for a second playthrough (After beating the game, you unlock overkill mode, so that's an extra motivation to beat the game again). The ending both is conclusive and sequel-baits, but it's solid and nicely conclusive overall. Now we just need the sequel :) So... when Gearbox or People Can Fly stop smelling their own farts and decide to make Bulletstorm 2: The Sequel But Stormier, then I think half the FPS community would appreciate instead of a new Duke Nukem 3D re-release or... God forbid... more SHIFT codes for Borderlands 2. What everyone cares (or at least should care) about! There are 4 modes here:  - Campaign -> as regular as any. 5 difficulty modes, collectibles, well paced gameplay overall, mixing slower story bits with cutscenes with pure action gameplay almost seamlessly. You can carry 3 weapons (of any type) and can upgrade them at designated dropkits (which work as checkpoints as well). - Overkill Mode -> essentially New Game +. Same 5 difficulty modes, collectibles and such but you now can carry ALL weapons already FULLY upgraded from the get-go. The tutorial is automatically ditched so you can get right into the action. Rest of it is the same as the campaign - Echoes -> arena based challenge modes where you kill and kill and rack a ♥♥♥♥♥♥♥ of points in awesome single-player blood fest. Think of them as Call of Duty's Spec Ops: play -> unlock more arenas -> rinse and repeat. - Anarchy Mode -> Bulletstorm's Multiplayer: like Echoes but with up to 4 people with a twist: more timed challenges, ALOT more skillshots can be made (team skillshots which don't exist in SP ofc) and in general it's a blast. Easily one of the best survival based multiplayers I've played. Highly customizable characters and excellent gameplay throughout this whole package, not just the co-op. Now, gameplay itself and what are these... "skillshots". "Kill a dude by literally tearing him a new ♥♥♥♥♥♥♥ with bullets" -> BAM! +50 points for you, good Sir! "Kick a dude into a spiked wall" -> BOOM! +100 points for you, you sick ♥♥♥♥! "Impale an enemy on a shock element" -> MAKE IT RAIN, MAKE IT RAIN! Okay, you get the point. The crazier the ♥♥♥♥ you pull off, the more points you get (ergo, the more you can upgrade, buy ammo and special ammo, etc.) so, you better get creative or... the game will punish you. Not much... but it will. And if you want to play it vanilla as good old ice-cream, then you can just beat it and then play with everything unlocked in Overkill Mode... ... or you can ♥♥♥♥ off back to Battlefield and Call of Duty. Granted, the game does feel TOO EASY, even on it's max difficulty. I can literally play this like a big daddy, ramming everything to death not using cover (let's face it... I AM THE ♥♥♥♥♥♥♥ COVER) and I'd still be safe and sound at home by dinner time for some roasted turducken (aren't we all secretly animals in some way?). Anyway, the guns feel... amazing. Easily one of the best feeling FPS games ever made in my opinion. The reload sounds make me feel like I'm decapitating a whole enemy arena just by putting a shell on my shotgun. Everytime I slice a dude in 2 with the shotgun feels like I personally chokeslammed Mankind through the Cell in 1998 and there is hardly any gun that doesn't feel like I'm not absolutely tearing them into beef jerky just by kissing them with the barrel of said gun. If this doesn't sound like it's a good FPS then you're either in denial or you're Mankind 20 years ago. Graphics: Rocksolid. Now, maxed out, the game does look quite gorgeous so they did an excellent job with the remaster. Textures and environments look great, limbs have nice detail, and so do characters and enemy models. Lip syncing is beyond terrible though, so... try to avoid paying attention to that. The bloom is used but not abused, the Anti-Aliasing doesn't blur the ♥♥♥♥ out of the screen like a miopic 80 year-old man's eyes and the water and elemental effects (which cause some nice lighting effects) look great in general. The landscapes and sightseeing are truly a sight to behold: Now, technical parts involve also the audio and bugs.  The game had glitches/bugs for me. I got stuck in terrain twice (and no you can't ♥♥♥♥♥♥♥ JUMP, which is insulting as all hell but you'll live, the level design works around this quite well) had important moments/cutscenes not trigger and by the end, one of the cutscenes didn't have sound or lip-sync, so it was like going to Paris and watch 2 mimes in the street discuss politics.  That sure sounds engaging... I digress, I watched the cutscene on youtube and then went on with the gameplay so... do the same if it happens. It sucks, it has a couple glitches as you can see, so don't be afraid to reload a checkpoint if something feels off. Audio parts involve the voice acting: while the writing is quite the cringefest (in the joke department), the voice acting for all characters sell it quite well. All sounds really good. Gun sounds are epic as I already said, environment sounds, point acquisition sounds, everything helps the combat (and the game as a whole) feel better in everyway. I must note in scripted sequences or simply when near death, Duck NewCum will make Grayson's hurt sounds or joyful screams instead of... Dookie's sounds, so that's another dollar to the "lazy DLC" jar.  Overall, the package is quite excellent. The game is fantastic is almost every regard. It sins on the occasional bug, the lazy as ♥♥♥♥ Nock Duck'em DLC and the humanly unthinkable price of 40€ for a remaster with slight upgraded textures (and 4K), a GFWL patch and all DLC included with no discount or free-giving for previous owners.

Disc Room is an experience that's balanced between dying and well, not dying. Each room on your path is locked away behind some minor objectives. Usually this is simply trying to survive for ten or twenty seconds but there are times when the game wants you to die. Part of the Disc Room experience lies in dying to every manner of rotating nightmare you can. There are also various special skills unlocked throughout the game, this includes a dash that turns the player invincible for a brief moment, slowing down time or creating clones of the player. Only one skill can be equipped when entering a room, though.  The developers anticipated players of all skill levels wanting to challenge Disc Room and have included a number of sliders that can alter the experience, from overall movement speed of the game to how quickly the enemy discs can move. This is a welcomed addition when certain challenges might seem too difficult or you need a little help to proceed. Disc Room really needs no explanation whether or not you're going to like the motion of dying and retrying. As a fan of self-improvement through trial and error. I loved the sense of finally mastering a room, only to be brought right back down upon failing the next one. In many cases perseverance and a lucky pattern might be all you need to survive for a few extra seconds in Disc Room. But in truth the only limit is your own ability. So if fancy a slice and dice sort of challenge, you’ll definitely want to take Disc Room for a spin.

Bueno, acabo de terminar el juego y creo que és el momento perfecto para hacer el análisis, sin llegar a entrar en SPOILERS por supuesto :P Para empezar se nos presenta una historia que comienza muy fuerte (más aún si te hypeaste de antemano con la Demo) y que engancha cada vez más a medida que vas descubriendo cosas y avanzando en la misma, uno de los puntos más fuertes del juego sin lugar a dudas. El segundo pilar fundamental del juego reside en la ambientación. Muy creíble, construida a partir de escenarios de los propios Resident Evil y de películas de culto como podría ser La Matanza de Texas. Y si bien hay zonas que acojonan mucho, conforme progresas en el juego se pierde el factor "Miedo" y se pasa más al factor "Tensión". El principal atractivo de la ambientación reside en el Apartado Gráfico. Espectacular, Resident Evil estrena motor multiplataforma nuevo y lo hace para crear escenarios increíbles y que guardan todo tipo de detalles. Si bien no es el mejor motor que existe y hay texturas que están dejadas de más, el juego rinde de sobra y transmite en todo momento un realismo sin igual. Después tenemos los enemigos principales, los ya conocidos Baker, que lejos de ser fáciles de afrontar, te perseguiran y mantendrán en tensión durante prácticamente todo el juego. También tenemos a los "Mutantes" como se les podría llamar al principio del juego. Estos "bichos" serían el sustituyente de los zombis en ciertas partes de la casa y le dan un plus de dificultad muy fuerte al juego. Después tenemos el Combate en general, que muy lejos de ser brillante, se desenvuelve muy bien en gran parte del juego, con una variedad de armas adecuada a las situaciones que afrontaremos. Pero recordemos que estamos en un "Survival Horror" no en un "Shooter". Asique no sé hasta que punto ciertos controles están hechos de la manera que lo están. Por último tenemos el Sonido, que será tu arma principal en muchas situaciones para zafarte de enemigos o saber por donde te vienen. La banda sonora es fantástica, con algunos temas realmente impresionantes para las situaciones clave del juego. El doblaje al Castellano está bien, pero he preferido jugar con las voces Originales, transmiten mucho más y al final te terminas metiendo más en el juego. Y por último tenemos los sonidos de las armas, muy buenos la verdad y muy diferenciados entre sí. Merece la pena si no has jugado los anteriores? Sí, habrá ciertos guiños que no entenderás pero no hay ningún problema. Mi nota: un 9 Éste a sido mi Análisis, espero que os haya gustado.

Eis aqui um exemplo de como se fazer um prequel respeitoso. Life is Strange: Before the Storm, contando a história de Chloe Price antes do primeiro jogo, consegue ser diferente sem perder a essência do título original. A mudança de desenvolvedora não implicou em nenhuma perda de qualidade, ritmo, narrativa, desenvolvimento e etc. Até os trabalhos de voz, que aqui tiveram alterações, como na dubladora da Chloe, estão impecáveis. O que, na minha opinião, acontece aqui, é que esse jogo é para um público mais específico, já que perdeu o elemento fantástico que é o fator de "voltar no tempo", mas garanto que é destinado a quem amou o primeiro jogo. A essência do LiS original está toda aqui, o desenvolvimento dos personagens, as nuâncias nas falas, na escrita, na roteirização, nas ações que são dadas totalmente ao jogador, e principalmente, na coragem e necessidade de continuar a abordar temas delicados, como perda, deterioração psicológica, depressão, solidão, drogas, violência, abuso, e entre outros, que deixam esse universo ainda mais rico e crível. Resumindo: só acrescentou ao universo estabelecido no antecessor, o que é um ENORME ponto positivo. Tudo foi feito certo aqui, a dinâmica de jogo alterada por conta da protagonista não ser a Max, o respeito aos personagens já apresentados, a complexidade em pequenas coisas na trama, e decisão mais que certa de continuar com a mesma direção de arte e estilos gráficos (que já se fizeram característicos da franquia) e manter o padrão belíssimo de trilha sonora. Se você gostou do primeiro Life is Strange, esse jogo é uma ótima pedida. É lindo, emocionante, arrepiante, tem um final emotivo, profundo e que define o jogador em suas escolhas como pessoa (sentimentos que o primeiro game também passou). Mais que recomendado!
