SPANISH:  Finalmente, TWD llega a su fin, luego de muchos años tenemos TWD: The Final Season. Me ha encantado el juego, gráficamente es bueno, típico de la saga de TWD (tipo cómic). No me ha gustado mucho el final de éste, pero, sin embargo estoy conforme, ya que otra temporada sería demasiado. La historia tenía que llegar a su fin, y me deja conforme y satisfecho. Esta saga ha sido muy importante para mi, la sigo desde 2012, cuando salió a la venta, pero finalmente ahora en cuarentena he podido disfrutarla en primera persona.  En esta entrega tenemos a Clementine mucho más madura. Ella piensa antes de actuar y es muy astuta. Eso me ha gustado, AJ está más grande, es astuto, piensa como adulto y no como niño, debido a eso puedes hacer que se transforme en un psicópata, sin sentimientos casi. En cuanto a la jugabilidad o gameplay es la misma de todas las entregas anteriores, me encanta, ya que combina mucha historia con un poco de interacción por parte de uno (matar zombies, interactuar con el mundo, etc) y este apartado es el que más destaco, ya que a diferencia de TLOU2, por ejemplo, aquí no es simplemente ir de un lugar a otro matando zombies. Aquí tienes historia y muchas cosas interesantes, como los coleccionables, por ejemplo. El juego me ha encantado, 10/10 y la espera ha valido la pena. Clementine siempre estará en mi corazón, junto a todas las enseñanzas que nos ha dejado esta saga. No considero que sea un juego. Es una Saga en la cual puedes interactuar y tomar tus propias decisiones para que así se desarrolle la historia. ENGLISH:  Finally, TWD comes to an end, after many years we have TWD: The Final Season. I loved the game, graphically it is good, typical of the TWD saga (comic type). I did not like the end of this one very much, but nevertheless I agree, since another season would be too much. The story had to come to an end, and leaves me satisfied and satisfied. This saga has been very important to me, I have followed it since 2012, when it was released, but finally in quarantine he was able to enjoy it in first person. In this installment we have much more mature Clementine. She thinks before acting and is very cunning. I liked that, AJ is bigger, he is smart, he thinks as an adult and not as a child, because you can make him transform into a psychopath, almost without feelings. As for the gameplay or game is the same of all the previous installments, I love it, since it combines a lot of history with a little interaction on the part of one (killing zombies, interacting with the world, etc.) and this section is the That highlights, since a difference from TLOU2, for example, here is not just going from one place to another killing zombies. Here you have history and many interesting things, such as collectibles, for example. I loved the game, 10/10 and the wait was worth it. Clementine will always be in my heart, along with all the teachings that this saga has left us. I don't consider it to be a game. It is a saga in which you can interact and make your own decisions so that the story unfolds.

Batatas fritas correndo? Cupcake com pernas? Minhocas que cospem queijo? Esse é o cenário desenvolvido e distribuído pela Deadleaf Games no jogo Nom Nom Apocalypse, após uma explosão em uma lanchonete no meio da cidade que causou mutações em diversos alimentos. Lançado oficialmente para Nintendo Switch, Xbox One e PC em 13 de fevereiro de 2020, o jogo apresenta características desenhadas, em um cenário pós-apocalíptico de comidas mutantes. Uma aventura deliciosa e perigosa está presente nessa obra que envolve 5 ambientes diferentes, com diversas armadilhas e um boss no final de cada fase. Para os chefes e chefas de plantão, Nom Nom Apocalypse envolve um mundo gostoso e diferenciado, uma vez que os monstros são apenas alimentos (com raiva), uma gameplay simples e saborizada e um combate desafiador. Apesar dos gráficos infantilizados, as fases não devem ser subestimadas, pois cada uma possui inimigos diversificados e armadilhas inéditas. O cardápio de armas para combater uma rosquinha gigante é bem variado, talvez uma lança maionese ajude nessa situação, mas saiba que no pré-jogo haverá a escolha de perks, que serão utilizados durante todo o nível. São mais de 3000 combinações de 3 vantagens diferentes que podem ser degustadas durante toda a jogabilidade. Depois de todo o banquete que Nom Nom Apocalypse oferece, ainda contém a sobremesa, pois após o término do jogo o fator de rejogabilidade estará altamente presente, podendo desbloquear novos personagens com novas habilidades. Dispare sal em um cupcake ou um garfo em uma batata frita, por quê não? Quer mais um acompanhamento? O jogo possui um modo co-op para aqueles que gostam de fazer um jantar à dois. Contudo, a obra produzida pela Deadleaf Games apresenta algumas características enjoativas, já que a trilha sonora do jogo só é alterada no momento de batalhas contra chefões, pois no decorrer de todas as fases a música de fundo se repete infinitamente. Alguns bugs também estão presentes, como o spawn em lugares aleatórios que deixam os inimigos imortais ou até mesmo os chefões aparecendo embaixo do chão. Os jogadores nem sempre sabem que foram acertados por um ataque do oponente, pois o personagem não muda a paleta de cores como indicativo. Algumas armas disparam projéteis muitos distanciados, dificultando a jogabilidade de um modo negativo, uma vez que não é nem divertido jogar com elas. Apesar de tudo, Nom Nom Apocalypse apresenta uma jogabilidade simples, divertida e que são diferentes no mercado atual. Um modo inovador de explorar o tema de apocalipse e com estruturas diferenciadas, relembrando jogos clássicos. Gostosuras e travessuras estão por trás da jogabilidade, principalmente ao dar de cara com um yakisoba enorme.

I'm here writing a positive review because I find the game entertaining and rather fun to play. Although it can take a while to find an animal it's easy for me to take the animals out as I am rather good at aiming for vital organs like the heart, lungs, brain. I could see the game being frustrating for play if someone couldn't hit those organs and had to chase down a deer that they hit. The game is definately not 'free to play' as the majority of things need to be bought and you need a membership to do basically everything except hunt mule deer. I hunted mule deer for a good 20 hours of game time and found it rather 'fun' to be able to drop a deer with 1 shot. I went on to purchase a £6.99 membership which allows me to hunt a lot more deer and coyote with the .243 rifle I have. When I save up enough 'gms' I can buy a shotgun and go and hunt more like bears and more sh*t. The multiplayer aspect is fun to play with your friends and I use the server I got with my membership alot. Definately worth a try as it's free and worth buying the membership if you have friends. :)

I definitely reccommend this game. It is by far one of the most fun fps's I have come upon. Gameplay is very simple, there are different types of gamemodes with different objectives. No healing, no medics just guns and people trying to shoot other people.

Looking at the reviews so far I'm apparently one of the few who knew what he was getting into. I think the storepage and the trailers communicated well enough what type of game this was gonna be.  I would say, as a FIRST IMPRESSION, after DiRT 2 this is my favorite game of the five. It has that 'playful' character of DiRT 2 and a bit of that Forza Horizon vibe, at least for me. Wether that's a good thing or not you have to decide for yourself. For me it's exactly what I'm looking for in such a racing game. If I want realism and get serious I jump into my car and drive to work. So DiRT 5 is a pure arcade racer now. Even the typical rally stages with a co-driver are replaced with a lot of other but fun modes. They also ditched the "Simulation" mode option from DiRT 4. I don't mind that because we have choice nowadays in what we want to buy and play. If this isn't your cup of tea don't spit in it and get your own flavor.          Some things I like The stylish and colorful presentation works great with the theme of this game. They also put a lot of effort in the soundtrack. You can feel the passion Codemasters has for the franchise. Like I mentioned, It's not  a rallygame anymore but more a 'party' game with those same cars.  Graphics are absolutely effing gorgeous if you have the horsepower to dial it all up. With an i5 8500, 16 GB RAM and a 1070Ti, I get an average of 46 fps on 1440p with high settings, wich is reasonable but not great. And than you have Very high wich I'm not even gonna try. However, there's a feature to let the game take care of your settings automatically wich works surprisingly well. Now the average fps is around 70 fps without a noticeable difference in graphical fidelity. All in all it's way more taxing than I expected. A lot more than GRID (2019) for comparison. The new dynamic weather and daytime feature where weather conditions can change during a race is just awesome.  A lot of variety in tracks and landscapes and most important, cars and race types including the newly added sprint cars. And finally there's a photomode. It's a bit clunky in that it takes some time to move the filter sliders around (it would be nice if it could be controlled with the mouse) and the processing of the image is a bit slow. I hope they add support for NVIDIA Ansel wich I still prefer but it's still a welcome addition.  Things I like less The sound is pretty good actually but could be better. I'm missing a bit of grunt in the lower end of the engine sounds. Many cars just don't sound as mean and agressive as they should. It's just a bit underwhelming.  The post race replay feature or in better words: the lack thereof. Where the hell is the replay option Codemasters? They finally included a photomode to accompany their pretty graphics engine and than removed the replay feature, wich was part of their games for as long as I can remember. I love watching replays with various camera angles after an exciting race and taking screenshots. Now you have to take screens during the race wich breaks the immersion a bit for me.      Although this isn't a sim by any means, DiRT always used to have some basic tuning options too adjust your gear ratios, suspension, break balance and such. That's ditched too. You still have your options for ABS, TC and SC in 3 levels in de game options btw. No wheel support... yet. This is just silly. CM should know there will be backlash about this. They say it's coming but it should be in the game during launch.  At the moment there are some stability issues too. Many people are reporting random crashes. I had a few CTD's too but it looks a driver update from NVIDIA fixed it or it could be the day one patch CM released today. Anyway the game seems to use less VRAM now.  All in all, again, as a first impression I think this is a worthy new next gen entry in the franchise even with the strange choice to remove some basic and obvious features. It's not perfect but it doesn't deserve the  exorbitant hate it's getting so I give it a thumbsup.

One  of the best and most beautiful game of all times, and i'm not even blinded by nostalgia to say this, i played this game when i was a kid and it was a terrific experience, and even now as an adult this game is still awesome and a more then welcome journey =D Well the plot of the game can be really simple at first, but it gets better as you progress through the game, gameplay mechanics are as smooth as it could be, the combat is simple but is really satisfying once you get used to it.  The graphics are really beautiful for it's time, Jade is a beautiful and strong protagonist that doesn't play around when working, she gets things done. Plot: The game starts with the alpha section giving a speech to the Hylians about their job protecting the planet from the evil alien race called the Doomz, there is a war between these aliens and the military forces of the Hyllis. A alien invasion happens and Jade is introduced in the game, after they dealt with the aliens, Jade meets with a strange man called Mr De Castellac. Jade meets with a rebel organization and starts unravelling conspiracies about the government to discover and expode their dirty secrets. The Game is fantastic don't be afraid to buy it guys, it is worth your money. There is some compatibility issues, but they can be easily fixed. 9/10 <3 <3

Собственно, прохождение данной игры растянулось порядка на год, исключительно из-за моей лени (на самом деле не совсем, дальше вы узнаете почему  именно) Много уже не вспомнить, тем не менее данная игра у меня вызвала неоднозначные эмоции. С одной стороны - "Вау, игра по серии Властелина Колец, с неплохим сюжетом, графоном и механикой" С другой - "Вау, это же Assassin's creed. Скрытые убийства, точки синхронизации (башни в данном случае), отравление грога" Да, это не ассасин, не по сюжету, ни по геймплею, но далёкие отголоски как-то влияют на общее восприятие игры. 1. Механика - да, как я сказал, это практически ассасин, тем не менее в этом мало плохого. Люблю я стелс 2. Графон - он тут есть, вплоне годный. Да и не на ультрах я играл, где-то наполовину ультра, но этого мне было достаточно 3. Лук - да да, он самый. Люблю игры с луками 4. Дополнения - в них я ещё не успел так много поиграть,тем не менее уже было видно, что они сделано не на отъе-вы сами знаете что Впервые я создал такой "раздел" в обзоре, что бы указать на одну деталь. Сюжет. Он мне был долго непонятен, пока я не порыскал в Вики и не нарыл информацию об всей этой истории с Келебримбором и кольцах для эльфов (и не только для них). Что-то до меня стало доходить, что-то вспоминалось само, тем не менее для обывателя вся эта история - пыль в глаза, что-бы было. Многие даже не знают, сколько колец всего, а об их создателях даже речи идти не может. Сюжет слишком сложен для тех, кто не вникает 1. Продолжительность - без DLC эта игра проходится за ~9-11 часов (а то и быстрее можно). Да, я делал большой перерыв, но даже с ним заметен этот факт. Всё слишком быстро и сумбурно 2. Геймплей - несмотря на то, что выше я написал, что люблю стелс, он - это единственный плюс геймплея этой игры. Собственно, перерыв произошёл именно из-за того, что эта игра год назад мне невероятно надоела, я даже заходить в неё не мог, на столько тошно было. Сюжет есть, стелс есть. Всё, на этом геймплей себя исчерпал. Нет никакого желания собирать эти улучшения для меча и лука, клеймовать вождей для поддержания власти и т.д.

Я наверное буду один из тех людей кому понравилась эта игра не только из-за ГГ. Но из-за неплохой геймплей и отличную атмосферу, пройдя игру придется побывать в нескольких зонах, где придется носить респиратор т.к газовая комната или очки ночного зрения  ибо комната без освещения, неплохая такая головоломка с концвоками необьясняемые сюжетом. Antes de continuar, sua principal pergunta sobre a versão remasterizada deve ser "Vale à pena?", a resposta varia dependendo de sua situação. Se você já jogou e terminou a versão antiga, então não vale, mas caso seja um jogador que experimentou seus sucessores apenas, ou simplesmente quer dar uma chance para a franquia, então sim, com certeza vale. A versão remasterizada não trouxe nenhuma novidade impactante, além dos óbvios 60 frames por segundo e suporte para 4K. O online está mais funcional também, então os pactos estão funcionando como deveriam, talvez seja esse um bom motivo para veteranos darem uma chance de novo para o jogo. Uma nova forma foi adicionada para a troca de pactos, sendo possível fazer isso de qualquer fogueira, alteração semelhante ao sistema de pactos de Dark Souls 3. A jogabilidade foi mudada em alguns quesitos: Fantasmas agora têm acessível o Frasco de Estus, mas em quantidade reduzida comparando com o dono do mundo. Isso inclui em Co-op e PvP.  Mantendo o tópico, o número de players por sessão também foi aumentado de 4 para 6, além de servidores dedicados para o modo online. Dark Souls tem uma das jogabilidades mais envolventes e dinâmicas dos RPGs de ação atuais. Reflexos e boa leitura dos ataques inimigos são extremamente necessários para que o jogador avance pelo jogo. Sua fama pela dificuldade é real, e é esse o principal charme da franquia, que testa a determinação daquele no controle enquanto usa a própria história de seu mundo para dar uma maior significado para os que desistem ou perseveram e vencem. Usando um arsenal com diversos tipos de armas, permite-se uma variação boa de métodos de jogo que se adequem melhor para qualquer tipo de jogador. Infelizmente, são poucas as armas que chegam a ser viáveis em PvP e também PvE. O jogo é altamente desbalanceado nesse quesito, tendo uma ou duas versões de cada tipo de armamento usável (sem nenhum tipo de encantamento).  Dark Souls conta uma história trágica de um mundo em decadência. No reino de Lordran, você consegue ver os impactos intensos que a maldição tem causado de uma maneira assustadora. Você, é nomeado o morto-vivo escolhido que é citado na profecia sobre o fim da Era do Fogo, onde um campeão irá surgir para tocar os sinos do despertar na antiga terra dos lordes. Seu universo é vasto e a exposição é feita de maneira meticulosa, com detalhes escondidos em todos os cantos, desde descrições de itens até diálogos rápidos que costumam passar despercebidos. A riqueza de detalhe faz a construção do mundo ser mais forte, parecendo mais real e dando credibilidade ao que o universo apresenta, deixando a experiência ainda mais imersiva. Provavelmente uma das trilhas mais intensas de RPGs, com faixas que passam a sensação de angústia e insegurança. Mesmo possuindo algumas músicas mais calmas como da área de 'descanso' do jogo, as que mais são relembradas são as dos chefes, onde cada um possui seu próprio tema que é completamente adequado ao tipo de inimigo que está enfrentando. O principal efeito dessa magnífica trilha sonora, é aumentar a pressão nos combates de uma maneira quase imperceptível. É comum a maioria dos jogadores não notarem detalhadamente as faixas em meio ao combate já intenso, e é essa sincronia que faz os combates serem ainda mais impactantes. Uma obra de arte à parte. Dark Souls Remastered pode não ter os gráficos que todos gostaríamos que tivesse, afinal não é um impacto muito forte para os antigos jogadores de PC com o famigerado DSfix. Mas ainda teve ótimas melhorias gráficas, principalmente se tratando de iluminação. Já o visual chave do jogo, são seus detalhes no desenvolvimento dos cenários. Todo o visual sombrio é fortemente reforçado ao longo da aventura, dando cada vez mais força para a ideia que o mundo está decaindo lentamente. Ruínas, cavernas, cidades abandonadas, são extremamente detalhados ao ponto de ser prazeroso observar o trabalho colocado nessas áreas, tirando o fôlego de jogadores com olhos mais atentos. A atmosfera é facilmente moldada pelo talento da equipe artística, e é provavelmente um dos principais charmes da série Souls em geral. Dark Souls remastered é o que Dark Souls Prepare to Die devia ter sido, mas não foi. Totalmente contra indicado comprar essa versão se já terminou o jogo original, já que não há nenhuma mudança significante que valha pagar pelo alto preço novamente. Caso não tenha experimentado o jogo anteriormente, ou apenas jogou em consoles, Dark Souls Remastered é sim fortemente recomendado, principalmente para fãs de jogos desafiadores, com jogabilidade envolvente e um universo rico para ser explorado.

Una aventura gráfica con mucha intriga, en la que manejamos a varios personajes mientras se muestra ante nosotros un crimen cada vez más complicado. Durante la investigación hemos de tener en cuenta lo que hacemos y las pistas que encontramos o no, ya que nuestros personajes pueden lograr llegar hasta el final o, lo que es peor, morir por el camino y seguir sin ellos.  Es un juego con multiples finales segun las decisiones que vayamos tomando a lo largo de la historia, decisiones que haran mas facil nuestro objetivo o caso contrario, complicarnos las cosas. Hay que tener en cuenta que es un juego del año 2010 porteado de PS3 a PC con algunas mejoras graficas en cinematicas. Yo sufri algunos bajones de FPS en algunas partes pero nada grave, tambien hay movimientos que el joystick no me los tomaba pero bueno dejando de lado eso es un gran juego con una historia terrible!

Press X to Not Die é um jogo indie de quick time events e repleto de humor,e nos vamos começar esta analise pelo enredo.você acorda com o seu amigo te chamando,ele diz que a cidade inteira surtou e todas as pessoas estão se atacando ele então diz que o segredo é apertar x para não morrer.nesse momento uma mina endoidecida chega e tenta te matar e ai nos enfrentamos nosso primeiro quick time event.ela mata o seu amigo e vai embora,porem antes de morrer o seu amigo diz:"eu não apertei x a tempo" e é ai que nos iniciamos o jogo.só pelo que eu falei até aqui ja deu pra perceber que não existe seriedade nenhuma no enredo do jogo né? o jogo é repleto de humor,sendo este o seu ponto mais forte! e as piadas são realmente bem-feitas,este jogo e south park:the stick of truth foram os jogos que mais me fizeram rir até hoje! até as conquistas são bem-humoradas!e muitas vezes você vai achar graça não das piadas e sim das atuações super-canastronas feitas pelos "atores".o problema é que o jogo esta todo em ingles então se você não entende vai perder essas piadas otimas.a jogabilidade é simples e basica.você so precisa passar pelos quick time events e clicar em frases diferentes para decidir qual vai ser a sua resposta,porem eu preciso parabenizar este jogo por ter quick-time events bem mais dificeis do que jogos como battlefield 3,onde se você errar o quick time event uma vez pode apertar o botão certo rapidinho para passar mesmo tendo errado de primeira.o jogo é um filme interativo,sendo feito com "atores" reais,logo,não se pode analisar os graficos,nem a dublagem,a movimentação e nem a sincronia das falas.porem ai vai o maior defeito do jogo:em uma primeira jogada ele passa a sensação de ter muitas possibilidades e multiplos finais,assim como heavy rain,porem,jogando pela segunda vez,você ve que não é bem assim.as suas escolhas só mudam uma ou duas piadas que serão feitas em seguida.alem disso,o jogo é curtissimo eu zerei em tipo,meia hora!no final das contas,Press X to Not Die é um jogo que até vale a pena mas tenha em mente que você provavelmente não vai jogar mais de duas ou tres vezes.nota 5.3/10

Malgré quelques bugs je recommande chaudement ce DLC, je viens d'en faire le tour en une vingtaine d'heures et c'était quasi que du bonheur. Il y a vraiment de quoi faire avec des dizaines d'ingrédients et tous les nappages et décorations.  Les 30 recettes différentes fonctionnent à condition de savoir que : 1) il faut suivre les recettes à la lettre si l'on souhaite obtenir la pâte correspondant à la recette, modifier des ingrédients change la pâte en "pâte (standard)" et le gâteau est marqué "fait maison" 2) 3 recettes ont une erreur actuellement : babka, brownie et sachertorte. Quand c'est indiqué "faire fondre", il faut en réalité utiliser le mixeur plongeant sur le beurre et le chocolat dans une casserole. Autrement ça marche pas. N'oubliez pas de sauvegarder régulièrement pour ne pas rager des rares freezes. Si ça bloque, alors ctrl alt suppr et tuez le processus du jeu.  Enfin 2 succès semblent poser souci : l'un consiste à cuire parfaitement un gâteau, même avec le thermomètre je sais pas pourquoi j'ai pas réussi. Et l'autre consiste à servir tous les gâteaux en vitrine, 0% des joueurs l'ont eu pour le moment donc il marche probablement pas.

En mi opinión es el mejor Tekken en mucho tiempo. Hay un modo de historia, Treasure Battle (donde desbloqueas cosméticos y ganas rango en modo supervivencia), partidos casuales en línea donde no pierdes ni ganas rango, y partidos privados en línea donde puedes jugar con amigos. ✔Fast game start and loading screens. ✔Great replayability. ✔Incredible main story and stories of each character. ✔We can increase the speed, pause, fast forward or rewind the voices of the characters. ✔Beautiful artistic production of the backgrounds. ✔It has a Demo. ✘It is only available in 2 languages, and since it is a game based entirely on texts this is a really negative point. ✘The absence of a narrator is noticeable. The combat is basically based on the selection of the correct action at certain times, where usually only 1 of the options is what will lead us to victory. We have '' bosses '' in which the only thing that changes unlike other enemies is that are battles of various stages, where we will have to try to choose the most logical option to be able to defeat the enemy but at the same time keep our character alive. Undoubtedly this is the most important and strong point that this game has, where the main story can be played from the point of view of any of the 4 characters, giving us the option to face them or turn them into our allies at some point in time. plot, likewise if we run out of '' Starting Fate '' (which is used to revive our character when making a bad decision) with a character, he will die and we will not be able to use it again during that campaign, therefore we will have more possibilities of interaction with him. Thanks to this system we have a lot of options at our disposal with respect to the course of history, having also many endings for each character and providing a great replay to get them all. The main story has a duration of 2-3 hours. During the course of the entire campaign we can play with 4 main characters, where each of them has its specialties, reputation or weapons that make it stand out from others. At the beginning we can only play with 2 characters out of the 4 possible, the others will be available once we finish the prologue. Some characters are endearing while others simply give you the same, this also depends on the path we decide to take with them, giving us the possibility to completely change the personality of some. The general control of the game is done with the mouse, so seeing the appearance of the facility to understand the controls within the game, we could say that most are easy to understand and maneuver but still there are still some buttons which are difficult to understand how to use at the beginning. We have 4 difficulties, where if we analyze all of them, there is a really important change in the difficulty, since from the first to the last the amount of starting fate, saving slots, manual saves and the choices needed for manual save significantly decreases. For which I would recommend playing on the most basic difficulty or the second, since for an inexperienced person in this class of titles you will have many frustrations when selecting one of the most difficult. At the end of the campaign for the first time, we will unlock the mode '' Explorer '' with which we will have starting fate infinite, so we can see what would have happened if we selected another option. Windows 10 Pro x64 - Intel Core I5 2300 - 8GB RAM - GeForce GTX 1050. Literally I had no problems at the time of playing the title, is not that it requires so much, but with that little it asks I think that could work on almost any computer today. The graphics of the game are not the great thing, we are talking about 2D images which have some other movement effect, yes, the images have an impressive quality and great artistic level. A good selection and use of sounds and music in general by the developers, but I would like to highlight especially the locution of the story and texts which has a very good level. What I would have liked to see, is that the story was read by a specific narrator and not by the character that we are using, because of this there are several confusions of the verbal subjects. The HUD and the interface are aspects that do not stand out too much but that gives the Gothic style that the game has, turning them into objects that are appreciable and pleasing to the eye. With a button on one of the edges of the screen we can hide the entire HUD in order to have an incredible view of the scenes we are living in that moment. I have not found any error. For the interesting story that it has, the great replayability that brings us and the number of options how to play it, I think the game has the price a little above that I would pay, but this is my personal opinion and that I am not specifically a lover of this genre. In any case it never hurts to wait until an offer to buy it. Seeing from far the number of hours I played the title and the countless things I need to unlock all the finals, its technical aspects and everything else, I can say that The Ballad Singer is a title which is worth finishing at least once in your life. I would recommend buying it when it is on sale but if you are eager to try it, do not hesitate to buy it, and you will not regret it. If there is any doubt, we have a Demo to be able to clear them.

Olá pessoal. Faz tempo que não realizo um texto comentário, então vamos voltar a escrever um pouco mais. O game da vez é o Airmech Strike. Para quem não o conhece ele é um jogo de RTS free to play com muitas peculiaridades, muitas das vezes navegando em águas de MOBA sem ir tão profundo no novo gênero. Para vocês terem uma noção listarei a seguir alguns desses pontos que o diferencia de muitos RTS’s mais consagrados. 1° Nos não construímos bases ou edificações, apenas tropas que podem ser móveis ou fixas. 2° As bases já estão presentes no cenário sendo defendidas por tropas neutras, as quais não podem ser controladas nem por você e nem pelo inimigo, logo, são ofensivas a ambos. 3° As tropas são controladas em conjunto por ordens dadas próximas a elas pelo jogador através de um AirMech principal (nosso campeão) e variam entre defender o ponto anterior, permanecer no local, seguir seu campeão, atacar próxima base inimiga, e atacar diretamente a base principal inimiga. 4° Ordens de quais unidades principalmente atacar não tem como serem dadas, a IA de suas unidades é quem decide. Para recompensar isso, o seu campeão pode ir ao ataque como fosse um campeão de qualquer outro moba, tendo duas formas, a aérea e a terrestre. A aérea serve principalmente para locomoção de tropas e locomoção no cenário, mas também serve para atacar certas unidades em algumas ocasiões. Já a forma terrestre serve principalmente para o combate, tanto contra qualquer unidade inimiga como também contra as bases e o campeão inimigo. 5° A partida só termina quando a vida da base principal inimiga chega a zero. Para esse feito ser alcançado não necessariamente você precisa conquistar todas ou qualquer uma das bases auxiliares existentes, a questão é que as bases auxiliares além de terem inicialmente tropas neutras que impedirão seu avanço, as próprias bases quando conquistadas por você aumentarão seu limite de exército, como também fornecerão o recurso para construção de suas tropas, e este recurso, o qual é o único da partida, só pode ser adquirido pelas bases principais e auxiliares. 6° As partidas podem ser 1x1 até 3x3, porém a base principal e recursos são únicos para toda a equipe, então quando jogado em 2x2 ou 3x3 a equipe deve saber combar os Airmech’s como também administrar corretamente o recurso de criação. 7° Todas as bases constroem independente de suas ordens unidades básicas que servem como mínios e tem o objetivo de conquistarem a próxima base inimiga. Vale salientar que são apenas eles que realmente capturam as bases. Com base nesses tópicos já dá para perceber suas diferenças comparado a outros games consagrados do gênero, e isso pra mim foi positivo, pois conseguiu me oferecer uma experiência nova, apesar de ainda não superar a maioria dos games consagrados, mas é muito importante que você experimente. Por ele ser free to play, e de partida rápidas na maioria das vezes, facilita a experiência do gamer e, com certeza, irá te divertir por um tempo. Mais alguns detalhes importantes a serem ditos são que seu single player serve apenas como treinamento para conhecer os Airmech’s existentes, algumas estratégias e cenários, e isso pode suar negativamente, mas existe um outro jogo da franquia focado em campanha, e o treinamento é de muita importância, pois de início achei o game superficial em estratégias, mas ao conhecer melhor as unidades, os Airmechs e suas habilidades, além dos próprios cenários, percebi que para um público mais atento ao game, podemos ter muitas partidas surpreendentes. A variedade de Airmechs e suas habilidades é boa, também tem uma boa quantidade de cenários que permitem estratégias diferentes e apesar do game ser free to play, logo existindo uma moeda cash para mante-ló financeiramente, a desenvolvedora conseguiu não abusar desse sistema, tudo comprado com cash ou é acelerador de xp e gold do game, ou compra skins para Airmechs e tropas, assim não influenciando no desempenho das partidas. Novamente repito que gostei do game, caso for joga-ló tenha paciência e atenção para aprender seus detalhes, apesar do texto extenso não falei de tudo, então terá muita coisa para saber por conta própria e futuramente devo trazer um texto comentário do Airmech Wasteland. Obrigado pela atenção.

Excelente juego; probablemente de los mejores f2p del catálogo de Steam. You Have to Win the Game pone en práctica un título de estilo metroid en el debemos resolver, sin ningún tipo de acción, las situaciones que se nos proponen. El juego tiene una duración aproximada de una a dos horas y cuenta con un acabado gráfico al más puro estilo Spectrum/Commodore. Es sorprendentemente adictivo y resulta muy gratificante resolver los puzzles que plantea. El progreso, como he comentado, es muy similar al de Metroid: escenario no lineal y obtención de mejoras para poder acceder a lugares que antes no podíamos. Lo mejor, indiscutiblemente, que es gratis. Merece la pena, al menos, probarlo. Si os gusta, siempre os podéis hacer con la secuela: Super Win the Game; un juego similar, aunque mucho más complejo y, esta vez, con gráficos estilo NES.

It's game that flyes on a noutbook with 512 mb card on ULTRA HIGH graphics with 30 FPS, because optimization of engine and server is THAT GOOD (Robocraft I look at you) while looking like a YOBA project, but for all nine hells it's want your money bad... I'll give it positive review neverless, because it's a good game, but BE PREPARED!

What a fantastic little puzzle game. I found Pocket Kingdom while aimlessly scrolling through my library, and I’m glad I gave it a try.  The background of the story is that you were searching with your airship for a mysterious flying Island, that is supposedly inhabited by an old god, to prove its existence and bring the breaking news back home. After crash landing on the island by accident, you find yourself stuck there and the objective is to find a way to escape, while also unraveling the islands mysteries. The whole game consists of about 100 “screens” and every puzzle fully fits on one screen. The game isn’t really open or linear, it’s a mix between the two since you have different paths that you can choose most of the time. There are also metroidvania elements in a way that you have to collect certain items in one puzzle in order to solve another puzzle and access a new area. That’s said, the puzzles range from easy to quite challenging in the later screens. Especially some of the optional paths had puzzles that really got me thinking. Its not easy to design a complex puzzle when you don’t have a lot of room to work with, so props to the dev for making such satisfying puzzles. I also loved the game world, its characters, the lore of the place, the arstyle, etc... The atmosphere is top notch for such a simple looking 2D puzzler and I found myself wanting to learn more about the game world and its strange inhabitants.  Overall a great little puzzle game for the asking price. Takes 5-7 hours to 100% and most of the achievements are story related or for finding easter eggs, which were very enjoyable to search for imo. The game seems to be rather unknown so give it a try if any of this sounded appealing to you.

I have been a RE fan since the beginning and while this game does return to survival horror it doesn't do enough to warrant a full 60 dollars. As many RE fans during the years I have been pining for the series to return to its roots with limited resourses, item management, limited mobility, and a decent story.  This game has all that but is it enough? Story: Ok this game has a decent story especially in the beginning. However, the ending areas just fall flat almost like the devs were just ready to finish the game. Extremely linear through the last few areas which is a bit of a let down. The characters were great especially the Baker family and your encounters with each of them. The ending just felt a bit anti climatic they really could have done better. The voice acting is good and I did think the video tapes added a nice touch to the game.  Controls: Controls are solid but the game just feels sluggish. You can block, run,shoot,quick turn,and crouch thats about it. No jumping. Your character has the slowest run in a game ever. Thats not a bad thing though this creates tension. Think Outlast. You will be defenseless a few times and have to hide ala Outlast/Alien Isolation. Graphics: This game despite what most people have said looks great the mansion is highly detailed and a joy to explore, Unless you have a beast of a rig though don't touch internal resolution scaling leave that at 1 or 1.5.  Performance: I had to put some settings down as this game had frame rate drops terribly at times especially when turning a corner. I found if the frames dipped that if I quit the game and came back it would go back to 60. You might have to tweak your settings a bit. Replay value: Ha, now this is a funny one. There is next to zero replay value in this game, no horde mode of any description, no coop modes, no raid,ect. However, Capcom is selling you a 30 dollar season pass for some additional content. There is some free content coming soon though. There are 2 different endings depending on a choice you make over halfway through the game.  Verdict: Ok, I give the devs credit for trying to return to their roots they did a good job overall. However, the game holds your hand a little too much for my liking, the puzzles were an obsolute joke minus one (and everyone knows which one that is) that had me stuck for 20 mins tops. Their were a total of 4 enemy types one of which you see maybe 3 times. The game has good pacing and kept me engaged all the way through but for 60 dollars I wouldn't pull the trigger. If you can try to rent this one or play it on steam share. I do recommend this game but not at full price. The game will take you about 10 hours tops.

Tried soloing my first mission: 1 respawn left and 2 objectives to be completed. (((Starts sweating nervously))) Jokes aside, from the VERY little I played, I thoroughly enjoyed Second Extinction! The bullets have impact, ''the dinos'' are savage af and the characters (I played with Ortega) have plenty of personality to show.  Performance-wise, it's running pretty amazing with a 5700 XT and an i7 8700K with 16GB; getting above 130fps with everything maxed. The graphics are pretty good, the aliasing could be better, but with all the commotion and dodging, you'll won't really notice much. I hope the devs won't abandon this game, 'cause it shows a lot of promise so far! Can't wait to play more!

For some reason, some old/long-term player currently whine a lot about the new update because they aren't the strongest anymore. As always, people are affraid of changes and challanges and whine about their old investment which they used to push their "skill". My review is about the game in general not including temporary "happenings". Enjoy. It's great. It puts balance and game fun and also enhances the group-play to the game. Welcome to 2019, Neverwinter. Still very recommended. How could it be not a awesome story. For everyone who loves DnD, this story is something worth enjoying. A full and rich story with a lot of details and quite some humor. The story contains dozens of hours of material and is seperated in a few story strings, while you can decide to follow the main story or it's uncountable side stories or even seperated stories. Some stories are a little overdone and contain a feeling of forced humor, which can be charming but also annoying, depending on your mood or preferance. The audio world is extremely detailed and very likeable. Even after hours of gaming the background music still leads the tonality of the game and guides you perfectly through the game and story. A rich enviroment is enhancing the overall feeling and makes you dive into another world. Based on the specs, the graphics is very rich and beautiful. Playable on almost every computer, you can enjoy a mystic world and dive into hours of pure beauty. With only a few small graphical bugs, mostly invisible enviroment and equipment, this game gives even old gaming computers and mediocre laptops a way to enjoy the world of Neverwinter. Classic RPG/MMORPG gaming elements with a extremely loaded repertoire of mechanics, items, attacks, skills and campaigns give you hundrets of hours of gameplay. Playable as a solo or multiplayer game, this game gives you the option to enjoy Neverwinter however you want to. A slightly bugged and unintelligent pathfinding takes away the fun of exploring yourself and sometimes disturbe you more than helping you, but guides you easily through the story, if you prefer just to rush through the game. Repeatable campaigns keep you actively playing and gaining fun for a long time, but can bore you out if you don't like classic MMORPG grinding. The various styles of gameplay with a almost fluid "play as you want" feeling, within the boundries of the game, make you enjoy the game however you want ... almost.

Never before in my life have a cried after a game. It touched me really deep inside, something I have never felt from a movie or music, let alone a video game. I felt what the characters felt, every action that I made had be wondering what would happen next. After playing through the game once, I found myself watching on YouTube different play-throughs just like a movie. I can say, hands down, that this is the best game I have ever played. A story you get emotionally invested in almost too quickly, characters that can make you experience all sorts of hatred, compassion and love towards them, and so many little details pop up about them throughout the game that make them - this game has everything! There is a lot of character development for every single one of them, with time the way you interact with them changes depending on your actions, and really makes you wonder how it would have been if you did a different thing in the past. The soundtrack is so well chosen for the game, it's like they were made for each other. It is so good that i myself went on to learn how to play the majority of the songs on it on my guitar and piano. The right kind of songs play just at the right moments throughout the entirety of the game, and it really adds a lot of emotion to the experience of playing it. What I admire about the game a lot is that it takes the typical teenage problems that everyone is sick of hearing in video games and movies, and somehow makes them actually relatable. Overall opinion - just buy it, you won't regret it a bit. Even if it isn't on sale it is worth every penny. You will get so much enjoyment and will spend so much time on it, that it really won't matter to you if you payed full price, which at least for my mingy and ungenerous ass is a big rarity. I hope you enjoy every minute of it!

НУ ШО ТУТ СКАЗАТЬ. Я очень долго ждал игрушку, так как сам большой фанат серии фильмов "Пятница 13-ое". Очень многое по лору фильма. Джейсона можно убить, можно ему противостоять. У самого Джейсона в инвентаре жестокие убийства, чутье и телепортации(хотя выламывание дверей с одного удара - это уже для облегчения игрового процесса). Для меня статы вожатых - это оч круто, так как можно выбрать того, кто подходит тебе по характеру(пока играю за Дженни, но она тупая(( ). Из минусов - баги, баги и еще раз баги. Комбат стэнс Джейсона (что это вообще за нахер?!). Слишком близкое расположение ящиков/шкафов/кроватей рядом с окном: надо выпрыгнуть из окна быстрее, а то Джейсон схватит и повешает на вешалку, а он уже в доме и идет ко мне, хммм, а может напоследок проверить что там под кроватью? - думает перс.  В остальном - игрушка прикольная, жаль не была на летней распродаже - был бы большой + к онлайну

Месяца два назад, когда я заходил в Стим, эта игра стоила 400р, а теперь 53р с копейками, серьезно? Мне очень жаль тех, кто потратил на Яндерку 400 рублей, оно, конечно же, того не стоит. Но свои 53р с копейками и с учетом скидки - вполне.  Об игре: 1. Отсутствие оптимизации 2. Ужасная графика, которая могла бы быть лучше  3. Отсутствие какого-либо геймплея. Все ограничивается ходьбой, кнопкой смены оружия и кнопкой взаимодействия 4. Всё взаимодействие - это подобрать предмет/положить предмет 5. Нельзя махать оружием тогда, когда тебе этого захочется.  6. Анимация, порой, очень сильно раздражает 7. Нельзя сбрасывать трупы с крыши Из положительного: 1. Некоторые моменты и диалоги в игре довольно комичны 2. Можно палить панцу и делать панцушот-скриншоты 3. Можно немного кастомизировать Акари-чан в неко-горничную или китаянку (но все-равно Акари останется стремной) 4. Можно пройти тест, состоящий из трех вопросов  5. Можно выпить чайку в чайном клубе и погрустить (тортик покушать нельзя, увы) 6. Можно отомстить за сенпая, а можно прикончить его, как Юно 7. Можно бегать по стадиону, ожидая момента, когда двое ублюдков уйдут оттуда, чтобы потом их прикончить 8. Легкие и бесполезные ачивки В итоге мы имеем довольно примитивную и простенькую игру, прошедшую гринлайт, как и множество других трэшовых проэктов, совершенно не оптимизированную и скучную. Глянуть можно, пока есть скидка. Часик повеселиться хватит. 5 Ангелин Ивановных 10.

This game deserves the "Defies Description" Award. When starting you know nothing, and gradually you start to learn the mechanics of the game, and start to explore - going from playing as a rock (that seems to have a bad attitude towards other rocks), then as a planet, a higgs boson particle and an igloo. In this game you can be everything. I'm still not sure why, but it's more fun not to ask too many questions.

恐竜狩りアクションサバイバルゲーム・・・・と銘うってしまったのが不評の原因と思われるゲームです。 ’狩猟シミュレーション’であるtheHunterのシステムを利用した派生ゲーム、DLCみたいなものとして捉えていれば恐竜ハンティングゲーとして楽しめるとは思うのですが・・・ 流行のサバイバルゲーブームにのって妙な売りをしてしまったため評価がわかれてしまったのが残念です。 とにかく普通のアクションFPS、サバイバルゲームとして期待して買ってしまうと後悔するかもしれません。 まずは基本無料（だけど鬼課金）の本家theHunterをプレイしてからこのゲームをする事をおすすめします。 その本家に比べるといかにアクションしててサバイバル（っぽい）かを体感できる・・・かもしれません（笑） （本家に比べると）ダイナミックに動き回りつつ威力の高い銃をや弓矢をがしがしと撃ちまくれる恐竜相手のビッグハンティングが楽しめます。一般的な狩猟鳥獣と違いこちらを見つけると基本襲ってくるおっかない連中なので遠慮なく撃ちまくれますしね。 サバイバル要素は単に死ぬと所持品を全ロスト（死んだ場所に荷物を残し少し離れた場所でリスポーン）するだけですのあんま過度な期待はしないでください。 ちなみに昨年末にクイーンレックス追加の大規模アップデートがあったものの、それ以降更新はほとんどありません。 プレイしててなんか変だな？と思ったら大抵は既知のバグです。 本家theHunterはこまめにバグフィックスやアプデをしているのですが、それらのフィードバックはなかなかこちらに反映されません。 売り切りではない課金制の本家のアプデに忙しくてこちはらほぼ放置状態ですね。 所持品や最高スコアなどは一応サーバ保存のオンライン専用ゲームなのですが、そんな状況なのでチートも蔓延しまくってます。 所持品キャパシティ無制限（＆弾数を自由に増やしちゃう）チートを使用してる人もかなり多く、アイテムを拾い集めて恐竜から逃げ惑いつつ狩る、といった開発が意図したサバイバル要素もほぼ無意味に。 ただ単にでかい恐竜をがしがし撃ってビッグハンティングを楽しもうぜ！的なゲームへと変貌してしまっています（笑） 24/11/2016 2016年Steamアワード用レビュー

Nioh foi o primeiro jogo Soulsbourne que eu joguei. O jogo me prendeu por várias horas, com sidequests, boss fortes, colecionáveis e etc... Mas acredito que ele pecou em tentar ser muito grandioso, em colocar muitos chefões, que não é algo ruim, porém quando se tornam repetitivos e desinteressantes pode ficar chato.  Nas 10 horas finais eu já não queria mais jogar, só joguei pois havia começado. Faltou diversidade de inimigos.  Mas apesar disso, ainda recomendo o jogo, ele é bom, desafiador e com um mundo de possibilidades.

theHunter: Primal ist ein Pre-Historisches Jagdspiel, entwickelt von dem Just Cause Entwicklerstudio Avalanche Studios. Man Jagd Dinos auf einer sehr großen, detaillierten Map. Doch man sollte immer aufpassen wo man hinläuft, denn hinter jeder Ecke könnte ein hungriger Dino lauern!  Pro: - Schöne Grafik - Große, detaillierte und wundervoll gestaltete Map - Mapgröße von 24km² - Detaillierte Dinos - 5 verschiedene Dinoarten  - Große Waffenauswahl - Leveling und Geld System - Guter Sound - Sehr gute Atmosphäre - Realistisch - Multiplayer Contra: - Viele Bugs - Seltene Updates - Ausdauer verbraucht sich zu schnell - Teilweise die KI der Dinos Hiermit gebe ich eine Kaufempfehlung ab, unter der Bedingung, dass ihr Dinos und Jagen mögt, sonst wird euch das Spiel nicht gefallen. Trotz der noch einigen vorhanden Bugs und den seltenen Updates ist es sehr gut Spielbar und macht viel Spaß. Die Community ist auch sehr aktiv, vor allem im Bezug die Entwickler für neue Updates und Bugfixes zu motivieren. Ich gebe eine 7/10. ENGLISH--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- theHunter: Primal is a Pre-Historic hunting game, developed by the Just Cause developer Studio Avalanche Studios. You hunt Dinosaurs on a large, detailed map. You should always be careful where you go because around every corner could stay a hungry dinosaur! Positive: - Beautiful graphics - Large, detailed and beautifully Map - Mapsize of 24km² - Detailed Dinos - 5 different types of Dinos - Big weapon selection - Leveling and monetary system - Good sound - Very good atmosphere - Realistic - Multiplayer Negative: - Many bugs - Rarely Updates - Endurance consumed too quickly - Some of the AI ​​Dinos are bad I submit a recommendation to buy, on the Condition that you like Dinosaurs and hunting, otherwise you will not be happy with this game. Despite the many Bugs, and rare Updates, this Game is playable and makes fun. The Community is also active, especially at trying to motivate the Developers to create new Updates and fix the Bugs for the Game. I give it a 7/10.

SCP게임중에 멀티게임으로는 갓겜이지만 친목질과 핵, 낑기는 버그등을 보면 떵망겜이다 갑툭튀란 요소는 인간경우에 가끔 나혼자일때나 공포감이 있고 대개는 여러명있다보니 그렇게 공포스럽진않음(오히려 SCP들을 농락시키고앉았음) SCP들은 공포요소일텐데 오히려 암걸리는 직업임 물론 사람에게가 아니라 SCP들에 의하여 암걸릴때가 더많음 특히 079(컴퓨터)인데 SCP들이 마이크도안쓰는건 양반임 브리핑해줘도 말안듣고 소통이 소떵이 되버리는판이면 그사람 겜 왜하냐고 하고싶음 극한적인 스토리를 예로듣자면 049는 앞에시체 좀비만든다고 가드총알 다맞고있으면 내눈이 아파옴 079가 마이크없다면 79가 아무리 잘한들 위치브리핑이 안되니 존버있을땐 답답함감이 있음 096은 079가 케어해주고있어도 문을 하이패스로 뚫어주면 마이크로 육두문자 발사할수있음 문다부셔놓고 레일건오면 닫아줄문이없어서 레일건세례받고 퇴근함 106은 처음와서 문좀열어주세요 이러고앉았으면 눈앞이 깜깜해짐 173은 테슬라가다가 누가봐서 구워지면 본인 이마 탁 쳐줌 939가 말안듣고 길치에 딴데가고앉았으면 테슬라로 잡고싶음 공통발암은 상대방오더 안듣고 자기가 하고싶은대로 놀다 던지는사람 SCP팀들은 한그룹으로 오더에 맞게 능률적으로 통제가되어야 이길수있음 만일 하나라도 구멍이 있다면 그사람은 배제하고 하거나 그판은 SCP팀이 이기기엔 글렀다 생각하고 놀면됨 물론 망한판이여도 본인 재량에따라 무승부나 운빨망겜(CHAOS)에 의한 SCP승리를 볼순있음 *마이크없이 하기엔 다소 무리가있음 *업보쌓기 vs 통수치기 꿀잼요소가 있음(서버마다 다름!)

I wanted to give support to one of my favourite games with this positive review. I consider it one of the most underrated games ever. The gameplay is rather balanced,characters are all well-featured(King puff in particular! ( ͡° ͜ʖ ͡°) ) ,graphic is really enjoyable and I never seen before a card game with such"moba traits"(minions that moves through the 2 lanes called"bridges",the nexus to defend represented by the master...). An average match usually lasts no longer than 5 minutes,ideal for those who cannot invest much time on gaming.Updates come out regularly(it means that developers actually care about Minion Masters)but at a slow rate in my opinion. I would expecially suggest this game to those like me who rely more on their own skills instead of teamplay(matches consist only on 1v1 or 2v2). Sometimes I read players complaining about the game being pay 2 win or depending too much from RNG... I totally disagree with both opinions;as I already said skill plays an important role and even freemium users are able to unlock season passes by grinding a bit.

Ich bin ein riesiger Fan, von Openworld spielen. zusätzlich bin ich ein fan von "Weltraum Szenarien" das spiel hat mich inerhalb weniger Stunden ihn seinen Bann gezogen, und hat mich nicht mehr losgelassen. ich spiele es mit einem Freund da es seit neustem ein coop Spiel ist. zu 2 macht das spiel um einiges mehr spaß, da alleine die gar unendliche welt ziemlich langweilig seien könnte.es ist abwechslungsreich und bietet mehrere rassen zur auswahl mann startet auf einem random generierten Planeten sowie einer Random Galaxie. es gibt z.b Radioaktive Planeten/Monde oder "Eis" Planeten auf denen die Temperatur -54 grad ist. insgesamt kann ich sagen das es abwechlungsreich und Fasadenreich ist, und das ich auf meine kosten gekommen bin. ich empfehle es jedem weiter der spaß an Openworld spielen hat und es liebt zu looten. -Graph1cs-4k

Очень захватывающая и не напряжная игра, которая полностью заточена под кооператив. И заточена она очень грамотно, даже играя с напарником без голосовой связи, всё будет интуитивно понятно. Понравилось: приятная графика, много разных предметов для взаимодействия и мини-игр, удобное управление, интересный сюжет. Порадовали отсылки к культовым фильмам (Лицо со шрамом, Олдбой, Схватка). Из минусов могу выделить разве что немного деревянную анимацию персонажей и довольно спорную концовку. Однозначно советую к прохождению!

Eine besondere Reise durch das Universum - In der Tiefe des Weltalls - erfüllt von Farben und Leben, bis ins Herz des Atlas. Entdecke hunderte einzigartige Spezies, die auf mathematischen Algorithmen basieren und entdecke Galaktische und fremdartige Ökosysteme. Denn das hier ist ein Spiel für Gamer, die bereit sind, sich auf ein Experiment einzulassen und dafür auch Zeit mitbringen! Vor allem aber nicht mit übertriebenen oder falschen Erwartungshaltungen an ein völlig neues Gaming Konzept heran gehen. Der Einstieg ist atmosphärisch, ungewöhnlich, spannend und man fühlt sich wie in einer Zeitmaschine die eher schwebt als mit Lichtgeschwindigkeiten durch das Weltall zu sausen. No Man´s Sky polarisiert gerade die Gaming Welt. Und die Meinungen gehen extrem auseinander.   Du erforschst eine riesigen Galaxie von mehr als 18 Trillionen Planeten! Jeder ist riesig - zu groß für eine einzelne Person vollständig in der Spanne von einem Tag oder einer Woche zu erkunden - und wenn Du der Erste bist, der ihn entdeckt hat, kannst du diese auch Namentlich benennen und wertest damit gleich deine Units und dein Konto auf! Dies ist ein Spiel über das Reisen, Überleben und Handeln, durch beeindruckende Tech unterstützt, die für einen nahtlosen Übergang vom Boden bis zum Weltraum ermöglicht.  Es ist wie eine virtuelle Traumreise in der alles möglich ist. Du folgst dem Atlas und landest auf einem Planeten mit zufällige regenerierter Vegetation der pink-bläulich in allen Regenbogenfarben schimmert oder auf einem fürchterlich langweiligen und kargen -  dafür mit reichlich Ressourcen die du dringend zum Ausbau deines Raumschiffes brauchst. Die schwebende Resourcensteine prägen auf vielen Planeten das Landschaftsbild und immer wieder staunt man über diese phantasivollen skurrilen Tiere. Das Game bringt dich dazu stehen zu bleiben, zu staunen, deine Sinne einzusetzen und sich darüber zu freuen, das bei einigen Tieren sogar das Fell animiert ist. Es macht Spass einfach mal durch die Welt zu stapfen. Ein guter Raumanzug ist dabei euer  bester Freund. Funktionales und analytisches Denken könnt ihr einfach mal vergessen, damit erobert man die Welt von No Man´s Sky nicht! Du musst ständig deine nächsten Schritte überlegen und sehr oft auch improvisieren weil du nie weisst was dich auf dem nöchsten Planeten erwartet - Lichtgeschwindigkeiten also für später aufheben! Zudem meldet sich ständig das Sicherheitssystem, wechselnden Temperatur-Schwankungen oder weil das Hitzeschild nicht mehr funktioniert auf Planeten, die sehr nah an der Sonne sind. Oder weil der Strahlungsschutz abnimmt. Du wirst also immer wieder von deinem eigentlichen Weg abgelenkt und musst deshalb gut planen und dir auch mal einen Nachmittag Zeit nehmen um Ressourcen zu farmen.  Die schiere Zahl der möglichen Variationen von Planeten und Tierarten ist zu groß, um sie vollständig zu verstehen, und zu entdecken weil sie durch komplexe Mathematik und Computer definiert ist. Natürlich sind dann manche Bäume und Farbkombinationen ähnlich, aber so wirklich stört das nicht! Dutzend Begegnungen mit der Natur und den Entdecken sorgen ohnehin schon für viele Stunden Spielpass. Wenn du tiefer in die Galaxien auf dem Atlas Pfad zu reisen beginnst, halte nach Anomalien im Weltall  Ausschau, du triffst dann auf eine eigentümliche Raumstation. Diese Personen helfen Dir, Ausrüstungs-Upgrades zu erwerben, schwarze Löcher zu finden wo ihr eure Reise zur Mitte der Galaxie verkürzen könnt oder sie beleuchten euch den Pfad druch die Atlas-Stationen. Atlas-Stationen sind riesig, tempelartige Räume mit einem Altar, mit dem Geist des Atlas ist ein Kommunizieren möglich. Viele Punkte eurer Wanderung durch die Sternensysteme, misst man nicht zuletzt auch am Wert des materiellen Reichtums, es wird wichtig sein dein Raumschiff stehts upzugraden und zu verbessern um in die Tiefen der Galaxien vorzudringen.  No Man´s Sky ist ein fantastisches Weltraum Experiment mit beeindruckenden nahtlosen Übergang von der Erde in den Weltraum. No Man's Sky ist kein Checkbox-Game wo man schnell mal so nebenbei durchzockt. Das geht nicht von jetzt auf gleich, mitunter musst du mehrere Planeten abklappern, Handel treiben, hier was mit den Gek tauschen und dort was mit dem Volk der V'ykeen handeln. Es emphielt sich auch eine gute diplomatische Beziehung zu den Völkern aufzubauen und ihre Sprache zu lernen. Sie belohnen das auch gerne mal mit wertvollen Item Geschenken. No Man´s Sky   oder sein lassen, das ist hier die Königsfrage. Ich denke das kann nur jeder für sich selbst entscheiden, ob er das kleine revolutionäre Entwicklerteam von Hello Games unterstützen möchte oder eben nicht! PR gehört auch zum Geschäft! Grundsätzlich wollen die Entwickler No Man's Sky ständig aktualisieren und verbessern, auch wenn das aufgrund der Fehlerkorrektur derzeit noch hinten ansteht. Innovative und kreative Gaming Ideen wie hier brauchen vor allem eines, eine Community die nicht gleich mit völliger übertriebener Wunschvorstellung und Erwartungshaltung auf ein Game wartet. Die Gaming Szene schreit seit Jahren nach etwas Neuem was nicht dem typischen Einheitsbrei entspricht. Mit No Man´s Sky verlässt du genau diese alten ausgetrampelten Pfade! Das Spiel ist sicherlich noch nicht fertig und dieser Rohdiamant benötigt noch einiges an Feinschliff bis es sein wahres Potenzial voll ausschöpfen kann. Es gibt viele unglaubliche schöne Momente mit tollen Sound´s und einer super epischen Atmosphäre in eine ganz besondere Welt in die man abtauchen und sich treiben lassen kann. Übrigens es gibt superviele Let´s Plays auf dem guten alten Youtube Kanälen - Wer einen richtigen Eindruck von '#No Man´s Sky bekommen will der schaut sich mal die  Playlist von "Elca", "Killerzwerg" oder dem netten Onkel "Gronkh" an! Viel Spass Euch allen in den unendlichen Weiten des Weltraums von No Man´s Sky......

is a fascinating and very atmospheric game that offers exploration along two different paths and a well presented and narrated storyline for both of them. Both paths you can walk are exclusive to each other, so to experience the whole game you have to play it twice. That does not really get repetitive tough, because they are very different from each other, both in story and in presentation. I don't want to spoil too much of the story, but it is about a young girl that takes a journey to find something mysterious, and the journey becomes more then just the path that she walks. She will either find or loose herself on the way, and with it, the whole world around her.  You also don't need to know anything about the first Drizzlepath game, or have played it. This is an evolution of its concept, and a great one at that, but not a continuation of the story. The majority of the gameplay involves walking along one of both paths (with possibilities to explore alongside it), listening to beautifully delivered and voiced narration, and finding scenic views while you wander. Both paths together will take you about four hours to finish, but if you explore and take screenshots (and you should totally do that) it could take much longer. The ambiance and graphics are great and help you to immerse yourself in the game world, the world of Drizzlepath is a worthwhile experience in my opinion. On gameplay elements there is not much in this game, but more then in the first Drizzlepath. There is a pressure plate on one path and a switch to activate on the other, and also a rock you have to break. There are also stones falling down on both paths, but you don't have to actively evade them. And there are also a handfull of jumping sections. There is also no falling damage, you can explore without fear of dying, you might get stuck sometimes eventually, but you can start over from your last checkpoint at all times, so thats not a problem. And there are a lot of hidden things to find while we are at that. The best part is probably the beautiful female voice you get to listen to. The story that is told is not always easy to follow tough, it is very poetic and full of difficult concepts, life and death, loss and anger, faith and spirituality, there is something for everyone here. The optional subtitles that you can enable make it also easier to follow the story.  The good thing is, if the story is not your thing, you can just tune out and explore the scenery and still have a good time. But if you like that kind of narration, it will probably blow you away, leave you pondering and questioning. The music is fitting to the narrative, its very good most of the time, but can get a bit repetitive if you stay in one aerea of the game for a longer time.  Technically the game is demanding. If you have an older PC you might have to turn down resolutions and graphical options to get it running smoothly. I think there is still room for optimization for this game in that regard. The user interface and options menu is probably my biggest negative point. It is spartanic and there is no key rebinding sadly, and also no separate sound sliders for music and voice. Another thing i noticed is that the game does not like alt-tabbing at all, you want to avoid that while you play this game. I personally had a great time with the game and liked most the many screenshot opportunities the game offers. With all that said, if you don't like slow-paced games without action, then this game might not be interesting for you. The walking is slow, you can not run. This is about relaxing and experiencing. If you can appreciate its beauty and accept it for what it is, you will probably enjoy Drizzlepath: Genie.  The game was provided for free and i am working currently on the German translation of this game. I also did Beta testing and provided technical and marketing advice to the Developer. This review is still as unbiased as possible with this involvement.

First I tried to play this game in German, but there are sooooo many translation mistakes - partly hilarious, but I switched to English. As I said the graphics are pretty. The controls are "okay". You can try to play this game with your controller, but this is hard. The assignment of keys is unintuitive. You pick up things with the same key, which you use to take photos or shoot your harpoon. The length of the story is 3-4 hours. I got nearly all achievements within 3 hours, but all Trading cards dropped after 4,3 hours. Overall this game is way too easy. There is no challenge. I want a game which is more like the diving sessions in Assassins Creed IV (+ hunting fish). This would be a great diving Simulator. I will NOT spend my time to collect 500 coins or 100 treasures, hidden somewhere on each map in this game. Same with my 2 remaining achievements: "Spend 24 hours under water" WHAT THE F*CK! "Swim underwater for 100km" NOPE! This is an entertaining Diving Simulator (for 3 hours!) Don't try to get all achievements. This is frustrating. Buy it in a bundle, or while it's cheap. 6/10

NOT: KÜÇÜKDE OLSA SPOİLER OLABİLİR. Oyunu 30 saatte bitirdim. Oyun Türkiye'de Şanlıurfa'nın Harran ilçesinde geçiyor, ama oyuna baktığımız zaman pek alakası olmadığını görüceksiniz çünkü oyunda Harran, İzmir'de ki gibi bir denize ve Boğaziçi Köprüsü'ne benzer köprüler var. Söylentilere göre oyunun yapımcıları Türkiye'ye hiç gelmediği için, Bilmedikleri ve İzmir, İstanbul ve Şanlıurfa karışımı bir şehir yapmışlar. Böyle yapmak yerine Ege Bölgesi'nde ki herhangi bir il de geçseydi çok daha mantıklı olurdu. Oyun sanırım Amerika yapımı. Oyuna gelelim, oyunda amerikalı GRE isimli (kısaltmalı) bir şirketin ajanıyız ve ismimiz Crane. Ve Harran'da uzaydan düşen bir meteor sebebi ile yayılan kanser hücresi tarzı bir virüs sebebiyle ölüler diriliyor virüsün enfekte ettiği canlı aşırı derecede güçlü ve dayanıklı oluyor, canlılar anormal mutasyonlara uğruyorlar. Ve bizde şehre GRE tarafından virüsün tedavisini bulma amaçlı şehre atlıyoruz ve oyun başlıyor. Gerisi spoiler olur. Gameplay hakkında, oyun açık dünya oyunu ve neredeyse istediğimiz her yere gidebiliyoruz, araç kullanamıyoruz (story mod da sadece sanırım) tamamen parkur yapıyoruz binaların en üstüne bile çıkabiliyoruz. Kötü yanı ise oyunun fizik motoru yüzünden bazen tam tutuncak dediğimiz yerde karakter tutunamıyor vs. şeyler olabiliyor fakat bu küçük bir sorun dert edilcek birşey değil. Oyunu Co-op oynanabiliyor sanırım toplam 5 kişi. Türkçe yamasıda bulunuyor arkadaşlar. Şöyle de bir sıkıntı var oyunda en başta yeterli kadar loot yapamayıp gelişemezseniz zombi öldürmek imkansız oluyor ve görevler zorluyor arkadaşlar oyunu iyice çözmeden yan görevler yapın derim ki yan görevler de ana görevler kadar eğlenceli. Oyunun yapımcılarında Dead Island oyununun yapımcıları da yer alıyor diye biliyorum ve gerçekten Dead Island'ın baya gelişmiş versiyonu diyebiliriz. Kötü birşey söylemek aklıma gelmiyor bile oyun da ki sevilmeyecek detaylar çok az sevilcekler ise çok fazla :D parasına değer bir oyun kesinlikle öneririm.

Don't be misguided by all the screenshots and trailers of this game. It's not your everyday covered based shooter, its much more than that.. Sometimes games like these really make you question your morality.  The further you progress through the game, the more morbid and hopeless it becomes. Your executions become much more violent and gory, Adams, Lugo and Walker visibly become more and more worn down mentally and physically by the constant battle for answers and righteousness. Adams and Lugo begin to question more and more Walkers decisions as they kill hundreds upon hundreds of 33rd soldiers only to realise  It takes a strong man to deny what's right in front of him, and if the truth is undeniable, you create your own.

What's the difference between this and Alien Swarm (2010)?:  -Offline Singleplayer will full missions + can add up to 8 bots  - Ok game on low spec (depending on your specs) - Workshop support - 0% microtransactions - 9 new missions + original mission - 8 player support - PVP Deathmatch  - New Challenges  - New weapons and items - New achivements So far its worth playing, even on low spec (well it depends on your specs). It has all the things that Alien Swarm fans has been asking for years since Valve announced L4D2's workshop on 2012.  This game is best to play with friends, and with additional workshop it makes this game a whole lot more fun.

Hra pobaví na mnoho hodin, a když už Vás nebude bavit multiplayer, jsou tu i zombíci a kampaň. Za mě jedno z nejlepších CODek moderní doby, možná že pro mě i celé série. Za 1250 hodin jsem potkal v multiplayeru asi jen dva cheatery kteří dostaly do hodiny VAC-BAN, takže multiplayer naprosto bezvadný, neznám lepší multiplayer hru. Bohužel za posledních 200 hodin (rok 2020) jsem potkal cheaterů hned desítky. Hru už nehraje tolik lidí, kvůli novým CODkám, ovšem pouhé nahlášení cheaterů přes hru nestačí, nejlepším způsobem je, když reportne co nejvíce lidí cheatera hned po hře přímo na steamu, to pak dostávají VAC BAN skoro okamžitě. +Daily challenge i Weekly/Contracty jak v Multiplayeru tak i v Zombíkách. +různé weekendy jako 2XP, 2WXP, 2CPT'S, atp. Příběh kampaně moc nedává smysl, moc se mi nelíbí, prostředí kde se bojuje je ale pěkné, cestou můžete sebrat "collectable itemy, ammo boxy atd.''  Přejdeme na Zombíky, základem je mapa Shadows of Evil, s dodatkem Season Pass, který přidá i multiplayer mapy (které bohužel nikdo nehraje z důvodu nedostatku hráčů) pak máme mapy Der Eisendrache, Zetsubou No Shima, Gorod Krovi, Revelations, The Giant (jdou koupit i samostatně) a potom součástí Zombie Chronicles DLC: Nacht der Untoten, Zombie Verrückt, Shi No Numa, Kino Der Toten, Ascension, Shangri-La, Moon ,Origins. Co ale musím záporně hodnotit je nespočet bagů a chyb hry. V zombíkách se stává, že Vás to během hry vyhodí s errorem a Vy pak nedostanete žádné XP ani postup, při tom jste byli ve hře např. tři hodiny, je to velice otravné a bohužel se to stává často, od roku 2015 s tím vývojáři nic neudělali. To samé platí o multiplayeru, na nemožnost se občas připojit na párty a hrát s přáteli si snad hráči už i zvykli, ale chyba, která se vyskytuje v roce 2020, kde jsou zabugované lobby oficiálních serverů a do hraní se prostě nepřipojíte, dokud všem nedojde, že se musí odpojit a tím lobby zanikne, tak s tím bohužel vývojáři nic nedělají a chybu nechávají neopravenou. Shrnutí, kdybych měl hodnotit procenty celkové hodnocení kampaně/multiplayeru/zombíků: Campaign: 60 % Multiplayer: 85 % Zombies: 90 %

well, only a tester, and not one to do many reviews, but this one is well worth the time and effort and i also don't mind putting my name to it, before release, i was on the early to late alpha versions, then early and late beta, now into early access i can clearly see a lot of progressions and updates, changers and alterations, from feedback and idea's and items which didn't work so well so was altered, a lot has been added since and the game can't be compared to the earlier versions in all but name of the game. the developers are easy going, easy to talk to, take feedback good or bad, positive or negative into there stride and in the end want what's best for everyone, a good game so listen and are prepared to alter something if it just doesn't work, or something else gets mentioned of found to work better, started off as a simple bug test and ended up more of the sum of it's parts as so much has been added in a really short space of time, still a long road to go to a finished game, but from the parts released and tested so far, imo it has changed enough to be a good enjoyable game, with only a few missions to test, you can see how the progress is going and hopefully if the same amount of time and effort is put into the rest as has been in the first few, then a good and enjoyable game will be well polished for release, it's a full and hard market mind you and not helped by some who already have given poor or negative views on a game which isn't even finished and still in making, seems not everyone has an idea and or a clue on what EA is, but that's beside the point, if it carries on the same as it has so far, once released it will be a game as good as most in the packed market place for hex based, turn based war games, and more than welcome, thanks for the ability to test, hope you enjoy the game in early access, if not, think twice before moaning, the forum is for replies and errors found, not the review section,...

This is a review of the technical aspects of the PC port, hoping to balance out the negative reviews. My system: I7 8700k, RTX 2080 Super, 32GB RAM and Windows 10 OS At 1080p 240hz and fps limit at 120, with all settings maxed to ultra, no v-sync and SMAA this game runs near flawlessly. There are a few graphical glitches here and there, most notably in in-game cutscenes, and I have had a few macro stutters (when accepting a quest, in cutscenes). Otherwise the game runs and looks beautiful. Very smooth, consistent 80-100 FPS 99.5% of the time, no crashes whatsoever.  To any prospective buyers: please disregard the people complaining of constant stuttering or FPS drops. These people more-than-likely need to upgrade the diodes in their toaster or get rid of their decade-old operating system. The Windows 7 clingers just baffle me. Only PC gamers would use software that's been obsolete for 5 years and act like it's the dev's fault the game doesn't run flawlessly on their potato cooker.

Así que ... Es un clon de Dark Souls. No se puede ♥♥♥♥♥ eso. Pero ... Dark Souls es un gran juego ... y este clon de él es bastante bueno también! Los enemigos son menos variados que Dark Souls y los patrones son más olvidables, pero la cantidad de diversión que se tiene es a la par con Dark Souls . Estoy seguro de que algunas personas dirán que es un mal juego sólo porque FromSoftware no lo hizo, pero están equivocados. Es una experiencia divertida, a menos que no te guste morir mucho y tenga problemas para sincronizar los ataques con precisión. Hay mucha narrativa en este juego. Puesto que no hay creación de personaje, solo juegas como Harkyn. Harkyn tiene conversaciones con la gente. Así que el juego no se siente tan sombrío como Dark Souls (recuerde cuando llamo Dark Souls sombrío, eso es algo bueno, pero no significa que Lords of the Fallen es malo, simplemente se siente diferente), y es obvio lo que se supone que están haciendo. Hay hechizos en el juego también, pero no los usé así que realmente no puedo hablar de lo divertido que es usarlos. En general, lo recomiendo encarecidamente. Es una experiencia divertida y desafiante.

Так як клієнтом Origin я не користувався, то й у всі Battlefield після Bed Company 2 я не грав. А своє знайомство з серією я вирішив розпочати саме з частини про Першу Світову, так як цим подіям в ігровій індустрії присвячено мало якісних проектів. Найкраща місія в самітній грі - пролог. Зіграйте і зрозумієте чому. Сама кампанія складається з окремих історій, які практично не зв'язані одна з одною. Тож, наразі, пройшов лише кілька з них (усе ще попереду). Місії різноманітні, є змога познайомитися з купою зброї та покататися на техніці і конях. А відкриті локації дають змогу обрати свій стиль гри. А ось тут вже починається все найцікавіше! Онлайн досі живий, враховуючи, що з моменту випуску пройшло доволі багато часу. Величезна кількість режимів, цікаві локації та купа зброї.  Підозрюю, що ігроладно не сильно відрізняється від інших частин. Окремо відзначу режим «операції», де відтворено ключові події війни. Масштабність захоплює дух. Над оптимізацією розробники добряче попрацювали - гра літає на ультра-налаштуваннях як на gtx 1070, так і на 1060. Жодної просадки кадрів навіть в моментах місива та руйнувань. А щодо наявності Origin у Steam версії, то тут теж зробили кілька «костилів» для Steam-версії. Працює він лише у фоні, а при виході з гри автоматично завершує роботу. Лише зареєструвався та вказав нікнейм, ось і всі дії, які треба було виконати. Тематика гри цікава та незвична для більшості ігор, що робить її кращою за решту. Наче ковток свіжого повітря. Варто спробувати!

DISCLAIMER: I received this product for no cost for the purpose of reviewing. However, this does not affect my views and opinions of the game. Panzer Knights is a third-person, arcade style, tank shooter where the characters are female anime-style German soldiers that very much contrast the style of the rest of the game. The game is very reminiscent of the anime "Girls Und Panzer" which depicts young anime-styled girls piloting very realistic looking tanks. The game's concept is simple, drive around in a tank and shoot enemies until there are none left. The battles are based on World War II events from 1939 - 1943. -------- The graphics are interesting. The actual game-play graphics, tank models and terrain look as expected for a game like this, and look pretty decent. What makes this unique is; that on top of those graphics and models, all the characters, aside from few, are young girls in the style of anime. The contrast is so jarring and so incredibly strange that it actually piques interest in the title. The actual character art is well done.  The battlefields themselves are a good size, and offer plenty of room to roam around and destroy other tanks as well as destructible objects and terrain. There is good variety in levels and tanks to choose from.   -------- The soundtrack of the game good. Nothing too amazing but it does get the job done. The explosion sounds, tank noises, shooting noises and environmental noises are the same, good. There isn't much variety when it comes to this section.  -------- The player drives around terrain and shoots down enemy tanks. The gameplay is basic and is exactly what one would expect. There are a few things like; formation changing, tank repairing and issuing bomb/air strikes to keep things fresh, but for the most part, the player will switch between different firing methods/ammunition and try to best the other tanks.  The player also has the aid of allied AI tanks also fighting against enemy tanks, and for the most part the AI is pretty competent.  There are a couple different objectives to further keep things fresh, such as; hold the point, surviving waves, and reaching certain destinations, but for the most part the player will be shooting down enemy tanks. This title would have benefit a lot from online multiplayer.   -------- Thanks to the developer for giving me the opportunity to review the title, as well as anyone who took this review into consideration, I hope it helped.

I'd donate money to this game if I could, so devs, please, donation feature here on steam! You deserve it! I love this game more than some AAA titles, plus this is free, so why not try it out for a while?

Eu como um fã assíduo de Souls resolvi finalmente jogar Code Vein, como um todo foi um jogo muito bom para o estilo, a história é cativante e te faz querer saber o que vem em seguida sempre, a jogabilidade flui bem, a inteligencia artificial dos parceiros é muito bem feita e eles dificilmente vão te deixar na mão. A trilha sonora poderia ser mais variada, apesar de muito boa você vai cansar de ouvir a musica que sempre toca quando vemos lembranças e existem MUITAS lembranças. Minhas maiores críticas vão para parte técnica, os gráficos não são lá grande coisa, mas pelo modelo ser em formato de anime acaba ficando na média dos jogos atuais. Mas o que realmente chegou a me incomodar é a física, coisas atravessando outras coisas, fica mais evidente em cutscenes. No geral, foi um jogo que valeu a pena, que me prendeu por um final de semana inteiro. MAS NÃO PEGUEM AS DLCs, é literalmente por fogo no seu dinheiro.
