I finished a full 30-day play of papers, please and found that it is a game I would rather enjoy watching people more than actually playing it myself honestly.  Doing the checking paperwork thing was cool and refreshing at the start but as days dragon the game gradually became more of a 'chore' or 'work' type of simulation where I forgot that this was even a game in the first place.  That in itself was perhaps the essence which makes anything irritating and despicable which simply aggravates me to end and makes me cringe every time I think about it.    If players can choose whether to have a timer in story mode for each day or even adjust the speed of such timer that would have been a wiser choice:  this removes the pressure of quality vs. efficiency for those who do not desire it--a luxury which is simply not possible in real-life working environments.   Also, one should be able to freely modify the key bindings (e.g., tab for inspect instead of pulling out stamps, etc.) according to one’s own preference because I've been mixing up tab and spacebar way too frequently to call it remotely negligible and that has cost me valuable time on many occasions unsurprisingly. The voiceovers are nothing but mumbles or grumbles from said characters which is palatable to the extent that such a design choice do not really provoke one's emotional nature in any shape or form.  Even if full voiceovers are simply too much budget for an indie game, I feel like the developers could have made each individual trying to cross into Arstozka more human-like attributes and not only someone who you'd think of as a mere data block in a registry of perhaps hundreds of thousands of such similarly-motivated people where they would be forgotten as soon as they cross over to the other side.  At the very least it would make even the simulated terrorist attacks feel more personal and relatable. Despite the various shortcomings, I still like this game somewhat and would recommend whole-heartedly to anyone who are forgiving of aforementioned design flaws and also possess feverish sentiment for a vividly-provoking but not quite realistic working simulator that poses itself as a plausible indie game for the masses.  With imperfectly implemented in-game mechanics and a whole lot of depressing colour scheme, papers, please is the kind of indie simulator for those lazy Sunday afternoons when you got nothing else to do and feel like working overtime for a change.

– 10/10 [✓]  – 4/10 [✘]  – 4/10 [✘]  – 8/10 [✓]  – 3/10 [✘]  – 8/10 [✓]  – 6/10 [✓]  – 8/10 [✓]  – 5,5/10 [✓] Foi meu   com a saga Monster Hunter – e foi decepcionante. Não me julgue mal, a minha análise negativa parte em cima de três pontos que considero fortíssimos em um jogo: a gameplay, a história e a imersão que o jogo te proporciona, e estarei explicando o porquê não gostei destes pontos. O jogo é  ! Sério, existe sistema de criação de itens, missões opcionais, de eventos, árvore de upgrades, vastos ambientes a se explorar, cultivo de plantas (que se tornam itens consumíveis e/ou ingredientes para criação de outros), coleta de itens, forja de armas e equipamentos, um gato companion, diversos monstros, ambientação sensacional, porém... Em nenhum momento o jogo consegue traduzir isso numa gameplay gostosa de se jogar, no momento desta análise eu sequer consegui terminar o jogo porque simplesmente já  . É tudo muito repetitivo: saia, explore, mate monstros, volte. Tá certo, essa é a proposta do jogo, mas não há nada que te faça prender-se a ela, sendo uma experiência muito divertida apenas nas primeiras horas de gameplay. Mesmo jogando coop com três amigos o jogo se torna chato rapidamente (até mesmo os três amigos já enjoaram, rs). Em nenhum momento o jogo conseguiu me despertar interesse nos diálogos que constroem a história, e com apenas uma hora de jogo eu já os pulava; os personagens não possuem um background decente, a lore é superficial, enfim... Tudo ao contrário de RPGs como Fallout, Elder Scrolls, The Witcher ou mesmo Dark Souls. O engraçado é que até a saga Pokémon da Game Freak consegue despertar interesse nos dialógos com os NPCs que se encontram nas rotas e cidades e esse jogo não. Até o sistema de combate, apesar dos upgrades e diferentes armas, é enjoativo. A verdade é que talvez eu tenha depositado confiança demais nas 80% de análises positivas, e a única maneira de eu conseguir recomendar esse jogo, é talvez admitindo que ele possa ser um jogo de   ou que não o apreciei da maneira correta, caso contrário... Não recomendo. Foram os 52 reais (valor que paguei) mais mal pagos desde que comecei comprar jogos. E pensar que optei por ele no lugar de Kingdom Come: Deliverance Royal Edition, ah se houvesse como reembolsar ainda kkk Enfim, talvez eu possa mudar a análise se um dia eu terminá-lo, mas por hora, até onde joguei e o que joguei, a análise  .

Разработчики этой игры хорошенько позаботились о том, чтобы покупка DLC для вас показалась обязательной. Ну серьёзно, в эту игру практически невозможно нормально играть без DLC. В неё скучно играть без них, в неё сложно играть без них. Ни поиграть с интересными пушками, ни поиспользовать перки, НИ. ЧЕ. ГО. Заранее извиняюсь, но мне даже пришлось как-то раз использовать специальный чит-трейнер для того, чтобы поиграть со всеми DLC! Только вот правда в том, что я ненавижу использовать читы в мультиплеерных играх, а ещё в том, что меня постоянно кикали из игр даже тогда, когда я писал, что использую этот трейнер лишь для открытия DLC. Буквально недавно я снова решил поиграть в PAYDAY 2, но конечно же уже без чита для открытия DLC. Я даже установил несколько модов, в том числе и WolfHUD, но в итоге я разочаровался и даже был разозлён тем, что при подключении во многих лобби тебя сразу же автоматически выкидывает из игры, а это как по мне крайне нечестно и тупо. Насколько я знаю это вроде бы мод такой, так что люди использующие этот мод, при этом делая лобби открытым - настоящие говнюки.

Trüberbrook is a gorgeous adventure game and is painstakingly rendered well, but upon completing it I did have some mixed feelings. I found Trüberbrook to contain several nods to games I’ve played over the years, and it follows many of the usual exploration and puzzle based aspects with a strong emphasis on the narrative story. I also found it streamlined, with a very easy to follow method of solving puzzles where the thought process of combining items is eliminated by auto-choosing the items for the specific puzzle. That may or may not be something every adventure gamer enjoys, as for many the whole idea of figuring out the combination of items is one of the best parts of adventure games. So, this feels like it is geared at casual puzzle gaming in a sense. And yet, it is not. The game is definitely an adventure game in the old school sense. There are no lengthy animations and expositions here, this is straight up “move around and explore until you find every last thing” sort of gaming. This method works fairly well as it is tried and true, and the game perhaps leans on the easy side of things if anything. Yet again, I feel like it is directed with its sights on making the puzzling somewhat easy to solve, even though this is in the vein of the Monkey Island type of games. At that point, things became a bit oddly out of focus for me. One one hand, I seriously don’t think this is a casual type of game because the core aspects of adventure games tend to be more tedious than most gamers can tolerate. I’ll be frank, some adventure games can make me sleepy and this is no exception. On the other hand, it is a bit too easy for adventure game veterans who, for instance, may have played through the entire Deponia Complete Journey and got their mental chops callused on puzzles that are hard as hell. It is situated somewhere in the middle. The core of the game focuses on Hans Tannhauser, an American physicist lured to Germany with a winning sweepstakes ticket for a vacation contest he never entered. He stays in the town of Trüberbrook and a mysterious person breaks into his room, stealing his physics notes. Your goal is to uncover who stole them and find out why by exploring the town and talking to the inhabitants. The town holds some secrets to reveal and there is more to the characters involved than meets the eye. I can’t really tell you any more than that because the game is somewhat short, with a playthrough coming in at around 5-7 hours give or take. Now the puzzles are not overly easy, but nowhere near as tough as I was used to. That said, I did get a little stuck in the asylum until I realized how obvious the answer was in front of me. That was good, and once I got past it there were some rather entertaining sections right after. The only other puzzle that I got stuck on was a code for a telegram, and while I could find a solution for one part of it, I had to guess the rest of it after a few attempts, which was a little frustrating but nothing out of the ordinary for an adventure game. I’ve seen some complaints from folks saying that they didn’t like having to backtrack so much, click on everything, and that the puzzles could be oddly unintuitive. I’m sorry, but isn’t that what adventure games are about? If you don’t like doing those things, then don’t play this game or any other adventure game like the Blackwell series, Edna and Harvey, or the Runaway games because those are some of the toughest “click, backtrack, and try every single thing” type of games I’ve ever played. As for unintuitive, there are clues all over the place and in one case even highlighted. It is not too hard, trust me. What it is, however, is repetitive because there are so many inventory puzzles that once I got to a non-inventory puzzle I was rather surprised. This makes the game drag on and on to the point where it becomes a grind to get to the ending. What can save a game at this point is the narrative and engaging character development. Provide an epic story with some funny bits, drama, action and character development and you’ve got some saving graces even if the puzzles aren’t fantastic. Yet, here Trüberbrook falters the most. It is lacking in charm. Maybe there was difficulty with the translation, and some of the voice acting was less than desirable to the point where I switched to German audio. I even preferred it to be honest even if I don’t speak German, but the subtitles went by so fast I couldn’t keep up. It was back to the English audio at that point. The characters never quite shine. Now, in adventure games you don’t need huge backstories revealed with super long cut scenes and it is not a visual-novel JRPG with 40+ hours of content to read. You just need an intriguing lead, some mystique or comedic elements, and connecting events that allow you to fall down the rabbit hole of the storyline. Since dialogue is based in small snippets, content through brevity is key. You have to bring out the character’s personality through word choice and how they ask questions. I really wanted to get into it, but I never felt a connection to anyone. I’m not sure if it was the way it was written, or the direction, or maybe just the voice acting, but it never grabbed me in the least. There were also several jokes throughout, but they mostly fell flat. Not that it is an easy thing to do, but I just didn’t laugh at many of them. Perhaps it is just that German humor eludes me, I’m not sure. I really wanted to get into the story and characters more, but ultimately I wasn’t drawn in like I wanted to be at any point in the game. For those that only play an occasional adventure game, you’ll likely feel comfortable as it has some fairly accessable puzzle stream-lining that helps to speed things along. That said, the presentation is still old school 90s style, so keep in mind that the game is not a walk in the park. You’ll have to put in time to walk over areas repeatedly just to progress and there are a few puzzles that may not seem obvious in the least unless you’ve come across a similar puzzle in the past. Expect a lot of back-tracking for hours. If you are an adventure game vet, I don’t really think Trüberbrook will appeal to you as the puzzles are simply too easy for anyone who plays games in the genre regularly. You may even finish in a single night. While I very much enjoyed the graphics and sound, the puzzles never came off as overly clever or incredibly well designed. It is good, but not great and for a long chunk of the game I felt like it was something I’d perhaps play on my phone on the train rather than on a PC because I was barely engaged in what I was doing. The incredibly long series of inventory puzzles just drained most of the fun out the game. Trüberbrook sits on the precipce of a Save for Later and Pause rating, as it certainly didn’t entertain me the way I was hoping for. The story was well done, but wasn’t interesting or charming past the first few hours and the voice acting didn’t exactly help either as the voice direction is certainly missing something. Once it got to the grand puzzle section where you traverse the set areas dozens of times repeatedly, the game stalled and became a chore to complete with only one fun bit at the end. I do have to say it was a stable build. I encountered only one bug in my whole playthrough. That was when I came back from the swamp, I was glowing green for some time and I even thought it may work as a type of illumination, but that was just a glitch to my dismay. My final rating is a Pause overall, mostly because I can’t say it is something everyone will enjoy to the end. The game is well done and doesn’t skimp on production or design, but it just isn’t as captivating and fun to play as it looked like it would be.

Missing features. Incorrect coding of critical components. Game breaking bugs. Simple grammar errors are rampant. Would have gotten a refund if I hadnt played for too long before realising my mistake. If these things are patched out/fixed, then I will change my mind. Edit: A few of the things I've noticed that are wrong; There are many issues with race traits and abilities. Xenophobic has no use. I've looked in the game files, and I see what its intended to do, but when in game it gives no bonuses at all. It is the same with the base production bonus from wealthy. With tourism moved to the diplomatic ability, the trait that gives bonuses and penalties to tourism becomes moot, and an abusable source of trait points for race creation. The advanced morale improvements are also locked behind the diplomatic ability, thus making it a neccesity in race creation. The now 'vanilla' morale improvements are substandard. With the "Easy to Please" specialisation giving 4 base morale to all panets (worth 2 'vanilla' morale improvements) being restricted to the diplomatic ability, not selecting the ability is purposely crippling a race. Taking the Diplomatic ability also makes the Hopeful ability redundant, as the diplomatic ability is able to provide much more than 1 morale. The Handy trait provides a 15% reduction in ship maintence for one trait point, and a 20% reduction for two trait points. This doesnt fit with the progression of the other traits, which is often x%/2x% bonuses or penalties, making the 20% selection (a 5% increase) wasteful. The time travelers ability has the description "Great tech, no infrastructure.". This is misleading, as all starting races have no infrastructure either, and there are no penalties that the time traveler trait gives that would fit such a description. It is simply free high level technology. This also devalues the Intuitive ability, as the 50 researh points granted are worth one early game tech, compared to three mid to late game technologies. Each of these techs provide imediate benefits, where as the singular early game techonlogy may not be of use until the buildings/components unlocked by it are able to be built once the starting critical improvements are completed. The Vigilant ability is shown twice in the race editor, and the Zealots ability defined in the game files is not displayed at all. You can no longer engage in diplomacy with minor races. At all. None. Its just gone. ALL weapons beyond first tier require resources. And these requirements seem to follow no progression, eg the experimental antimatter missile has a cost of 2 antimatter for 2 missile attack, where the Harpoon, which is given in the same tech, gives 4 missile attack for 1 antimatter. The protoype durantium driver costs 12 durantium and 1 thulium. That is significantly higher than any other weapon resource cost, especially when the Pulse cannon -w hich is provided in the same tech - has a cost of only 1 thulium. The farming buildings make no sense. The second farm tech gives access to two farm improvements, one improvement costs 1 elerium, 1 monotasium, gives 3 food, and has 0.5 maintenece. The other improvement has no resource cost, no maintenece, and also gives 3 food. Clearly, the farm with no resource cost or maintenence is the best choice, so why give the other one at all, when it provides no extra benefit? This continues further down the farming tech path, with the third farming tech unlocking two farm improvements, one that cost 2 elerium, 2 monotasium, gives 4 food, and has a maitenence of 0.8. The other farm improvement unlocked costs 1 monotasium, also gives 4 food, and has no maintenece. Again, a clear superior. It is also worth mentioning that monotasium is very rare, it can only be acquired if present on a planet, at a mining rate of 0.1/0.2/0.3 per turn with requisite techs. All of the projects (research project, military subsidies, birth subsisdies, morale allowance, cultural festival) are now gone, despite still being present in the tech tree. Many building listed in the tech tree do not show in the construction tree, eg the research coordination centre. The information displayed when you hover over your treasury has no proctical use. It shows the average income of your planets, the highest producer and the highest spender. It does not show your net income, despite saying 'net income' when hovered over. This means you must constanly open the govern tab to check your actual income. The diplomat citizen cannot be reassigned in sent to a planet. The Rankings in the Summary tab of the upper right HUD does not follow the rankings shown in the diplomacy menu. Devs haave said that the ai can rush purchase without having the amount being deducted from their treasury. Free money/colonies/buildings.   (look at the second comment). I will post more as I find them.

Pour une fois je vais faire court : ce jeu est très prometteur, je l'ai eu dans un bundle donc je ne tiendrais pas compte de la politique du studio. Quand on le lance, on se dit "wooow, badass"... Quelques petits problèmes de conception, rien de bien méchant mais bon, j'ai du mal avec le keybinding par exemple et sur un jeu de stratégie c'est problèmatique... Mais LE problème, c'est que le jeu est TRES mal optimisé, et qu'il a tendance à avoir de très nombreux, très longs lag spikes. De ce que j'ai compris, ce n'est pas tant le nombre d'unité (vite impressionant) qui pose problème mais la carte, le terrain... Là, vous mettez très, très vite n'importe quel machine en PLS, que ce soit en pleine partie ou... Dans le menu de configuration de la-dîte partie. Et là, c'est la galère habituelle pour fermer un programme qui plante... Et c'est sans arrêt, j'ai fini une partie en presque 20 heures... Du coup, ça aurait vraiment pu être un jeu que je recommande chaleureusement... Mais non. Pleins de mods sympatiques, un concept sympa, un défouloir hors-pair, un équilibrage bon à deux trois détails près... Mais tout le plaisir est gâché par les crashs à répétition.

Sparkle ZERO is simple and casual game. All you have to do is eat everything else but yourself and you get bigger and stronger. After playing this game for a while I found it boring and pointless because there was no challenge (you are invincible) and just no thrill at all.  Game looks visually awesome and smooth. Design very nice and I have nothing bad to say on that, everything done perfectly.  Sparkle ZERO is relaxing game and sounds helps to make that feeling. There was things that could be improved, but overall I liked everything in the game from sounds side.    The game idea is to eat other things and become stronger and this is really good idea for a game, but somewhere in idea development something went wrong and in this game eating stuff becomes boring really fast.  Similar to idea, but it feels like developers were too lazy on making engaging and interesting gameplay. 10 minutes in game and I was bored. There is no point of doing anything in game because you are already nothing that can kill you. Everything around feels peaceful and you are the only one who is eating things around you what makes you parasite. Yes after playing Sparkle ZERO for a while I started feeling like a parasite, bad guy because I ate peaceful Sparkles.   [■■■□□□□□□□] Boring and meaningless Sparkle Zero could be good game, but developers didn't put enough effort in developing idea enough what led this game into vortex of emptiness. Developers could make environment more aggressive and dangerous and that would be everything that game needs to make it 80% better. Since there wasn't anything thrilling about this game I can't recommend it. For more reviews visit :  If you like it join group and follow me. Thank you.

I really hoped this wasn't a flop. I really did. World at War was my first shooter game ever. I loved the zombies mode, I loved the dark campaign, I loved it so much, but I now realize that Call of Duty can't go back anymore.  There are technical flaws that glare out like putting a full clip of 5 bullets into a Kar98K despite the clip not being fully used.  There are ideological flaws like the lootbox system on the battlefield of the bloodiest war in history. There's a forced stance on political correctness that let black women on the battlefield of Normandy's infamous D-Day.  The graphics look like they're straight out of xbox. It feels more like an older title than a new AAA one. I could go on and on about this, but I don't think there's much use in beating a dead horse. It's probably my fault for having high hopes anyways.  Also, if you want to play the zombies mode, you have to download the multiplayer which is an additional 25 or so GB download. The only real saving grace is the zombies mode, but I don't think it's quite worth my money's worth to get a whole CoD game just for the zombies. I really have no words to conclude on my review. It's just disappointment and sadness. I can't recommend this game.  Bye call of duty. Looks like my dream of having a polished World at War was just a dream after all.

I. An uncompelling and bland attempt at recreating a legendary game, visibly following the modern action RPG tendencies. There is a multitude of issues with it like the technical flaws, and the apparent 'reimagining' of the story and atmosphere, which will undoubtedly face lots of reproach from the fans. Yet, there is way more to it. The very attitude toward this game's development feels horribly off judging by what I have experienced. Surely, it is important to cater to the general playerbase that exists today, but there is already enough games that do that, not to mention that they will inevitably be ahead in terms of graphics, combat, story - you name it. With this approach, the game is doomed to blend with other generic RPGs we already have - hardly contributing anything to the longevity of Gothic series. Then, what can be done about it? Gothic does deserve a remake, but it should be mainly focused on meticulously bringing back the experience the original game had. Yes, there is plenty room for adjustments, but nothing should be changed SO drastically. Gothic had unique controls and combat system, which should be actually preserved to some extent. A good way would be sticking to Gothic 2, where controls were actually rather intuitive, no longer requiring at least 2 inputs for most of the actions.  The gameplay should also be as close to the original game as possible. That includes the game balance, the equipment and its impact on player's abilities, the magic system, to name just a few. All these features are vital for the game, for they comprise a considerable portion of the Gothic experience. Without them, it will end up being a mere travesty, just a boring imitation of the masterpiece that is Gothic.  Same goes for the atmosphere, the graphics, the music and everything else. Thankfully, Gothic has seen an incredible amount of improvement. Not only by the developers themselves, but also by the fans, who are to this day interested in the Gothic series. There are numerous mods that improve and expand the original experience, and many are still being made. However, everything has its limits, and there is only so much one can improve in some of the game aspects, mostly due to the game engine limitations. However, an actual developer should have more power to accomplish such things. This might be asking too much, but it is what the game truly needs. II. Pros: •The possibility of a remake itself, as well as the possibility of the issues getting fixed. •Territorial expansion is nice, and some of the areas look very authentic, like the Old camp. •Apparent restoration of the cut content, like feeding animals and stuff, since there is a lot of unfinished things in the original game. Generally, this is a good direction for change. •Graphics. Although it is a questionable one. Graphics play a significant role in building up the atmosphere, which is a key feature for Gothic, therefore it should be treated carefully. •Controller support. Cons: •Combat system. Although it does have a vibe of the original one, it should be even more so, in order to keep the one-of-a-kind feeling it once had. •Equipment. Hopefully, the current armor models are just placeholders, they look completely different from the original now, while it should be the other way around. The weapons should also look realistic, since that was an important feature in Gothic. No thick blades, gigantic cross guards - that kind of stuff. •Balance. Should stick closer to the original, while not necessarily being exactly the same. It was impossible to defeat, say, a snapper in the very beginning of the game. Attack and defense stats were a paramount factor in a fight. If the damage is lower than defense, there would be no damage at all. It was a simple system, but with it the stats actually mattered a lot. •Dialogue. There is a bit too much chatter, compared to the concise and on point dialogue of the original. Also the fading into black for every dialogue kind of breaks the flow of the game, it is just excessively showy. •Voice acting. It is just flawed, the phrases have a lot of unnecessary pauses, and also don't always match the subtitles. •UI. I would rather have a more simple one; also the "4-directional" dialogue UI is uncalled for, it probably ever really works when the choices are contrasting to each other, but that is not the case here. •Other minor stuff. Like the technical issues, animations, music and whatnot. These are still a vital part of overall experience, which will hopefully be polished to a decent degree.

APB Reloaded это игра с огромным потенциалом и классной задумкой , но увы и ах в этой игре есть 1 огромный минус, который перечеркивает напрочь все плюсы игры. Пишу обзор об этом минусе от лица нового игрока в APB.  Я игрок у которого всегда не было проблем в плане шутеров (особенно от 3 лица ). Я много наслышал об этой игре и решил попробовать данное полотно. По началу игра мне очень нравилась пока я не пошел с пацанами на 1-ую миссию. Нас закидывало к игрокам , которые: -намного выше нас по рангу.  -даже не целятся стреляя со снайперской винтовки (они всегда попадали ) . -имеют модификаторы на пушках , на машинах , на персонажих и из-за этого они умирают никак мы (с 2 выстрелов дробавика), а где-то с 5-8 выстрелов дробаша. -стреляют со снайперской винтовки ЧЕРЕЗ МАТЬ ТВОЮ ФУРГОНЫ !!!! PROS: - Soundtrack - School Scenes - Farm Setting - Graphics - You can record scenes and review them further on in the game - Decent plot CONS: - Too many chase scenes (becomes repetitive) - To progress through the game you will die... a lot because the game doesnt really make it clear of where you need to go. - Not a lot of boss characters most of the enemies are farmers there are 3 main boss enemies but thats it - Enemies seem to know were you are even if its impossible for them to have seen you. - Your character cannot ♥♥♥♥♥♥♥ jump half the time causing you to have to complete a whole section again to most likely fail the jump again - They should reduce the amount of enemies chasing you at once. 1 or 2 is okay not 5 or 6 making it extremely difficult to get past certain sections in the game. - 6/7 hours long probably shorter if you dont die constantly. - The ending Overall rating: 6/10 I would recommend Outlast 2 for people who havent played the first one. Коротко по поводу вылетов: вылеты встречаются очень часто и это раздражает. Багов я не встречал.   Сюжет хорош, как и лор. Отдельный плюс - уникальная версия апокалипсиса (а не «была война, упали ядерные бомбы»)  В целом он достаточно неплохой, но присутствует множество деталей из других игр (например, в игре есть аналог ведьмачьего чутья из ведьмака)  Она хорошая. Пример: Но иногда встречаются мыльные текстуры  В основном они однотипны и заключаются в действиях «принеси, убей» (такое чувство, что я играю в какой-нибудь асасин). А для этого необходимо постоянно использовать местный аналог ведьмачьего чутья. Справедливости ради, существуют и интересные задания (например, прохождение   - местных гробниц)  С одной стороны, они достаточно интересны и кажется, что к каждому противнику нужен особый подход. Но на деле надо просто попадать из лука в уязвимые места (которые у схожи у большинства машин). Конечно, можно также будет расставлять ловушки, растяжки, но в основном вы будете делать не это. UPD: вышло какое-то обновление на 1.5 мегабайта, после которого все сейвы пропали

Ich bin da geteilter Meinung. Typisches Hack-n-Slay. Bis dato wusste ich nicht wie viel Blut in einen Menschen passt. Es ist nicht zu knapp. Unterstreicht aber das düstere Setting von Warhammer 40.000. Das ist ein großer Pluspunkt. Jetzt der Nachteil. Es steckt noch wirklich voller Kinderkrankheiten. Manchmal läuft und attackiert mein Inquisitor von ganz allein und dafür verweilt meine Maus an einer Stelle. Manchmal Lagt es an verschiedenen Ecken. Das ist vor allem bei längeren Sitzungen sehr frustrierend. Ein schönes Spiel, sind die Kinderkrankheiten weggepatcht sogar sehr gut. So gesehen gibt es die Kaufempfehlung. Nur würde ich noch ein wenig warten. Nachtrag: An die Entwickler gerichtet und mit großer Zurückhaltung: "Sagt mal: HAT EUCH NURGLE INS HIRN GESCHISSEN?"  Statt besser wird es schlimmer. Der Multyplayer ist mir bei dem Spiel herzlich egal! Trotz einiger Patches kann ich nun gar nicht mehr spielen! Hauptmenü? Kein Problem. Mission auswählen? Auch kein Problem. Mission spielen? Bei den Eiern des Imperators der verschimmelnd auf seinem Thron hockt! ES IST NICHT MÖGLICH! Der Bildschirm friert ein, wird Schwarz und verliert das Signal während ich mir anhören darf wie mein Charakter in feine Scheibchen geschnitten wird! Da dann alle Tasten-Kombos auch nichts nützen hilft nur sofortiges ausschalten des Rechners. So ziehe ich die Kaufempfehlung zurück. So ein Diablo Klon ist an sich nett, im Warhammer 40.000 Universum für mich als Veteran aus selbigem noch netter und dann funktioniert es Anfangs ein bisschen und später überhaupt nicht mehr. Wenn es ginge würde ich mein Geld zurückfordern-.-

Avoided this game since its' open beta. Then, a few days ago, i decided to take the risk and bought the game for multiplayer, since i didn't like the campaign when i tried the campaign on my friend's computer years ago. > Is multiplayer really dead? I think it is still alive-ish but it might be a regional thing. I'm living in Turkey and game matches me with Central and Eastern Europeans, Russians and sometimes Turks. While most of people aren't recognizable, some of them are regulars and i see them a lot (starting to memorize their names). Please note that nearly all of the game modes are dead. Like in most of the Call of Duty games, the player base shrunk to Team Deathmatch. > Is there a botmatch option? Can i play with bots? Yes, there is botmatch option. In multiplayer, choose custom game (right of the Nazi Zombies, out of the screen) and you're good to go. You can even play War with bots. > Are there cheaters? I think so. In the region i play, some players are suspicious but the situation is not gamebreaking. It's not like they run and hold left mouse button and kill everyone or they kill you from the other side of the map. > COD:WWII borrow some elements from WaW (gamemodes such as War; weapons such as Type 100, PTRS; dismemberment and gore etc.) while trying to modernize the game (and fails in my humble opinion). But in the end, playing CoD: WWII multiplayer feels like playing on a heavily modded, WWII themed custom CoD server. > It also borrow other things from other CoDs. > If you yearn for dark, gritty atmosphere of WaW, forget it. > If you like Pacific theater, forget it. Only thing you can find is some of the Japanese guns. > If you like to play a simple but fun shooter, you won't find it here too. It might be fun in some cases but it is not simple-fun for sure. > Gore isn't that good like in WaW. Most of time you can't even notice if someone lose their limbs. + Some design problems and old-school graphics here and there (which feels extremely cheap) but graphics are good enough. + If you want to play a mindless multiplayer shooter, it makes you play. + Carentan, if you miss the CoD 2 (on store page they say that you have to buy Season Pass to play on Carentan but i didn't buy Season Pass and, for an unknown reason, i can play on there). + You don't need to pay for microtransactions (COD Points). - Overpriced for what it offers. - Overcomplicated, nearly useless menu. - Some weapons are only unlockable with supply drops (loot boxes)(i.e. PTRS). - No dedicated servers. - Most of the guns are identical. Pistols are underpowered. Weird weapons such as Claymore (the sword one). - A lot of so-called features such as HQ (MMO-like hub area for players), weekly and daily challenges (and some of them are impracticable due to dead game modes such as Domination and War), contracts (time-limited challenges, i.e. kill 10 players with shovel in 20 minutes), social ranks (all of them can be gainable in HQ) and in-game currencies like armory credits (to unlock some avatars, player cards, weapons skins and get contracts) and COD Points (to buy suppy drops - it is not necessary though, you get supply drops while playing).   These features somehow makes you play the game but they also drains your energy and desire to continue. Especially contracts are forcing you to play how they want you to play and sometimes it ruins the game not only for you but your teammates since -let's say- you try to melee players in a limited time. You can always pretend if they are not in game but common/rare supply drops or other rewards you get is always tempting. Even if you ignore them, someone else in your team might want to take their chances to complete contracts and ruin your game (i.e. they can kill less and die more in TDM). - I never expected a realistic atmosphere or pure 1940s while i decided to buy the game but the skins and emotes they added ruined the game atmosphere beyond my expectations. Vivid coloured weapon skins, a lot of weapon attachments, weird weapon charms, 90's style dances, ugly player cards and emblems... it feels like an alternative WWII scenario (or a third-party modification). - Uniforms aren't distinguishable. Is that guy an enemy or not? You can't be really sure about it. Furthermore, there are global skins which can be obtainable from supply drops (a.k.a. loot boxes) makes it impossible to say who is who (yes, you can still see color coded nicknames -red and green- but sometimes you can't see them at all or they don't matter). - Auto-balance system is non-existent. Good luck playing 5v2 if something happens. Even if you're in outnumbering side, you'll get bored while searching for enemies. If the game find some other players in background, joined players somewhat fixes the problem but still, teams generally ends up unbalanced. - A little bit grindy to level/rank up, unlock new weapons and perks (with double XP for Soldier, Division and Weapons and it is active since i bought the game -it seems like it is permanent) - TDM-only. "But you played the game long enough and even found it fun, so why don't you recommend the game?" you ask. Yes, i played the game for 20+ hours in 8 days and i found it kind of fun. But the multiplayer -especially in this condition- is mediocre at best. If i say otherwise, i would deceive you. I guess i found it fun because i feel tired due to pandemic and other factors and wanted to play a fairly casual multiplayer first person shooter which kind of reminds me older CoD games and end of 2000s and start of the 2010s. So, yes, i'm playing it but it doesn't mean that it is a well-crafted game. So, if you really want to try the multiplayer of the CoD: WWII but can't decide, i hope i could give you some ideas about the multiplayer mode of the game.

Nice to see some work on the Asian front, as well as more options for political switching.  Problem is that the AI buffs are so stupidly over buffed that you will spend the remainder of the game grinding away until you run out of manpower.  While the AI now has unlimited manpower reserves, unlimited material and instant recruitment.  The concept was nice, the outcome was like a cheap knockoff anime.  On top of that it is drastically overpriced for what wouldn't pass off as entry level programming for a 1st attendant.  There are mods out there that do the same bonus parts and are free and are far better designed.  Stick with those, save your money and hope that one day HOI will get a professional scripting team.

TL;DR - Seriously? O.o This can hardly be surpassed in audacity! Years ago a game in early pre pre pre pre alpha -1000 was released (Blood of Old Old Version). It received very bad reviews (because it was very bad). More then a year later the game disapeared from the store and suddenly some news appear. Blood of Old - The Rise to Greatness! will be released. And what happened? The new game is even worse than the original one and this one is in earlier stage than the old pre pre pre pre alpha -100000. This game is made with Unity (nothing bad, I like Unity) and with something like 7$ you can buy all assets used in this game. It would take me ~2 hours to create a game with this state (but without bugs). The dev had more then 2 years of time for this? O.o Sorry, but this is scamming on a very high level!  I'm sure nothing will change in the next weeks! It will be the same like with Blood of Old (Old Version).  This game has a size of ~4GB. Why? Because alle files were duplicated 4 times in different folders. The same assets file (not even regenerated but with exactly the same hash and generation time) was just duplicated.  You can delete the following folders completly and the game is still running: alpha1 alpha1A test1 prepare bloodofold32_Data There will be 988 MB left and the game is still working with all it's functions :D And still both, the 32 and 64-bit-Version is running... There is a file  .\bloodofold_Data\sharedassets0.assets.resS with almost 700 MB of size.  You can open this file with unity and delete alsmost everything except of some textures. There will be ~25 MB left and the game is still working with all its functions.  So the whole game is 329 MB (300 MB Unity engine) and the rest ist just put in to blow the size up that people think it has content or something like that?? :D  Please don't buy this game until the dev will start working on it! And finally, there are no apples in this game... The stuff made this game great is gone :D ~Edit Alpha 1B~ After my Review the Andrew deleted almost all files and reorganized the assets...  Anyway you can delete the whole folder  bloodofold32_Data because there are no depencies from any of the both exe-Files to any file of this folder.  Both (32- and 64-bit) redirect to the bloodofold_Data folder.  This will save ~1GB (of 2GB).  And the 3 asset files are full of unused trash and stuff... You can open it with a unity resource viewer and delete them.  The whole games size is not even 170 MB :) Can anyone please tell my why some devs are doing that? Poor optimization and blow up games with dummy content? ~Edit Alpha 2A~ You still can delete the whole bloodofold32_Data-Folder. Same hash and same creation time like in the normal folder. Duplicate unused data and fake blew up files. Whole game size after deleting trash is arround 177 MB :) ~Edit Alpha 2A Part 2~ This ""game"" has 3-4 functions. Building, moving, fighting. And non of them is working... 100% of all gamefunctions are buggy... Check my Bugreports. ~Edit Alpha 5~ Now all data were deleted by the dev. The actual gamesize is 1GB (From 4 and a bit) just by deleting duplicate files.  Still you can shrink the game by cleaning up the assets :D If you clean the game up completly it has 523 MB of size but even this is to much.  I would like to compare Blood of Old to Banished because it is the most similar game I know :D Banished has 10000% more buildings. More maps. more textures/building (because of seasons and weather and so on), 10000000% more content and the size of the game is 250MB.

Although Warhorse studios did a great job developing a master piece game, i can't recommend it to anyone on its current state. I thought buying it one year later would give me a better experience but i was wrong. Kingdom Come: Deliverance delivers a huge realistic experience in a truly amazing and beautiful open world, located in the holy roman empire, on the 1400s. This game offers an experience i was waiting for years, while playing the game you will have to learn several things in order to become stronger. Henry, our character, learns how to read, fight, run, cook, haggle, persuade, hunt, alchemy, he needs to wash himself, etc. Your choices matter, and how you deal with things can change the course of actions. Altho it gives everything i was dreaming for, many issues are destroying my overall experience. First of all, the optimization. No matter if i set things to low, high, medium, very high, or ultra, i always get the same performance, many times i m having 70 fps, and from nowhere in some places, they drop to 15/20, and even if i set everything to low, they keep staying low. People say it is CPU intensive, but i never saw my cpu reaching higher than 60% of usage. The Combat? is great, but is so unfinished and unpolished that makes me think that they never tested this game. Your opponents never seems to lose stamina, they counter attack you constantly, and i dont ever felt i was winning a duel. I found so many bugs that made me rage. Invisible walls, solid bushes, solid leafs, there were so many stairs with hidden walls, i even found myself bellow the map while jumping thru rocks and other things. I found myself stuck several times in rocks, walls, holes while fighting. Altho i love this game, i spent more time trying to fix things than actually playing an unpolished game. Voice acting is good for me, but the animations are cringe. I even found missing Audio in several quests. Cant recommend this game on its current state, to many issues they never fixed.
I regret the day that I bought this game.

Когда я играл в это "Произведение искусства", меня не покидал один единственный вопрос : Как это говно могли сравнивать и ставить на один уровень с Ведьмаком 3? В этом "Шедевре" самые унылые квесты вообще. Все квесты заключаются в следующем: принеси мне это, убей того, найди в пещере ну и конечно классика:"Еще одно поселение нуждается в твоей помощи"...  Все персонажи скучные и тупые, сюжет неинтересный с натянутым недоантагонистом, интересных локаций нет. Единственное, что могло спасти эту игру были пользовательские моды, но "одаренные" разработчики сделали их платными.  Так или иначе, игра работает по идиотской системе " развлеки себя сам", однако мир скучен и не интересен, поэтому и развлекаться то нечем...

Worst community in a game I've ever seen... and I just came from League of Legends - now that says something. It seems as though every player just doesn't care about anyone. If you're grinding at a decent location, you're either going to get karma bombed by a lower level (who even if you kill they just come back because there's no real punishment by being PK'd) or get killed by a higher leveled/more geared player who thinks they're a saint because they're more powerful than the majority in a video game. It doesn't matter if you were there first, if you're new, or you have daily grinding hour on - no one cares. Let's say you can defend your grinding position... more than likely the opposer(s) are simply going to declare war on your guild so they don't lose karma by slaughtering you and your people. Guild wars are a joke and consists more of pathetic drama than you think. Here's the question: How do the creators expect the weak to become stronger if the strong keep taking from them? Morally, this is wrong and pathetic. It's all fun in games for Olvia servers (safe servers for those who just started), but when the time is up, you have to face the real world in the real servers where the weak scatter around to pick up scraps like starving scavengers and most of the strong feed off everything they can because they're greedy selfish pricks. I understand I'm going on and on about this, but I'm trying to paint an image. Yeah, I know there's a lot more to the game other than grinding but if you want to become stronger, grinding is the way to go.  I'm merely writing this review not in hopes to review every aspect and feature of the game (because there's already enough reviews for that), but to bring light on this topic and expose the terrible community.  As my recommendation stands, I do not recommend this to the average gamer. Don't waste your time. Although, if Black Desert Online really peaks your interest, then go ahead and prepare for the worst on the road of growth where RNG may also deterimine your fate. May RNGesus be with you. **EDIT - I feel like I need to add in the fact that Black Desert Online is still quite new, especially to North America. There's a lot of upcoming content and changes, so it's safe to expect the game will become better through time.

«I'M HERE JUST FOR GAS!» Gamers got a typical open world under the laws of Ubisoft, although in fact Warner Bros. A huge territory, divided into zones, staged production story missions, a crazy amount of additional tasks and markers in the district. Most of the time you have to travel by car, periodically going out to smash someone’s face or pick up a canister of gasoline. Move on the plot, memorizing relationships with characters, watching videos, listening to dialogs - you may not even think about it. The script takes several hours to complete. In addition, the story is simply disgusting: pathetic attempts at drama are not able to cause at least some emotions, and most of the game in general is simply the hero’s path to Gastown, the local gasoline capital.  The plot of the game is nothing special: Before us is a typical episode that begins nowhere and ends with nothing. Max was beaten and the car was taken away, so he has to join forces with a crazy hunchback named Tinsmith. Together, the heroes want to assemble a «Masterpiece» - the best car ever created. Cashgrabber par excellence. Entweder man kauft sich Waffen oder Warframes (sowas wie Klassen mit anderen Fähigkeiten) für Echtgeld oder man muss den Bauplan dafür in zig Missionen erfarmen. Um diesen dann zu nutzen muss man wieder Baupläne für Einzelteile in zig Missionen erfarmen. Und das ist aber Zufall und man bekommt gern eher was für andere Waffen oder Warframes und nicht für das was man will. Für diese Einzelteile braucht man dann noch Ressourcen, die man in Missionen oder auf Planeten erfarmen muss. Diese muss man aber oft noch veredeln. Dafür braucht man... na? Baupläne. Die bekommen man aber nur, wenn man einen bestimmten Ruf erarbeitet hat. Dafür muss man zig Missionen erfüllen. Aber nicht nur auf einem Planeten und einer Fraktion, sondern bei mehreren Fraktionen. Und um diese Planeten zu erreichen, muss man zig Missionen absolvieren und Quests abschließen. Und das alles nur für eine neue Warframe. Um mal eine Relation zu geben. Ich habe in ~100 Stunden zwar zig Baupläne für zig Einzelteile verschiedene Warframes aber ich habe es nicht geschafft eine einzige Warframe zu bauen. (Ich hab aber auch nicht 100 Stunden konzentriert damit verrbacht eine bestimmte Mission 37 mal am Stück zu spielen um einen Bauplan für ein Einzelteil einer Frame "garantiert" zu bekommen und das dann für 3 verschiedene Einzelteile). Also entweder man verbringt unzählige Stunden damit einzelne Missionen 20-50 mal am Stück zu speilen in der Hoffnung die Baupläne für EInzelteile zu erfarmen, oder man gibt einfach direkt Echtgeld aus und hat das ganze in 5 Minuten.  Und den Machern geht es auch nur ums Geld. Sie verschwenden keine zeit darin, dem Spieler Infos zu geben. Ihr braucht verarbeitete Ressurce XYZ? Kauft sie doch einfach für Echtgeld! Ach ihr wollt sie herstellen? Ja, dann sucht mal bei Google oder bei YouTube Infos wo ihr sie herbekommt. Im Spiel werdet ihr diese Infos nicht bekommen. Dafür aber regelmäßig neue Warframes und Waffen, die ihr euch kaufen... ehm.. "erarbeiten" könnt. Infos einprogrammieren würde aber Zeit kosten, die man in die Entwicklung neues Bezahlcontent stecken könnte

O jogo é bom - QUANDO FUNCIONA! BLACK SCREEN OF DEATH nesse jogo é CONSTANTE! Meu filho joga muito, adora, e eu recomendaria sem pensar duas vezes. SE NÃO TRAVASSE O TEMPO TODO! E basta olhar na guia de discussão do jogo que o problema não é só meu. Esse jogo só roda no Windows XP (então se você tem um computador com Windows XP, compre e jogue enquanto não atualizar!) - Se você tem Windows 7 ou superior, travará, mesmo no modo de compatibilidade! Os sintomas são: Você joga um número aleatório de fases muito bem. Aí dá um bug na música que ela entra em loop. Você tem certeza que quando acabar a fase (e fizer o save automático), o jogo travará e não voltará mais, tem que ir no gerenciador de tarefas e finalizar o processo! É um jogo antigo, a resolução não chega nem a HD, e o jogo trava sem parar. Mas se mesmo assim você topa esse sofrimento, o jogo te dará bons momentos de corrida com direito a manobras (derrapadas, saltos sobre obstáculos, andar em duas rodas, andar de costas, giros, etc., manobras essas que dão "nitro" pra você usar depois, e se você acumular 4 ainda ganha um escudo de invulnerabilidade). Normalmente as missões são de corrida (com ou sem armas), sobrevivência (siga pegando itens pra se manter com escudo e sobreviva) ou caça (procure os carros vilões e atire neles). As fases são fiéis a cenários do jogo, e o melhor, é dublado! Tem TODOS elementos pra eu dar uma avaliação excelente, menos o elemento principal: FUNCIONAR! E os desenvolvedores? Nem imagino como entrar em contato! Jogo abandonado! Por um jogo que não trave o tempo todo, minha avaliação é negativa!

Вообще, как бы сильно я ни холил и лелеял RPG Maker, у Steam'a есть хобби - проверять мою любовь на прочность. На каждый   на каждую   можно найти целый вагон и маленькую тележку игорей с дефолтным OST'ом, дефолтными спрайтами и такой же дефолтной jRPG'шной боевкой без каких-либо признаков тактики и/или вариативности. Туева туча тупых троглодитов с огромным удовольствием возьмет в свои волосатые руки RPG Maker, жахнет по нему пару раз чем-то увесистым и отправит свой полученный кусок индусского кода без багов, но с фичами прямиком   на тарелочку, попутно добавляя  .  Порой за этот хлеб по-пахомски берут деньги. Порой, дабы мотивировать   к передаче денежки из Вашего кармана в карман разработчика, в ход идут такие хитрости как карточки, здоровенные скидончики и положительные «отзывы», написанные людьми за халявный доступ за день до релиза. The Chosen же пошла чуть дальше и добавила к вышеперечисленным трюкам рекламу с использованием женских прелестей. Да, в самой игре героини ходят в бикини 24/7, их даже раздевать не надо!  Напротив, я даже пытался окутать их в самый толстый слой брони, но всё тщетно - и в бою, и в катсценах они ВСЕГДА ходят в бикини, даже по зимним биомам. Иными словами, здесь груди используются лишь для привлечения внимания потенциального покупателя, не более. Но я отвлекся. Впрочем, как бы сильно я ни хотел кинуть редиской и стукнуть зубочисткой по всем недостаткам  , сделать это красиво и без занудства - задача практически невыполнимая. Корень всех зол лежит в том, что эта игра – дефолтная RPG на РПГ Maker’e. Здесь нету хоть какой-то сложности, погоня за макгаффином вместо сюжета, и совершенно бесхарактерные персонажи, чьё существование оправдывается лишь необходимостью толкать сюжет дальше. Однако сколько уже подобных творческих потугов мы повидали на своем веку, неужели нам нужно обсасывать и этот? Я считаю, что нет. Поэтому прошу  , воспринимайте этот текст не столько как негативный обзор, сколько как крик души против использования RPG Maker’а в качестве конвейера для сборки предустановленных ассетов с целью набить денежку. Накипело, что поделать ¯\_(ツ)_/¯ Пейте воду --Танкист

Judging by the first two episodes (If you can call them episodes. TT shortened the episodes by about 50% for this game) this game is a complete disappointment to lots of TTG TWD fans, and here's why... As TellTale clearly states in all of their point and click games, "The story is tailored by how you play". In the previous two Walking deads, this was somewhat true, meaning that the choices you made affected the gameplay or how the story turned out, but for the most part it's just an illusion of choice. This really becomes clear to everyone in the FIRST EPISODE of this new installment. If you played the previous two seasons of TWD, or just the second season, you know that in the finale,   At the end of season 2 you have 4 possible endings,   All of these endings mean ♥♥♥♥♥♥♥♥♥ in the 3rd season,  Ok, you play the first two seasons of a game, where in both of those games the main character is Clementine. Even in season one when you play as Lee, the whole game is based around protecting her and being a father figure to her. And in the second season, you play and survive as her. These seasons are Clem's story, and nobody else's. She has been the main focus the entire game. Then TellTale releases a third season, and everyone is excited to play more Clem and get more of HER story, right? I mean, she is in the game so that would only make sense, right? Wrong. Despite TT listing her as a "Co Playable Character" and advertising the game much like Tales From the Borderlands, you hardly play as Clem in this game at all, and the only time you do is in flashbacks, to show you what happened and how TellTale is too lazy to continue on their multiple endings pathway that they set back in S2. They made a completely new character, Javi, and you learn his story and his family's story in the first 10 MINUTES OF GAMEPLAY. The new characters in this game, including Javi's family are, in my opinion, hands down THE most unlikable characters in any TellTale game I've ever played. I care 0 about them all. Javi is the only likable one other than a couple, Tripp and Eleanor. Now let me tell you why they did this. TellTale made all these new characters and a completely new story for us to learn about to make us completely forget about the multiple endings that they did in S2. No matter what ending you chose, no matter what any of your choices were in either of the previous seasons, the game will still be the exact same, other than the pathetic flashbacks. TellTale was too lazy to even make the first two episodes different depending on your choices, or hell, even the first damn episode. And that is the main reason this game fails. If I remember correctly(I do) the episodes in the first and second season of TWD and most other TTG games were around an hour and a half to two hours for ONE episode. Now, with The New Frontier, TT decided to release both the first and second episodes at once, totalling about 120 MINUTES OF PLAYTIME. TT knew damn well that the episodes were way too short, thus they release two at once to make the game seem longer. They even named the first two episodes "Ties That Bind" Parts 1 and 2. Let me just put this into perspective for you. The first two episodes of this game are about 20 minutes longer than ONE SINGLE EPISODE of the original Walking Dead. They think we're retarded, guys. TellTale's illusion of choice has been something that they have been doing all along, but it has never been this bad. They were very lazy with this game and it shows. The new characters are, for the most part, all unlikable and completely disposable as they have little to no backstory to them at all. TellTale only made a complete new set of characters to get our minds away from the multiple endings of season 2 so they wouldn't have to worry about making the many different pathways, like their games are advertised as having. You only play as Clem in flashbacks and this isn't her story. We spent two seasons building up this character from helpless to a complete badass and are expected to toss it to the side and roll out the red carpet for Javi and his family of incompetent and unlikable characters.

+Full Screen/Windowed and Resolution change only on Title Screen. +No ads in game even if there is a setting in Permissions regarding personalized ads. +Payment seems to be tied to Steam wallet, i may be wrong on this. +Capped at 60 FPS. Tried with graphic effects on max and min. Smooth mode ON = 60 FPS, OFF = 30 FPS. +No crashes like on emulator, if this happens i will update this. +Fast loading time. +Controller remapping can be done with Steam Big Picture Mode. +Remapping for K+M added in version 11.1 -Characters Artwork/Assets are not scaled with your resolution, they need to update them for Steam. Assets were made for phones resolution, not for 4k or 1080p desktop resolution. -Game icon/shortcut seems to be pixelated, right click on shortcut>Properties>Change Icon and go to Steam\steamapps\common\BLEACH Brave Souls and select the game to fix it, it's going to be much clear. -Your character may sometimes be stuck moving in one direction, this may be tied to a controller connected at the same time when playing with M+K, so just remove it if you face this. Regarding emulators, what you will be missing playing this on PC? Ads, controls remapping, slow loading time, crashes, GPU and CPU over 60% or at 100%, Google Play Data Link. Одна из самых отвратительных игр, которые я видел. Управление непонятное и неудобное. Из-за непонятного управелния корабль можно запросто разбить как при взлёте, так и при посадке. Интерфейс маленький, непонятный и неудобный. При общем убожестве графики интерфейс жутко лагает. Про отвратительную графику тоже могу написать. Перелёт из точки А в точку Б занимает очень много времени, во время которого ничего не происходит. Сидишь как дурак и пялишься в экран, 90% которого занимает небо.

Мир цистерн, он же минская помойка. Что мы имеем из плюсов? Довольно быстрые бои, легкую прокачку, постоянные ивенты, нулевое влияние доната. Через мобильное приложение можно по 50 золота в день фармить, а это 2-4 танка 8 уровня или танк 9-10 уровня бесплатно за год. Нет арты и прочего хлама из "оригинальной помойки, которая в разы хуже" А что по минусам? Главный минус, который стоит в основе всех других минусов - аудитория игра. Играть не умеют, вечно ноют, в любом сообществе по игре сплошное нытьё. Раньше события были на скилл или старание, сейчас 90% ивентов сопровождаются условием "Победи", что совсем не показывает скилл. Ты можешь настрелять больше, чем вся команда вместе взятая, но при проигрыше ты ничего не получишь, а Петя сыграет с 0 урона и получит прогресс ивента. Ивенты частые, никакущие, аудитория всегда ноет. Еще одно следствие нытья - начали творить хрень. У игры огромный потенциал по классам, технике и так далее. А что ребяткам надо? Фугасы, бутылки, всё из "оригинала". Сделать копию, плагиат. И проблема в том, что Варгеи идут на поводу. Нерфят всё, что хоть как-то выделяется от типичных "бутылок" и унылого говна, так как бедным Иванам трудно против них играть. И вводят выдуманный хлам. Весело наблюдать за нытьём о неисторичности некоторых платных танков, при этом параллельно выпрашивают другие выдуманные танки из "оригинала", считая, чтто они историчные. Польский тяжелый танк конечно же историчнее, чем крашеный историчный совок. Ведь совок продается, а это всё, неисторично. А бесплатно хоть плазмаганы можно добавлять, главное чтобы они были из "большого брата". Еще одна особенность нашей аудитории - вечные иллюзии о том, что основной показатель скилла игрока - процент побед. Да, процент. %. Побед. И они постоянно выпрашивают баланс по этому проценту,, считая, что он есть во всех нормальных играх. У игры хороший потенциал, но всё портит аудитория. Она могла бы не влиять на прогресс, но в компании работают такие же крестьяне, выходцы из деревень. как и их аудитория. Поэтому они делают всё для игроков. А игроки неадекватны по максимуму, в той же доте и кс люди поадекватнее будут.

The game is really pretty and a fun concept. However, playing hunters really isn't fun unless you're playing with a four-stack. You can unlock all 15 of the hunters/monsters fairly quickly, and once you do the progression effectively stops minus  some generic damage/cooldown upgrades. The game is buggy, I regularly encounter games where the monster gets stuck in the terrain somehow. A week in it's already difficult to find matchmaking games. The last time I tried playing with a three I went two rounds with an AI monster and trapper, eventually giving up because the AI trapper refused to use their dome and we were unable to catch the monster. Then you're stuck with boring games where you don't find the monster until they hit level three and you can't fight him anymore, or the ones where you immediately trap and kill him. The game is fun for a while if you have enough people to play with, but I definitely wouldn't recommend at the $60 price tag. Wait till it drops till ten then buy it with a bunch of friends, hopefully a sale will also get some people back in matchmaking.

Доброго времени суток дорогие любители хардкорного выживания и крафтинга. Сегодня у нас в обзоре игра именно про это. Никому, или почти никому не известная, к счастью для них, игра Day One : Garry's Incident. Она повествует нам о тяжелой судьбе обычного незадачливого частного пилота. И-за неудач в личной жизни наш герой пристратился к алкоголю. Это в какой то мере роднит игру с Макс Пейном...но к сожалению на этом сходства у этих игр заканчиваются. Потерпев самолетокрушение, или авиакатастрофу, уж как вам удобней. Наш герой попадает в плен диких зулусов. Которые без каких либо на то причин решают принести его в жертву. А что, это ведь именно то чем они занимаются в своих пещерах, разве нет? Но наш протаганист оказался хитрее...и просто разорвал свои оковы, надавал в щи главному зулусу и сбежал. Тут сразу хочется отметить боевую систему вместе с анимацией - они ужасны, настолько что вам уже на этом моменте захочется выключить игру. Ну ежели вы этого не сделаете то после побега  игра порадует вас замыленной графикой, линейными локациями, убогими квестами типа - принеси мне немного шкуры животного а я дам тебе за это пистолет 9мм калибра. (Откуда у зулусов огнестрельное оружие, хотя сами они сражаются деревяными мечами???) Но самое страшное не это....а баги...игра настолько сыра и недоделанная что заслуживает называться пре-альфой, а не готовым продуктом. Тут и застревания в текстурах. Полет в бесконечное никуда после загрузки....и это все в первый час игры. Я уверен что дальше - лучше...но моих сил играть еще в это шедевральное творение больше нет. Покупать игру стоит только по 99% скидке. И то при условии что у вас есть все игры стима и эта нужна лишь для коллекции. P.S: Из справедливости все же стоит отметить несколько плюсов этой игры. Во первых это милые обезьянки, которые убегают от вас, а потом швыряются кокосами. Выглядет очень забавно.Особенно забавно потом бегать за ними с ножом и зарубывать до смерти=) Ну а самый главный плюс этой игры, это то  что до сих пор не вышла Day Two : Garry's Incident

Just today I saw the paradox support rep. refused the request from a Chinese player that supporting official Chinese. 就在今天，我看到了P社客服对一位玩家的官方中文请求表达了拒绝。 They said: 他们说： "We sell our games to people in many many countries in the world, we can't localise for all of them. Aside from China we've had similar comments (in some cases demands) from Turkey, Japan, Russia, and others I can't think of right now." “我们游戏卖到了全世界，我们不能为每个国家都推出其语言。除了中国，我们还有来自土耳其，日本，俄罗斯以及其他我现在说不上来的国家的类似的评论（有时是需求）” "The answer is always that our marketing department constantly evaluates all these markets to see if a localisation makes economic sense; so far it has not for those PDS games, it seems. Cities:Skylines has Chinese, if you're interested in that game." “我们的回答不变：我们的市场部门一直在评估所有国家的市场，以发掘推出本地化语言包是否可以带来经济效益；对于这些游戏来讲，至今为止似乎并不能。城市：天际线有中文版，如果你喜欢的话可以去玩。” "The other point is that old games like CK2 and EU4 are never going to be completely re-written at this late stage in their lives." “另外，像CK2和EU4这样的老游戏不会在他们的晚年被完全重做。” Firstly I must say that, for stellaris, Chinese players have contributed 100K sells, It's the fifth most purchase in all nations. However, Chinese is still not be included in the newly updated official localizations. So I don't know why they are thinking the 100K cannot afford a readable official Chinese update. Or, let me ask, is the new sellings more important than the money from 100K players they have already gained? 首先必须说的是，中国玩家已经为群星贡献了10万的销量。这个数字排在世界销量的第五。然而，最新发布的官方语言包仍然没有中文。所以我不知道为什么他们会觉得100K销量无法换来一个官方中文版。或者，我想问的是，难道新的销量比已经到手的100K玩家的钱更重要吗？ Okey Okey, let me share some records. FM2016, without Chinese, sold 50k in China; FM2017， with Chinese and a selling number more than 100k. Total War : Warhammer updated a Chinese language very late and gained 60k Chinese buyers, and Total War : Warhammer II with Chinese language is released for half a year, obtained the 50K purchase in Chinese and of course the number is increasing. No I'm not talking about the economics stuff but the attitude of Chinese people: we respect the producers who respect us. 好吧好吧，那让我来提供更多的数据。没有官中的足球经理2016在中国卖了5万，有官中的足球经理2017在中国卖了10万以上。战锤1在后半段才有官中，在中国卖了6万；而有官中的战锤2发售了半年，销量已经超过5万，当然这个数字还在增长。不，别误会，我不是在说经济问题，我是在说中国玩家的态度:我们尊重那些尊重我们的厂商。 I also don't know what is "CSL has Chinese if you are interested in that game" meaning. Dude he purchased for your products and when someday he is asking for a service, you says he can play another game?! I don't think it is respectful words for a customer group. Do you think we are only focusing on Chinese language? Our emphasis is THE RESPECT TO 100K PLAYERS. 顺便我不太明白“城市天际线有中文，你喜欢可以去玩”是什么意思。大哥，人家卖了你们的游戏，然后人家在请求服务时候，你跟人家说你可以玩别的？我不觉得这话尊重一个玩家群体。你觉得我们只关注中文吗？不不不我们关注的是你们是否尊重这10万个买了游戏的人。 There is such words on steamworks: The less a language looks like English, the higher the expected return. Many customers in Asian territories for example do not speak English, while many customers in European countries do. Also, I know while the producers are releasing new games, there would be a notice mentioning that they are going to have a lot dislikes from Chinese player if the games do not have Chinese localization. Thanks a lot for steam. 在steamworks文献库上有这么一段话：最不像英文的语言，投资回报率越高——比方说，许多亚洲的顾客不说英文，而许多欧洲国家的顾客会说英文。同时我也知道在厂商们上线新游戏的时候，会得到一个提示，说如果游戏不支持中文，厂商可能会得到大量中国玩家的差评。非常感谢steam。 Thank you for reading it. 感谢阅读。

Reach has been ported over from Xbox really well. Some things could be improved like adding map voting. The map rotation in this game currently is terrible. Where are the old reach maps everyone loves? Most of the maps are terrible and the ones that are good have been edited so that the best parts of them have been removed in certain game modes such as infection. The spawns on these maps are also terrible, anyone playing swat or really any type of slayer gamemode will know this is the case. The punishment for leaving games needs to be improved as 90% of the time when you join an infection game the first zombies will leave. The game then elects other people to be zombies and generally the game is just much slower as there is less players in the game. The AFK situation is completely broken. There are many ways that this could be fixed. An easy way would to be remove any match completed xp for those that don't have any kills or score. This would mean there is no reason for anyone to afk as they wont be getting anything out of it. Overall I think this game is nothing like the game I remember from over 9 years ago.

Dans l'état je ne le recommande pas malgré les quelques points positif qui me font rester sur ce jeu.  J'avoue que je m'attendais à avoir plus de simulation, mais la c'est clairement un jeu pour casu.  Combattre, pause, manger des herbes, full life, combattre, pause, manger des herbes, full life. La vue "dead eye" ou tu vois toutes les herbes, champignons etc en jaune fluo... qui ruine totalement l'immersion Je me demande à quoi sert l'arc ou même l'arbalète parce qu'avec la lance tu one shot les mobs... La lance ? compliqué ? En réalité oui quand la cible est en mouvement, mais suffit d'attendre que la bête s'éloigne 3 secondes, pour la revoir brouter quelques mètres plus loin avec une lance dans le fion. (lance de J.Rambo un peu parce qu'il faut un RONDIN pour en craft une, pas de petit bout de bois retrouvé au sol non.) Je peux continuer encore mais je vais m'arrêter la pour les points négatif.  Pour les points positif ya : il donne quand même envie de s'investir, c'est fluide, plutôt jolie, interface bof ouais allé, on vois ses pieds ça c'est cool, et .... j'crois que c'est tout pour l'instant, après j'ai que 6h de jeu, j'ai pas encore vu tout le contenu, du moins j'espère. Encore un jeu à accès anticipé, qui ne vend que du rêve... a voir dans le futur

**คำเตือน** ผมจะรีวิวอย่างตรงไปตรงมาเเละตรงมากๆ อาจทำให้ไม่ถูกใจใครดังนั้นขออภัยด้วยครับผม -เนื้อเรื่องและเกมเพลย์- (No spoi) เป็นการท่องเที่ยวของกลุ่มนักเรียนที่ไปบ้านที่ต่างจังหวัดเเล้วเจอผีแล้วก็…แค่นั้นละ ใช้เวลาเล่นจริงๆไม่ถึง40นาทีจบ1รูท ขนาดฟังทุกเสียง อ่านทุกคัตซีนยังไม่เกิน1ชม. แถมเนื้อเรื่องเดาทางได้ง่ายสุดๆ หักมุมได้...มากๆ ซึ่งเนื้อเรื่องนี้ผิดหวังแบบจัดๆ หาข้อดีไม่เจอเลยจริงๆเพราะมันทั่วไปแบบสุดตาราง เกมเพลย์ก็ชี้แล้วคลิกธรรมดาไม่มีอะไร มีช้อยส์ก็จริงแต่ค่อนข้างไร้ประโยชน์ต่อเนื้อเรื่องมากถ้าเทียบกับเกมอื่นๆแนวนี้เเล้ว ถามจริง!เกมราคานี้อ่ะนะซึ่งผมเป็นคนนึงที่ซื้อตอนราคาเต็มเเล้วผิดหวังมากถึงมากที่สุดและก็ขอคืนตังไปละ เสียรม เพราะเกมแบบนี้ความหวังอยู่ที่เนื้อเรื่องจริงๆ เกมเพลย์มันไม่มีไรอยู่เเล้วนิ -เสียงพากทย์- ในตอนแรกทางทีมงานออกมาบอกว่าการจะใส่เสียงพากทย์เป็นเรื่องค่อนข้างใหญ่พอสมควรเพราะต้องใช้งบมหาสารเลยจะไม่ใส่มาแต่สุดท้ายก็ทนเสียงเรียกร้องของแฟนๆไม่ไหว(รวมถึงผม)จนในที่สุดก็ต้องใส่มา.. แต่ทว่าเสียงที่ใส่มานั้นจัดว่าดีมากๆ มีการให้เสียงที่ดี ถึงรม (Fcพี่ไอรา) แต่นั้นแล้วการให้เสียงนั้นใช้การลอกแบบยุ่นมาเกือบทั้งหมด ซึ่งโดยรวมก็ลงตัวตามสไตล์วิชชวลโนเวลดี อันนี้ผมว่าดีเลยล่ะ -CG- ก็ไม่รู้จะพูดยังไงอ่ะ ทั่วไปมากๆไม่ได้ดีเวอร์ไม่ได้ห่วยอ่ะ ลองไปหาดูในเพจเขาสิ คล้ายๆกัน ปล.เขาทำเกมนี้มาโปรโมทปลาทองเขารึป่าวน้า เพราะอยากได้ภาพ18+ต้องไปเติมวีดูในปลาทองและทีมงานบอกว่าอยากได้18+เจอกันเกมต่อไป.. อืมมันต้องใช้งบอ่ะเนอะเข้าใจๆ สรุป : ซื้อเถอะถ้าตังเหลือซื้อเถอะถือว่าสนับสนุนเกมไทยทีมงานไทยเขาจะได้เข็นเกมใหม่ออกมาเร็วๆ แต่ถ้าตังไม่เหลือก็อย่าเลยส่งใจไปก็พอ เกมยังไม่ดีพอที่จะเสียเงินราคาเต็มนะครับท่านผู้อ่าน  (ถ้าลดสัก50%ค่อยจัดนะครับ) ขอบคุณที่อ่านจนจบ

TRASH

Hra je definice nefunkčnosti. Téměř 2 roky nevyšel jediný update, který by něco přidal či opravil. Jediné co vychází, čemu developeři říkají "update" je ctrl +c & ctrl + v sezóny, kde je všechno absolutně tzv. přes kopírák. S tím přichází sezónní skiny. To je celý obsah, čemu oni říkají "update". Hra má naprosto nestabilní servery, kdy se Vám prakticky denně stane, že během hraní hra spadne s error zprávou. Servery jsou navíc sjednocené, tak že matchmaking hrajete s borci z USA, kteří mají ping nejméně 120, tudíž Váš ping 20 je spíše nevýhoda, nemáte šanci je trefit, protože se teleportují a vy vidíte všechno jinak, než v reálu je. To souvisí s hit-registerem, který je tím pádem absolutně k ničemu. Polovina střel do "high-pingerů" je miss-shot. Jinak většina AR zbraní je prakticky použitelná jen na první 3 kulky, pak je recoil podobný Pepovi střílejícímu z kulometu po 20 pivech. A to co je nejvýraznějším problémem této hry, je obrovské množství cheaterů. Online fps her jsem si vyzkoušel opravdu mnoho, ale tolik cheaterů, co je tady, to nemá obdoby. V každé tdm hře se Vám alespoň 2x za hru objeví zpráva, že byl někdo zabanován. Při hraní matchmakingu téměř v každém zápase potkáte jednoho wallhackera, aimbotů je méně, ale netrvá dlouho se s nimi setkat. Co je nejhorší? Hra v podstatě nemá report systém, tudíž není cesta, jak se cheaterů zbavit. Můžete jen cheatera nahrát "při činu" a video zaslat na oficiálních support stránkách. Vtip, že? Stále ještě nejsem u konce. Správci komunity této hry dokonce mažou negativní diskuze a dokonce i recenze! Já jakož i mnoho dalších jsem byl permanentně zabanován v diskuzním fóru této hry, protože jsem "vytvářel dezinformace". Jediné co jsem ve skutečnosti udělal (napsal) bylo to, že developeři svými "updaty" zcela záměrně krejí cheatery, protože nebanují ip adresy (tudíž si každý cheater u free fps hry udělá nový účet a "jede dál svoje bomby"), odměny typu season top 100 získavají z 90 % cheateři, kteří nejsou banovaní, stejně tak existují cheaterské klany, které byly několikrát nahlašovány a i po dlouhé době se s nimi nic neudělalo. Navíc v jednom z posledních updatů byla developery odebrána možnost vidět počet smrtí jednotlivých hráčů, což údajně chrání nové hráče. Jak? Netuším. Dle mého názoru je to jen další krytí cheaterů. Dokonce jsem na jednom z fór četl, že si developeři kupují kladné recenze. Podle posledních recenzí zde se to jeví celkem reálně. Nikdo, kdo tu hru hrál již před časem (a necheatuje samozřejmě) nemůže hodnotit kladně. Ke skinům: zavedli market, aby hráči mohli prodávat své skiny na steamu, po krátké době z něj odebrali starší skiny, kterých se tak už nijak nemůžete zbavit: tudíž kdo to neví, otevře si bednu (za reálné peníze), získá s šancí 0,0003 % super drahý skin, ale nemůže ho prodat ... Jinak teď vychází jen bedny, kde získáváte 3-denní, nebo 7-denní skiny, šance na skiny permanentní je jako získat knife v CS:GO.... A perlička nakonec: aktuálně vydali "valentýnskou bednu", kterou si můžete koupit za úžasných $60 a získáte 2x AK-47 (vážně 2x to samé...), pistolku a k tomu kartičku (ta je k ničemu) a anime charakter skin, který je na 30 dní, pak zmizí...

Очень интересная и атмосферная игра, но игра стала крашится, пожалуйста почините вылеты. Очень много багов с зависанием в текстуры, диалоги при встрече с инопланетянами не показываются на космостанциях. Невозможно нормально пообщаться с нпц, что очень тормозит всю игру. Хотела бы поставить положительный отзыв игре, но это просто невыносимо, как можно играть с постоянными вылетами? Только купила игру по акции, а уже неприятности :( P.S. Разработчикам. Был разрушенный корабль, решили заменить с друзьями на другой, добавили в коллекцию, теперь разрушенный корабль под рукой, других кораблей в коллекции нет. Это тоже такой суперский баг? Теперь не на чем летать...Кнопки "перенести" со старого корабля все свои вещи тоже не было. Спасибо за игру. Теперь настроение скатилось хуже не куда. Прокопать подземные ходы невозможно, я висну в текстурах. Я кричу, я ору. Куда ушли мои деньги? Прошло 55 часов, как я играю в эту игру. Я до сих пор плачу. Играть вместе невозможно. Багов много по основному квесту, если вы летите вместе делать квест, то один из вас не может пройти дальше, приходится перезаходить, один сделал квест - другой не может выполнить, просто нет взаимодействия со сторонним пространством. Как быть? Я не знаю. Играть соло квесты. Исследовать и делиться содержимым инвентаря - пожалуйста. Иногда происходит дисконект и вы не видите друг друга, это очень мешает в процессе игры. Больше мне нечего сказать. Баг на баге. Кое-где есть свои плюсы. Для игры в соло игра положительная. Для двоих она очень неиграбельная, что можно сказать о четверых?или 12? Приходится постоянно нервничать. Почему нельзя было сделать все квесты совместные, чтобы засчитывалось всем людям?
