Vorab: Ich war schon seit letztem Jahr gehyped auf das Spiel, wurde nun aber extrem Enttäuscht! Ich habe nun die 3. Welt anfangen müssen, da bei den 2 Welten davor das Spiel abgestürzt ist und es keinen safe gab, ich habe nicht damit gerechnet, dass das Spiel einfach mehrmals ohne Grund abstürzt.  Zu dem Spiel an sich kann ich daher nicht viel sagen, außer, dass die Steuerung von den Menschen teilweise sehr schlecht gemacht ist.  Ich habe gesehen, dass es Fließbänder etc. gibt, konnte aber nie so weit spielen.  Da bleibe ich lieber bei Factorio, da stürzt mir das Spiel nicht ab und ich habe auch die Möglichkeit Sachen zu automatisieren! Aufgrund der viertelstündlichen Abstürze werde ich das Spiel refunden und eventuell in ein paar Jahren wieder vorbei schauen , in der Hoffnung, dass das Spiel dann funktioniert.

Очень жалею о данной покупке. Надо было купить пару батонов хлеба и накромить уточек в пруду. Но нет, пришлось кормить криворуких разработчиков. А кривизна этой игры проявляется во всем. Про оптимизацию забудьте (на любом железе игра невнятно долго грузится и проседает). Враги совершенно убогие и скудные. На то они и зомби. Есть и боссы. Убить которых нужно быстрее, чем иссякнет Ваша шкала жизни. Экран темный. Невозможно переназначить кнопки. Более того, кроме выбора разрешения при запуске, более, выбора что-то изменить Вам не дадут (кроме сложности). Чтобы получить винтовку (и достижения к ней), нужно со сюжету взоврвать 7 генераторов. Взорвав 4, босс тут же меня убивает. Увы, собрав 92% достижений, я решил плюнуть на эту бестолковую игру. Удачи Вам, дорогие последователи, в этой дешевой и нелепой игре! Плюсы и минусы: +Наличие 590 достижений +Карточки +Бесконечные патроны -Ужасная оптимизация -Анимация врагов отвратительна -Боссы просто не дают возможности их убить -Однообразные уровни -Физика в игре, в целом, не идеал -Отсутствие настроек Итог: 3 лежачих зомби из 10

真不是很適合每個玩家的口味 當一名快遞員除了送材料，包裹，尸體。。。。。去A-B重複做一百囘同樣的事情有點真是會受不了。 當然游戲畫面是很好看但感覺裏面的世界陰沉死死。每半個活人除了敵人和鬼怪外。其他人竟然躲在地下室不敢出來 我現在玩到第8關了，那些所謂的普通任務接不接也無所謂因爲都是同樣的套路送這個，取那個樣本，去敵方基地那東西等。。。。。 任務完成后就只有短短的誇獎就這樣一點滿足感都沒有而且故事套路也很複雜對一個普通玩家也很難明白。 我是滿喜歡小島秀夫的作品的但是唯有這個游戲玩久就會覺得很膩對我來説不是他的一部好作品。游戲沒有問題，但是游戲設定不是每個人都會喜歡。感覺從MGS5開始的作評就走下波，這是我個人的看法。還在KONAMI時的作品是很優秀也很好玩尤其是是MGS系列。

I used to be a Paradox die-hard fan boi. This game? Nah.  It was completely unfinished on arrival. Typical for Paradox when they were 20 basement nerds running a small game developer. Now they are a big phat conglomerate. Why would Hoi4 be bad then? Because they did not prioritize this game AT! ALL!. Now, after several years and several costly DLCs where the devs had to backpaddle on several controversial (and dumb) decisions they initially made, it's soon verdict time: it's bad.  The worst flaw is that the devs wants this to be a quick, pacey multiplayer-friendly, e-sport-compatible game, AND a sand-box where you can have fun with super-ahistorical outcomes such as recreating the Roman Empire or gaining an anchievement for capturing Iceland as Australian Communist Commune or some weird ♥♥♥♥. Twisting your brain to beat the Soviet Union on the Eastern Front? Nah. Easy. Boring. No one does that more than once. No one wants that, says Paradox. This is where I think they are most wrong.  They need to go back to the roots. Hearts of Iron was supposed to be Axis and Allies (the table-top game) on computer. Being on computer, you could add stats and modifiers and calculations.  Units needing supplies. Techy units needing fuel. Map having terrain and weather. Things that an actual WW2 field commander would worry about incessantly. Paradox keeps reinventing their own wheels. It's like their current devs never played Hearts of Iron 2 or 3, let alone Axis and Allies (still the table-top game). They just "reinvented" partisans, but botched it so that Polish teenagers with rusty rifles in Warzaw are more lethal per month than the Soviet Red Army on the offensive. But, you can easily make the USA communist by 1938 and create the Soviet Republic of Northern America. YAY. Well done, Paradox.  Just what we wanted from a WW2 Grand Strategy game.

This sim is $8 on the google play store. Along with being over priced it feels unfinished, there is no air traffic, simple fuel simulation (you can run out of fuel in some aircraft but it doesn't affect your aircraft in any way), no failures, very little scenery, no weather besides a cloud and wind slider, and probably a few small things im forgetting. I will admit the part of America included is ok scenery wise, and the airports are fine but at night few cities have lighting of any form besides the airports, and there is no water just blue ground. The planes seem detailed both inside and out to me  (im not a pilot or particularly avid flight simmer) and the vr support is very good. In general I see no reason to purchase this at $60 over any flight sim.

＋환상적인 OST ＋야리코미 요소 ＋나쁘지 않은 액션성 －심각할 정도의 엉터리 스토리 －설정 붕괴 －긴 튜토리얼 －높은 육성 난이도 －스포일러 지루한 초반과 엉터리 스토리라도 참고 야리코미 및 다회차를 노리고 오래하실 JRPG 팬분 테일즈 시리즈중 단 한작품이라도 해보신 분 이 게임 도저히 못해먹겠다... 하고 때려쳤습니다. 지루한 초반도 넘어가고 개판 오분전인 스토리도 넘어갔지만 레벨 노가다를 하지 않고는 진행하기 매우 어려운 상황에 그만뒀습니다. 이제 10시간정도면 엔딩을 볼 수 있을 것 같은데 온라인게임도 아니고 거진 두달동안 붙잡고 있는데도 엔딩을 못보는 게임은 이제 체력이 안되네요. 우선 음악은 정말 최곱니다. 깔거리가 없어요. 유저에게 모험심을 불어넣어 줄 정도로 희망차기도 하며 주인공들의 절망을 유저가 느낄 수 있을 정도로 적재적소 뛰어난 음악들이 산재해있습니다. 솔직히 음악을 들으려고 진행했다고 할 수 있을정도로 정말 매우 뛰어납니다. 그 외로는 1회차부터 야리코미 요소가 매우 높습니다. 레벨 노가다를 하지 않으면 만만치않은 잡몹들의 공세에 일단 처음보는 몬스터면 몬스터 정보를 먼저 보고 약점을 찾는게 우선시되며 한두대만 맞아도 빈사상태가 되기에 살기위해 가드, 흘리기, 스탭등을 사용하는데 그에 대한 피드백이 적절하여 액션성도 나름 뛰어납니다. 네, 저게 답니다. 장점으로 말씀해드리고 싶은게 저게 다에요... 너무나 많은 단점들이 있는데 도대체 뭐부터 말씀드려야할지 모를 정도로 게임이 엉터리입니다. 우선 스토리가 너무 심각합니다. 오프닝이나 엔딩이 좋다고 하는데 그건 모르겠고 그 중간과정이 너무 어거지에요. 설정이 붕괴되는건 둘째치더라도 스토리 전개가 너무 충격적인데 메인 히로인 교체, 캐릭터성이 사라지는 설정 붕괴 스토리등 수많은 충격을 주고 그 중 가장 충격받은건 메인 히로인인 로제의 살인이 선한 살인이라는 겁니다. 암살단의 두목인 로제는 악인만 죽인다고 하는데 문제는 주인공 일행 전부가 그걸 쉴드칩니다. 필요 악이 아니라 필요 선으로 포장하는게 너무나도 역겹습니다. 명백한 살인 미화입니다. 이 전까지도 스토리가 개판오분전이었으나 이 이후 스토리는 전혀 안봤습니다. 스토리만 문제있으면 그러려니 합니다. JRPG중 스토리 맛 간게 한둘도 아니니까요. 근데 이 게임은 스토리만 문제가 있는게 아니라 게임 자체가 JRPG치고는 너무 늘어집니다. 우선 시작하고 2~3시간동안 공격 버튼 1개로도 게임이 진행이 됩니다. 카무이를 얻기전까지는 튜토리얼이나 마찬가지인데 이 과정이 제법 길어 그만두고 싶은 생각이 절로 납니다. 카무이화가 되고는 그제서야 게임이 좀 액션성도 있고 테일즈 시리즈다워집니다. 그러나 레벨 노가다를 하지 않으면 지나가던 마법사타입 몬스터 5마리에게 전멸이 납니다. 물론 컨트롤이란 컨트롤은 다 하고 순간적으로 5마리를 구석에 몰아넣어 카무이화하여 약점속성으로 패면 잡을 수는 있습니다. 그러나 좀 이상하지 않습니까? 지나가던 시정잡배 같은 놈들 5마리에게 세계를 구하는 주인공일행이 전력으로 싸워야 간신히 호각이라뇨... 그렇습니다. 이건 밸런스를 잘 못 잡은겁니다. 플레이타임을 억지로 늘리기 위해 노가다를 집어넣은 것으로 보이며 스토리를 진행하면 워프포인트를 막아놓고 걸어가라고 하는데 이것 역시 플레이타임을 늘리기 위한 꼼수입니다. 너무 실망이 큽니다. 저는 테일즈 시리즈를 PS1시절 판타지아부터 이터니아까지 하고 휴대용으로는 나리키리 던전 시리즈만 하였으며 정말 즐겁게 즐겼고 좋은 추억으로 남아있습니다. 현세대 테일즈는 제스티리아가 처음으로 내심 기대하고 한 건 사실입니다. 그런데 소중한 추억을 이렇게 망가트려버릴 줄은 꿈에도 몰랐습니다. 테일즈 시리즈니 참고 참고 또 참고 해봤지만 정말 심각하게 재미없고 어처구니 없으며 실망만 늡니다. 가장 우스웠던건 20시간정도 하고 잠깐 쉬려고 구매했던 베스세리아를 딱 30분만 했는데 그 30분이 제스티리아 20시간보다 훨씬 가치가 있었고 훨씬 몰입했으며 전투도 훨씬 재밌었습니다. 그리고 애니메이션인 제스티리아 더 크로스도 보았습니다. 네, 그 애니메이션을 보고 전 이 게임을 더 할 가치를 전혀 못 느꼈습니다. 개판이난 스토리도 수정됐으며 설정 붕괴도 없고 액션씬도 뛰어납니다. 이 게임을 하고자한다면 그냥 애니메이션을 보세요. 그게 훨씬 작품성이 높고 눈도 호강합니다. 베르세리아가 출시되지 않았다면 해볼만하지만 대체제로 애니와 베르세리아가 있는 지금 이 게임을 할 필요는 없다고 봅니다. 이 게임은 최악의 테일즈입니다. 내 20시간...

(2017'nin ve belki de son yılların en hızlı çıkış yapan oyunu. Yayıncılar tarafından boostlanmasıyla kısa zamanda çok büyük bir kitleyi kendine bağladı. Oyun ilk çıktığında beta olarak yayınlandığından muhtemel sorunlar görmezden geliniyordu. Yapılan haftalık ve aylık güncellemerin büyük kısmını performans ve hata düzeltmeleri alıyordu. Fakat zamanla şirket kullanıcıların sorunlarını görmezden gelmeye başladı ve var olan sorunlar yerine H1Z1'de olduğu gibi kozmetik (daha çok para kazandırdığını düşündüğü) vb. alanlar da güncellemeye başladı. Yapılan yanlış tercihler, yönetilemeyen topluluk ve göz ardı edilen oyuncu (müşteri istekleri) davranışları netincesinde gelinen noktada 3M'den fazla anlık oyuncusuna sahip bir oyun bu kitlenin %50'den fazlasını kaybetti. Bu çöküş de devam edecek gibi görünüyor.   Oyun barındırğı bitmeyen onca hataya, sunucu  problemlerine rağmen alınabilir. Son 10'a kaldığınızda yaşattığı o heyecan, ilk maç kazanmanız; bunlar yaşamanız gereken güzel duygular.) Parantez içindeki yazıyı 2018'de yazmışım. Şu an 2020 oyun o kadar boktan bir hal aldı ki artık oynamak bile gelmiyor içimden. Ne hataları bitti, ne bugu bitti, ne hilecisi bitti. Bölgesel engellemeyi inat ettiler getirmiyorlar. Avrupadaki insanları inatla hileci Asyalılarla oynatıyorlar. Daha dün bir tane güncelleme geldi oyunda sadece 100.000 kişi var ve oyuna girişte problem yaşıyoruz. Bu kadar saçmalık olamaz ya. Oyuna giriyoruz hileciler yok ediyor... Neresinden tutarsan tut elinde kalıyor.
Не тратьте свои деньги на эту игру!

Справился с безумием.... и спешу предостеречь вас от того.  Я не могу назвать игру качественной, как бы мне этого не хотелось. Всё, начиная от качество роликов, размеров локаций и заканчивая взаимодействием, говорит о том, что это далеко не игра первого эшелона. Если к этому прибавить, что на прохождение игры вам надо максимум 10 часов, то становится еще печальнее (да, да - это первая стадия безумия).  В связи с этим ценник этой игры крайне завышен.   Мой совет - если вы хотите почувствовать атмосферу творений Лавкрафта, то я бы рекомендовал смотреть в сторону довольно старой, но очень запоминающийся игры - Dark Corners of The Earth. Если же вы всё таки по какому-то непреодолимому желанию (повинуйтесь Его Зову) намеереваетесь купить ИМЕННО ЭТО творение, то подождите хотя бы, пока цена не упадет до 400-500р.

Maybe if you can stand the awful movement and you have a high-end PC you can enjoy the game for its combat, I don't know.

Из википедии: Сюда перенаправляется запрос «Амигдала». Миндалевидное тело, миндалина (лат. corpus amygdaloideum) — характерная область мозга, имеющая форму миндалины, расположенной внутри височной доли (Lobus temporalis) головного мозга. Миндалина играет ключевую роль в формировании эмоций, является частью лимбической системы. Считается, что у людей и других животных эта подкорковая мозговая структура участвует в формировании как отрицательных (страх), так и положительных эмоций (удовольствие). Её размер положительно коррелирует с агрессивным поведением. Предполагается, что такие состояния, как тревожность, аутизм, депрессия, посттравматическое стрессовое расстройство и фобии, связаны с ненормальным функционированием миндалины. Никогда не покупайте этот шлак, если не хотите уменьшения размера этой самой миндалины. Будьте готовы к тому, что во время игры может возникнуть синиий экран смерти, уж не знаю, чего там разработчики намутили. Сама игра уныла и скучна, совершенно неинформативна, к тому же с глючным упралением. Прыгаем какой-то амёбой с третьим глазом по висящим в воздухе платформам и собираем кристаллы. По пути нам встречаются "монстры", порождённые больной фантазией и кривыми руками художника. Итог: 1% размера миндалины у разработчика от нормальных 100%.

Die Grundidee des Spieles, physikalische Rätsel mittels Gegenständen und lustigen Figuren zu lösen, ist zugegebenermaßen nicht schlecht und hat bereits so einige tolle Spiele hervorgebracht. Der allererste Level aber brachte mir die Ernüchterung: Im Grunde geht es nur darum, eine Katze brutal aus dem Leben scheiden zu lassen. Im besagten Level muss ein herunterfallender Ball so beeinflusst werden, dass er einen Safe verschiebt, welcher eine gefangene (und ganz verzweifelt dreinblickende) Katze treffen soll. Wenn dies passiert, kreischt die Katze, es spritzt Blut und das Gehirn fliegt durch den Raum. Soetwas mag vielleicht jemanden zusagen, ich fand es einfach ZU heftig und widerlich. Das zweite Level hat meine Meinung bezüglich des Spieles verfestigt: Nun soll die Katze durch eine Bombe sterben. Nein, das wollte ich der süssen, eingesperrten Katze nicht auch noch antun und beendete das Spiel. Wäre "Bad Rats" nicht bei einem Bundle dabei gewesen, hätte ich es nie gekauft respektive gespielt. So wird es in meiner Steam-Bibliothek 'verstauben'. Kurzum: Katzenliebhaber sollten einen GROSSEN Bogen um dieses Spiel machen!

well, the game has a huge potential, the crafting system is good, exploration feels how it should, and hunting is fun. But, there is a huge but here... tbh. In actual state, is really buggy, with alot of game-breaking things, even stopping you and your friends to progress through the game. I'll try to list here what i've encountered with my friends within 21 hours of game: 1 - Natives are just buggy as hell, they some times spawns on nowhere, or are invisible for some players in co-op ( no, i'm not talking about loss of sanity, they are just invisible and pop-up when killed by who seeing them). Even animations stop working some times, with the classic "cross shape" position.  2 - building a base has no benefit at all. besides just small things like shelter, and even so, the only penalty for rain is the fire being put out. You can virtually survive with only two or three structures and it will be just fine. Besides, they offer no protection at all, since natives and some animals will spawn there quite often. 3 - some times craft is just a waste of time. Item balance is just terrible, literally a simple stone knife built with 2 stones is more effective collecting material than any other material expensive tool. Literally takes less stamina and time to "knife-down" any tree with this blade than with an axe, wich makes no sense... and mind the simple blade, its not even the knife, only 2 rocks to craft this tool. 4 - actually an extension of the 3º problem, but with item "grade". Metal tools are just horrible for the effort. The system that you have to learn to make them is great, but they lack any reward. Literally, i didnt notice any benefit from iron knife to stone knife, or axe, or anything. Its just not worth the time. 5 - the game life-span is around 15~20 hours. When everything is new, you are having fun. After that, its quite repetitive and dull. Its not a "problem" tho, it will be different depending on how you deal with this. 6 - hunting different animals is quite pointless, since almost every animal will give you only different types of meat with no real benefit. You cant get their fur, or they skin to make armor. It was really sad when my group almost wiped out fighting an jaguar, only to find out that he only gives you 2~3 pieces of meat that does nothing new. So, if you set up a trap to kill big animals, thats it, you literally have nothing to do anymore. Only one animal has an actual usable item, its the armadillo's. Hunting is pointless, but is fun. Animals will run off if you hit them with throwing weapons, and you better run for it, or you'll probably lose your weapon at the dense vegetation. Atmosphere is just neat, 10/10 there. 7 - Lack of objectiviness. Well, tbh the game has and objective and you can find it quite easy. the map is not big as it look like, its quite small actually. You can, in less than 5 minutes, run cross it. Surviving is NOT the objective, that means you have an "point a to b" to reach out. Thing is, there is nothing interesting there. Just nothing.  8 - Connectivity issues, lots of them. Even desync is quite normal. There is two major game-breakings bugs:  1 - If you're playing co-op, there are especial items that need to be collected to acess some areas, one of those items is a grappling hook. If you or some of your friends find the hook and some one is not close enough, this player wont get the hook, thus not acessing the area. To go around this, you have to enable cheats and spawn the item.  2 - When drinking water or sleeping, some times your character just freeze there and the controls become unresponsive, forcing you to reboot the game ( happend 3 times with my host). Bonus glitch: 1 - Some times when you join a server (that you have played before, thus saved game and char ) and your character will not load. You start on random location and without any item, like a fresh game. Reconnection will solve the problem. 2 - Items will duplicate if you drop them, save the game and exit. Probably server state is not sync with player state. The game is quite fun when it works, but it wont work 70% of the time, wich is a shame. I wont recommend to play this alone, the only reason it was fun within 20 hours was because i had friends with me.  if you are looking for an incomplete game and want to support it to gets better, buy it and play with friends.  if anything that i wrote here bothers you, dont. Those are not rare cases, they are literally the game itself. Dont get me wrong, the game has some INSANE potential, if the devs carry this on, within 1 years it will become a good game. Lets hope they do it.  thats all.

Updated: Fast forward nine months later, lo and behold almost everything I mentioned has come to pass and they are now making their dlc practices even more anti consumer. OP Reskinned versions of weapons being sold as new ones when they are just combinations of previously available weapons thereby making the originals completely irrelevent, reskinned cosmetics sold as new ones, and lame nostalgia dlc that doesn't go far enough to even cash in on the nostalgia people have for the original game well enough to make it a selling point. Stay classy Fatshark! Fatshark has absolutely no shame releasing the game in the state ( that it's still in nine months after release ) then having the ♥♥♥♥♥♥♥ cheek to ignore the pc users entirely in order to release a half assed console port, putting almost all bug fixing and QOL on hold so they can try and squeeze more money out of a market that offers no reasonable benefit to them other than the whales will clamour over a chance to spend more money.  Wasn't full price at launch, and wasn't worth the price they were/are asking for it either. Get it when it goes down into the single digits inevitably like the first game did. It's bad, the community is vitriolic, the developers are hacks, and the game is more full of holes than no man's sky was at launch. I WISH I was kidding. Things that were in the 1st game for QoL have been removed, no doubt to be re-added in DLC thus locking things that were free for everyone in the previous title behind a paywall. ( Boegenhafen has things that were originally in V1 for everyone )  Destiny 2 wasn't allowed to do it without reprimand, so why should fatshark get special treatment? It's an underhanded practice no matter who does it. It's still in early beta even after how long it has been out, and each subsequent patch has made things worse and worse. The same issues have been " fixed " once, twice, even three times and sure enough here we are in December and most of these bugs are still in the game.  Enemies spawn within melee distance of the party, specials are silent, patrols are silent, no buffs given to classes that are 100% irrelevant, meanwhile the elf is still top DPS in the weapons department across the board, just as she was before launch during the beta.  Good thing they nerfed her health regen instead of balancing her weapons to be more in line with literally any other class so that she isn't the best at literally everything. ( None of this has /been fixed as of 7/1/19) They neglect to update the fanbase properly on changes made to the game, none of the patch notes have included all of the balance changes made, yes you read that correctly none of them, the developers ( or at least the one who makes their presence on steam known on the forums ) has fallen into troll bait and gotten his " last word in " by locking threads and posting his favorite answers to any critique he doesn't like, meanwhile the community grows more and more segregated by the day by the people who will abuse whatever the hell is the most objectively broken, unbalanced thing in the game, and the people who want to play to enjoy themselves. ( And now segregated even further by the most recent DLC practice )  The game is an absolute mess. It has a ton of promise, but so did the first game, and just like the first game, fatshark seem to be content with a too little too late mentality. I've sworn off of bethesda games, fromsoftware games, ubisoft games, EA games, and now Fatshark is getting added to that list. I'm not the only one that will eventually hit this point, and this " appeal to all " mindset they try to showboat is going to end with no one ever being satisfied. Hmm, sounds a lot like the forums have for the past six months now that I mention it.

我一直以為這是一個與同伴合作打怪在荒野之境中求生的逃生類遊戲。 直到我連續幾局被百米開外一槍穿墻爆頭，然後看到死亡畫面上標註著名字是蹩腳英文或者直接拼音和漢字的國人玩家。原來這遊戲也變成了神仙大戰。 排行榜前幾什麼時候封，這邊什麼時候改推薦。 新版本一出，開掛的那些中國主播連演都不演直接穿。 拿噴子蹲墻角——被穿，拿長槍蹲石頭後面——被穿，拿砍刀蹲門檻後面——被穿。 開掛的孤兒們總是習慣先穿一兩槍，一看對方蹲的位置穿不到不掉血，便又開啟了自動爆頭功能順便切出來各種70刀炸彈一扔，等你出來就是切槍一槍頭。那幾個中文ID的掛壁操作都形成了一種套路。 希望客服出個IP檢測系統，開掛直接封IP。那些個狗主播不知手中攥有多少個單遊戲的開掛賬戶等著挨封。 最後，掛壁們最愛的武器是斯帕克LRR加重擊手槍或者溫菲爾德M1873。如果遊戲中聽到這幾把槍聲音的請直接撤離吧，三分之一幾率大掛壁入場。尤其是溫菲德爾，使用這種槍的除了萌新外十個裡面九個掛。 幾周不見，誅仙大戰。 兩年過去了.........人造小諸葛，北條哥哥，K33，浮生，還有某賣掛QQ號等等老牌掛壁還在打得熱火朝天，每次大更新還能跑出一堆丟人公會。這遊戲的掛壁依然瀟灑，建議永封開掛的那些大陸IP。

Великий и недостижимый сюжет, безжалостные коридорные локации, постоянно забитые разным хламом, через который нужно буквально продираться, тонны описаний каждого действия персонажа,  тысячи нажатий клавиш и визуально-текстовое впоплощение мыслей главных героев.   Игрок страдает от артрита пальцев, мозг  перегревается и заклинивает, а проваленное из-за кривых рук сидящего за клавиатурой  прохождение уровня  можно прервать и быстро перезагрузить с самого начала. Игрока тут ждут безумные и напряжённые бои с раскладкой клавиатуры - успешное  быстрое нажатие клавиш в правильном порядке активирует особый триггер самых безумных комбинаций кнопок, а некстати заклинившая кнопка "Е" обрекает клавиатуру на верную смерть от броска в стену. Хеви Рейн, безусловно, новое слово в жанре "интерактивное кинцо", потому что  такого до этой игры ещё не видел никто.  поэтому убивать время и нервные клетки в этой игре  можно часами. Каждый раз комбинации нажимаемых вами  клавиш будут чем-то новеньким и интересным. А если окружающие предметы в игре окажутся слишком сильны, можно позвать друга и убивать свои нервные клетки  вместе.  На поверку игра, претендующая на звание шедевра, игра, явившаяся основателем такого "популярного" в кавычках жанра как  , оказзалась унылым, скучным, неинтересным, переоцененным шлаком. B который уважающий себя Геймер не стал бы играть даже в условиях жесточайшего НоуГамеЗа. Поиграв в ЭТО, я лишний раз убедился в том, что консольщики в силу сложившихся вокруг них обстоятельств это не более чем люди с дурным вкусом, готовые хавать любое гуамно только потому лишь, что дядя узкоглазый маркетолог так сказал и потому лишь, что ЭКСКЛЮЗИВ...  Эти люди, считающие данную поделку "шедевром", ОЧЕНЬ СИЛЬНО заблуждаются и очевидно что шедевров в жизни своей в глаза не видали.   Если хотите шедевра - поиграйте в ту же консольную   RDR2, в Black Mesa, в первый Deus Ex или хотя бы в Deus Ex HR, в Fallout New Vegas или еще лучше в мод на нее под названием New California, но не в ЭТО.  Все же непонятно для кого "авторитетные" издания, ставящие данной и ей подобным поделкам высшие баллы  и прочие ГОТИ, суть продажные журнашлюxu, единственное чего боящиеся это впасть в немилость компании Сони и думающие лишь о собственных бонусах, плюшках и предрелизных копиях игр, а не об объективности и непредвзятости, которым они и должны как профессионалы, поклоняться. Тьфу...   ********************************************************

Büyük heveslerle satın aldığım bir oyundu.  İlk on saatte saatte sürekli aynı şeyleri yapmak gerçekten can sıkıcı oluyor. Özellikle tek başınıza oynuyorsanız, yayın ya da sohbet edecek arkadaşınız yoksa o sırada etrafınızda çekilmez bir hal alıyor. Yemek ye, yemek yemek için çalış, çalışmak için uyu, uyumak için eve git. Bu döngü saatlerce tekrar ettikten sonra, bir kaç yeni yer daha ekleniyor ama onlar da mekanik anlamda aynı şeyler. Oyun temelinde, hikayesinde böyle bir oyun fakat biraz aksiyon yapılabilirdi belki be. 16 saati devirdikten sonra, hala aynı şeyleri yaptığımı fark edince oynamayı bıraktım. İade edebilsem, ederdim. Fiyatını hak etmediğini düşünüyorum.  Oyunun temeli bir döngüden ibaret, bu döngüyü belki +20 Saat sonra ya da oyunu bilen birinin aracılığıyla erkenden kırabilirsiniz ama yeni satın almış birisi olarak deneyimim pekte eğlenceli değildi. Twitch yayınlarından izlediğim kadarıyla eğlenceli de bir oyun gibi görünüyordu ama tek başıma oynamaya başlayınca, o kadar da eğlenmediğimi fark ettim.

Наконец-то я дождался скидки на Zombeer!! Ни на одной распродаже он дешевле не становился. Но 2019 - год чудес. Покупая эту игрушку я ожидал неплохой шутерок на один вечер, с интересной вселенной, свежими элементами геймплея и кучей отсылок на поп-культуру. По крайней мере, всё это обещали мне трейлеры. но, как зачастую бывает в жизни, рекламе верить нельзя.   Начнём с того, что запустить игру - это уже проблемно. Постоянные вылеты из главного меню и спонтанные сворачивания прилично потрепали нервы. Слава Гейбу, режим совместимости с Семёркой всё исправил. Вторая проблема - фпс. В игре стоит лок на 30, а настройки с этим не борются. Даже вредят. Пока писал обзор, узнал что фпс зависит от настроек. В комплекте с самой высокой графикой, идёт лок на 30 фпс. На средней - 60. Ну что за дела?! :L  Катсценки тоже в 30-ке, да и ещё с аудио не синхронизированы.    Проблема №2 - управление. FOV  капец низкий. Но с этим ещё можно жить. Играть в шутер с 30-ю fps  - совсем не весело. На помощь пришёл мой верный контроллер от Хуана. Тут вылезла очередная проблема. Управление изучается методом научного тыка, т.к. игра отображает обучающие подсказки примерно так: "Чтобы восполнить здоровье нажмите КНОПКА 5". И что теперь? Считать все кнопки на контроллеры? И с какой начинать?!  Перетыкал всё, что есть. Попрыгал, побил стену, но в итоге вылечился. Подсмотреть кнопки можно в настройках, но это, как по мне, слишком неудобно.    Я уже говорил про "подхиляться". Под эти подразумевается бухнуть Зомпива с пацанами. Это и есть одна из основных "инновационных" фишек игры. Не пьёшь пиво - становишься зомби. Пьёшь слишком много - передоз. К сожалению, эту механика начинает раздражать уже в стартовой комнате. Наш персонаж - тот ещё алкаш, и печень его функционирует на все 350%. Пить ему нужно очень часто, т.к. трезвеет он за считанные секунды. Как же хорошо, что пиво разбросанно на каждом углу. Ещё можно хакнуть автомат с Зомпивом и получить бесконечный запас, если вы конечно разберётесь в том, что это за "КНОПКА 3", которую нужно вовремя нажимать в мини-игре.    Зомби в игре крайне тупые, отстреливать их не так уж и интересно. Если всё таки решите купить Zombeer - флаг  вам в руки и рефанд вам в помощь.  2 зомби-сиськи из 10

Pros: - The idea of the witch trials was fun.  - Frank and Joe Hardy were still amazing as always. It was nice having Ned and the Hardy brothers back.  Cons:  - DO NOT think this is going to be like the other Nancy Drew games. It is completely different, and does not have the same feeling as what the older ones do. - The graphics are awful. The scenes are dull with little detail, and many of the meshes are reused throughout. The scenes have an "empty" feeling to them. The edges of the graphics also look jagged. I understand that they are using a new engine, but I feel as though they should have learned that in the background while using the old.  - The voice actress seemed like she couldn't deliver her emotion properly for the scenes.  - The previous games, one didn't have to upgrade their computer, whereas many complaints I have seen are people needing to upgrade in order to even run the game. That was always a plus of the previous Nancy Drew games; people that couldn't afford high-end computers were able to enjoy the games. - What many people loved about the previous team of HeR, is you could tell that they knew the Nancy Drew games. They knew the story. This game feels like it was made by people that never played the games or read the story.  - If you're looking for the nostalgia of the older games, sadly, you won't find that here. HeR has went through many changes but I'm hoping they can restore what the previous games had. - Why the drama with Ned at the beginning for it to not be finished?  - SO MUCH DIALOGUE. An excessive amount that is unneeded.  - Lack of puzzles. Nancy Drew games are known for the puzzles.  - Ending was anti-climatic. Spent more time talking. - The interface icons were odd. I understand they were going for a minimalistic look, but it looked bland. - The music didn't aid in the atmosphere. There was many one track that actually fit the theme.

I'm not even sure what to say about this game. I watched some videos on Youtube of some streamers playing it and it looked good. I thought it would be a great game worthy of a good investment. Oh boy what a mistake and how wrong I was. I gave my Uboat orders to dock at a port and my boat literally just kept slamming into a wall / dock. Wouldn't dock so I could restock supplies or anything. Just kept slamming into the wall like a mentally handicapped goose flying into a window over and over. Didn't want to do anything but slam into the dock without docking... -facepalm- No wonder Germany lost the war if that's how they operated. Then I would put people on the listening devices and radios to "pick up contacts". I would have them working on it and they would NEVER find contacts even if a boats were nearby. My captain or watcher on duty would see smoke plumes from the smoke stacks before they heard anything. Then when I get into range to try to "assault / hunt" the ships I would dive down and instantly everyone's mood starts plummeting. "Oh it's the wrong colored lights, oh I can't listen to the radio, oh I can't...." like seriously. We just started combat and my "discipline" went from 100 to 50 in no time flat. These are sailors / soldiers? More like preschool cry babies...sheesh. Then during the "hunts" I would try to line up my torpedo shots but most of the time I would run too low on oxygen from being underwater just part of a day while trying to plan out my attack and line up the shots. If you surface you get blown to bits. There is no proper balance. If you don't come up along their side and happen to get your listener to make a contact and know where they are then your spotter won't give you enough warning to get into position and dive before being spotted. I have no clue what this game is supposed to be but it's far from a proper Uboat simulator / WW2 sub simulator. I was thoroughly disappointed in this to say the least. I can't believe it has this many issues to be honest. Can zoom in as 1st person in the Uboat and the details are nice Good food management system for morale, but otherwise morale system is whack Decent old timey music playing on the radios Cool ocean water graphics and details of boats Balance of morale system and oxygen for getting close enough to fight without dying is a bit busted Whiney soldiers get annoying how low their morale gets so quickly No decent tutorial and they even say "we're working on it" but from my understanding it's been that way for quite some time and even Youtube seems to not have any up to date good tutorial videos. UI is not very intuitive. Trying to figure out what buttons to push for what / where is very difficult for beginners. I watched some older videos to try to learn things and half of the things still didn't make sense or work properly. That's a big mood killer within itself. Who wants to play a game where you spend hours figuring out some basic controls? Docking issues preventing you from resupplying and getting into the base Listeners not working properly / picking up contacts (even with extra soldiers helping them at their station) Had a few times where my torpedo "fire screen" would bug out and stay on the screen and not go away or work properly. Pull up the map to move and ''HEY KIDS YOU WANNA FIRE A TORPEDO!?" No I want to move my boat...I had to save and reload to fix it.  Sometimes giving people orders they wouldn't do it and seemed to bug out (always when changing light colors) If the devs put the time, love, effort and energy into balance and fixing quality of life issues as they did the ocean graphics this game would be great. For right now I highly recommend that you WAIT to see if / when they fix these balancing issues and make docking work properly. Unless you want to play a WW2 whining simulator where if Adolf can't listen to his Swing music, eat food, play cards and have his favorite colored light bulb all the time without losing his temper then you'll enjoy this game. Otherwise this is not a decent submarine game. Other people mention silent hunter I think it was? That might be worth taking a look at. As for right now I'm thoroughly disappointed yet again by another let down of a game this year on Steam. Seems 2020 has brought out the worst everywhere even in Steam games.

I really enjoy this game but it is worth noting the game has its flaws, one being that there is a stupid number of hackers on it. and you will run into them every so often. the game itself is fun, however it has some issues, one issue is the hackers, another is bugs. for one when playing as Jason most environment kills don't work a good portion of the time and will just end up freezing until the victim escapes your grab (I can only speak for me and my friends here). when you don't run into hackers though the game is pretty enjoyable and I enjoy the hell out of it.  while I really like the game I don't think I should recommend it in its current state and due to the fact in some ways it is is a dying game and has some issues that need to be resolved. however if you think you can get past the occasional hacker and any bugs you might run into go for it, though I think you should try to get it on sale if you can i'm uncertain as to how long the game will be alive so maybe the sooner the better.

Kept you waiting for 47, huh? Хоть новая часть и делает вид, что она "вернулась с истокам серии аля blood money и silent assassin", она по прежнему до ужаса казуальная как absolution. В прошлых частях ты не мог тупо придти, достать пистолет, направить на цель, выстрелить и уйти (уже вспоминаете 2-ю миссию "король Чайна Тауна" из абсолюшена?). НПС немного покричат, охранники немного побегают, саундтрек немного поднапряжёт резкой сменой мелодии, но в итоге всем на всё наср*ть и ты можешь спокойно покончить миссию выйдя из зоны задания. По дороге можешь заодно рандомного работника убить и переодеться, тогда моментально все забудут про тебя. Главная проблема игра - ты сам себе должен устраивать челендж. Т.е. ты как бы да, можешь спокойно в первые же минуты убить цель и уйти, но захотел фана? Тогда сам себе усложняй задачу, найди какого нибудь стилиста в конце карты, переоденься в него и обмани цель войдя в её круг доверия. В игре нет уровня сложности, что даёт понять, что можно играть только так, как оно было задумано авторами, без умножения количества врагов и силу их реакций при смене сложности на более высокий. Неужели авторами было "задумано", что ты можешь тупо встать перед лицом у персонажа, который может тебя спалить, заставить себя спалить и идти потом куда-нибудь назад за угол? Он будет что-то орать тебе вслед, но тем не менее идти за тобой пока он сам себя не приведёт в твою ловушку. Так можно всю охрану перебить на изи, лол. Но давайте подумаем более глобально. Перед нами довольно сомнительный проект, у которого явно нет будущего, если конечно слабые продажи и низкие оценки можно счесть за "будущее". Первый Hitman вышел в 2000-ом году, Второй в 2002-ом, 3-ий в 2004-ом, 4-ый в 2006. Думаете 6-ю делали 6 лет? Нет, её тоже делали 2 года, просто перешли на Kane and Lynch 1-2 c 2008-ом и 2010-ом года выпуска. Эту часть лепили 3 года и 3 месяца. Что же я получаю покупая данный продукт за полную цену? Пролог и первый уровень. Ну ок, не уровень, а локацию, где есть сюжетное задание и контракты. Окей, ради этого прям ждал 3 года + ещё год будут лепить ещё 4-5 локаций в течении года, норм. Скажите, новый Hitman через год будет похож на долгострой который занял 4 года и 3 месяца? Ха, да ведьмака 3-го слепили какие-то поляки и то за меньшее время. Absolution был не провалом, он был шагом в сторону. А вот эта часть явно больше будет заслуживать термина как "провальная часть серии". В игре катастрофически мало контента. За 2 часа я прошёл обучалку и первую локацию. Говоря "катастрофически мало контента" я естественно учитываю и тот контент, который выйдет в будущем. Если все остальные 5 локаций будут такими же унылыми как первая в Париже (а моё чутьё подсказывает, что оно так и будет) - игра однозначно не стоит ни капли внимания. Лично я уже сделал рефаунд этого г*вна (который кстати приняли, хоть и наиграл больше 2-х часов). Я фанат серии, прошёл все части до конца. Не понимал негодования в 2012 по поводу абсолюшена, лучше бы сейчас негодовали насчёт этой игры столько же. Эта игра - плевок мне в душу. Главным плюсом на удивление оказался отказ от системы счетчика очков во время выполнения задания из абсолюшена. Спокойно иди и делай что хочешь. Можно даже не париться с прятаньем трупов в шкафчиках, можешь спокойно где-нибудь за углом оставить.*СПОЙЛЕР* В конце миссии этот счётчик всё таки появится, лол.  Добавили кучу всяких наград за перепрохождения миссии. Всякие трофеи, доп. условия аля убей цель определённым оружием и в определённом костюме... тонны всего! Если уж прям так понравится основная миссия, то игра с удовольствием позволить вам ещё пару раз её пройти разными способами.  Ну что ещё? Графон вообще ни о чём. 5-я часть выглядела кинематографично во время кат-сцен, хоть и графон там был так себе. Тут же все персонажи выглядят как куклы, а во время кат-сцен - CGI в основном. Немного поразмыслив, я пришёл к выводу, что хоть графика в обеих частях очень разная, впечатление от них то же, "середнячок". Правда вот есть один нюанс: прошлая часть вышла на пастгене, а эта на карентгене. Тут можно было бы уже полить позором новую часть, но разрабы оправдали это большой локацией и количеством персонажей на экране.   Крайне не советую это покупать. Просто проходите мимо. 4/10. В комментариях к обзору прочитайте моё отступление насчёт целевой аудитории игры (превысил доступное количество символов в обзоре)

Da amante di questo genere mi ero avvicinato a Balrum con grandi aspettative perchè il sistema di combattimento mi attraeva e non poco. Lasciando perdere la storia (abbastanza anonima e corta), il gioco ha il suo peggior difetto proprio in quello che più mi ha spinto all'acquisto. Il sistema di combattimento è superficiale, hai tante abilità e soluzione su come fronteggiare il nemico di turno ma il tutto si riduce nello sperare di incontrare qualcuno con un livello più alto del tuo. Indipendentemente dalle abilità che gli lanci contro, dall'ambiente in cui affronti il nemico o dall'animale che allevi e ti trascini per affrontarlo, se trovi un nemico con un livello più alto sarai costretto a scappare, altrimenti te la giochi. Non c'è tattica (eccetto sfruttare qualche bug o la scarsa IA dei nemici quando non ti inseguono), gli animali una volta presi nelle tue mani sono tutti ugualmente inutili e tutto diventa senza senso. Avrebbe bisogno di un ribilanciamento  del gameplay.

Foundation is the perfect title for the game, why? Because it literally has a good foundation but everything is very early access; It has the makings of being a good city builder sim like the others in the genre, however in it's VERY early access state it's a no from me. Like with most of these city builder sims you get to run your very own village, build up, and survive against hostile threats or the elements whether it be the weather kind or the sickness/virus kind; There is no tutorial level of any kind, only tutorial objectives at the beginning of every 'build' scenario, be very aware the river map (riverside or whatever it's called) is extremely broken or rather poorly implemented, that map forces you to essentially stick to land for most of the build before you even think of building your very cool riverside city. You do get rewards from completing objectives which is nice (kinda of). The biggest turn-off though will be the $30 pricetag for an early access. It's more of a $20 to me or lower, because of how much the game needs work, which btw the developers are listening and responding, etc. Look elsewhere for city builder sims, avoid this one for now until better systems, and better things are add in general.

I can hear it already. The screams, screeching and all kinds of eerie sounds coming from you people. How can this random person on the internet have played for such a long time and not recommend it? Simple really. Let's start off by mentioning that I bought my copy of the game back in 2012 (24th of January) over at Desura (A now dead Indie platform) so I've seen the progress of the game (or lack of?) as development has gone on. So many things that was going to be added. Man, this was going to be the greatest sandbox game... Ever! Imagine it, you have your army ready to take over a town- But! The guard are just too much to handle, let's change things up... Let's assassinate someone for a major  amount of cash. How do we do it? We'll just use climbing gear to ascend the walls. Sneak inside and take them out. Sadly, this is nothing more than imagination. Reality kicks in. We cannot get over walls nor can we take out a single target as the moment you engage the entire city knows about it. This among so many other "Early Access" games that came onto steam promising so many things yet delivering something mediocre. This title still have the potential to be what it's been sold as but so much has been cut. Poor performance. Crashes and a whole lot of bugs. This however does not mean it's unplayable by any means. You will find lots of fun things to do. Mind you, this is NOT a story driven game! This is the game for you who has any sort of imagination- You set your own goals and achieve them as you go. The game is over when you have completed all of your goals or you've simply done everything too many times already. The last straw for me was with the RC1 release "1.0", a state which is only reached when (normally) everything is done. There are no longer any major issues. Essentially the game is Complete. Kenshi? Complete? It's not a game of the year. It's a laugh of the year. I love this game and all the potential it has but I just cannot sit idly by and swallow the inflation of version numbers while cutting content. I get it! The developers have been at it for a long time and they want to move on. Had it simply gone from Alpha into Beta this wouldn't be much of an issue as from that point on you simply have to polish what is already in but maybe I'm old for thinking that. Alpha/Beta means nothing these days. Alas no. RC1 has been dropped and the same issues that has been are still there. I wish I could say there are a very small set of issues with the game but... It'd be a lie. Can you look past them and still make progress? Sure, with a bit of trial and error. Pathing-issues can be very problematic. Characters suddenly stuck in loops going back and forth is quite... Frustrating. Order queues being ignored. AI deciding to act on it's own doing... Let's just say weird things. Physics where you put someone down so they can walk on their own only to find them flying half a mile away. Some of it hilarious and other times downright irritating. Crashes... You know what, I am not even going into that one. On a personal level they did add something I asked for; Font size. You can increase it as you need! Visually impaired people rejoice! It came at a price though... What good is the ability to increase the font size if the UI warps all of it and overlapping? It was a nice gesture but poorly executed like so many other things sadly. Potential... Kenshi... Had a lot of potential. This game however, isn't what I signed up for. But it was well worth the 8 euros I paid for it but $29.99? Get out of here!

Poker rules, which are simple, are implemented incorrectly. For instance, the big blind can't raise on pre-flop and blinds don't seem to increase. Bet calling isn't implemented correctly either. When everyone starts with 100 chips and they all go all-in, there shouldn't be a side pot. However, this game... finds... a way. Opponent decision making is terrible, timid and aggravating. There is no bluffing. To be frank, the characters in this game aren't appealing either. When you saw this game and assumed it was bad, you were correct. My search for a good solo poker game continues, but Poker Night at the Inventory or Governor of Poker series are immediately better. For the anime cleavage that is the crux of this game's 'design' you could do better, pretty much anywhere. If you get this for more than $0.50 you've over payed.

Only buy this game if it's on sale. This game is not true to the original and it's very short. It has a lot of cut content. We don't have the Restaurant, Press Office, City Hall, and especially Clock Tower or Raccoon City Park. There are some major changes to the story, like RPD segment given to Carlos and Brad's death being reimagined (for worse imo). Jill witnessing his death by Nemesis was an iconic moment in the original and it's not present anymore. Other minor changes that I dislike are: they changed the first encounter between Jill and Carlos, the subway section is at the beginning now, and they removed Barry from the game (he is the one who rescues Jill with the helicopter at the end of the original). But the main problem with this game is that it doesn't feel like a classic RE game and more like RE6 most of the time, particularly in the second half. And it's actually pretty simple to understand why. The reason why the original was so great was because it had (like every classic RE) a crazy amounf of puzzles - in fact the best puzzle in the original for me was the music box puzzle in the Clock Tower, which is no longer present. And it also had many key items that you needed to get in order to unlock previous areas that were blocked when you first passed them. This was also true for RE1 and RE2, which essence were perfectly captured by their remakes. The amount of puzzles and key items in the original meant a lot of backtracking and having to pass narrow alleys multiple times, facing zombies each time. Simple things like going back to Dario's warehouse later on to use the crank and get precious ammo or realizing that Dario actually left his shelter, leaving behind free gunpowder for you. And the fact that you had to backtrack and at the same time run from a crazy stalker Nemesis made that game an amazing and satisfying adrenaline rush. There is NO adrenaline and desperation element with this Nemesis, because you don't have to backtrack nearly as much (or at all), so you encounter him very few times. And I'm only talking about the first half of the game obviously. Because in the second half Nemesis just becomes a dog-looking scripted mess, similar to the Ustanak in Resident Evil 6. This makes me almost shed a tear. Realizing that they butchered the VERY essence of the original game. In most sequences, you can close a door on Nemesis and if you immediately open it again, he is no longer there. It's downright disheartening to realize how scripted he becomes. In the original, he could even appear in the restaurant OR the press office, depending on which location you visited first. Changing not only the fight completely, but also changing how you encountered Carlos for the first time (and if i remember correctly, even changing his dialogue with Jill). This critique has been given a million times, but I'd like to reinforce it. Not only the game lacks backtracking and puzzles (in fact it has only ONE real puzzle: the vaccine puzzle in the last segment), it takes even a step further and completely blocks certain areas from being revisited via scripted events. For example: once you enter the subway station after reactivating the subway system, JIll will roll down the metal shutter, making the city completely inaccessible and FORCING you to move to the subway, even if you forgot some items behind. Not that it makes any difference in this game anyway, since there are no key items that you absolutely need to get to solve puzzles or unlock areas. But nonetheless it's a very clear way to force a linear path for the player, which goes ABSOLUTELY against the essence of the original (or any classic RE for that matter). The area that feels most like Resident Evil is the hospital. Especially in the Intense or Nightmare difficulties. Tight corridors teeming with all sorts of real threats, TONS of backtracking and key items that need to be obtained in order to unlock rooms. Funnily enough though, the worst part of the game is actually at the end of this hospital act, when there's (no joke) a HORDE gameplay where you need to hold your ground during a timer, spamming ammo and throwing grenades. This is SO Resident Evil 6 that I really question myself if Capcom actually learned their lesson. I also want to express my frustration about how this game feels like an insane wasted opportunity. Let's take a moment here and realize that the 3rd game is the final act for the iconic Raccoon City trilogy and could be so much bigger and groundbreaking. Granted, the original RE3 was designed at first to be a spin-off and had a very smaller team plus lower budget, thus resulting in a product that had a slightly smaller scope than the previous title (although, looking back, not as much as people usually say). But this is precisely what gave Capcom the opportunity to surpass everyone's expectations for this game, making an epic final act for the trilogy. Like, cmon, this is THE game that takes place in the streets of Raccoon City. They could have made the city so big and scary to explore. Rather, Capcom not only didn't expand Raccoon City, they made it linear and therefore it feels significantly smaller than the older version. So, to sum it up: The reason why this game fails as a remake is not only the cut content, but also (and mainly) the fact that its essence was lost. IMO if Capcom wanted to have all this creative freedom, then they could just apply it to RE8 (RE7 was a great game btw) instead of butchering a classic one. And, of course, let me not finish this review without mentioning: - No Mercenaries mode. RE3 was single-handedly the game that made this type of minigame a staple in the series. - No live action choices . Massively decreasing replayability. - No Ink Ribbon. There are typewritters and chests EVERYWHERE (this is not an exaggeration). - No Blue Herbs. Why blue herbs if they removed the spiders, right? They also removed crows. You can hear crow sounds in the game and they are even present in the concept arts, but removed from the game. Go figure. You can also clearly see this game was rushed when you realize the zombies are basically the same as the previous game (same models) and a ton (A TON) of assets were reused from RE2R, and yet the game is much smaller and less ambitions. Shame. This is not the first time Capcom puts a AAA price tag in a half-baked product. Cough Street Fighter 5 cough. This was my favorite RE game as a kid and it pains me to say this, but I'm giving this game a negative review.

Oyunu yaklaşık 3 senedir -para yatırmadan- oynuyorum ve şuan sırf emeğime yazık olmasın diye hala bırakamadığım için oynamaya devam ediyorum. Oyun herkesin belirttiği gibi tamamen P2W sistemine dayanıyor yani bu demek oluyor ki parayı veren düdüğü çalar (geri kalanlar ne bok yerse yesin) mantığı üzerine kurulu bir oyun. Bu oyunu oynamak isteyen arkadaşlara sesleniyorum, eğer ciddi miktarlarda para yatırmayacaksanız ve benim gibi hiç para yatırmadan sadece kendi emeğinizle bir yerlere gelmeye çalışıp oyuna bu şekilde devam edecekseniz sakın ama sakın bu oyuna başlamayın, yanından bile geçmeyin. Bu oyun parası olan ve devamlı olarak oyuna para yatırmayı göze alan insanlara hitap ediyor o yüzden oyunun içeriği ile ilgili herhangi bir incelemede bulunmadan bu konuya değinmek istedim. Para yatırma olayını bir kenara koyarsak oyuna ciddi zaman ayırmanız gerektiğini de hesaba katmak lazım. Oyun genel olarak gerçekten güzel fakat oyundaki adaletsizlik inanılmaz boyutlara ulaştı. Oyundaki adaletsizlikleri yazmaya kalksak kitap olur ama küçük bir örnek verecek olursak yeni gelen 5. kademe birlikleri açmanız için gereken miktar 20,144 kadim kitap= yani milyonlarca mücevher= yani milyarlarca para, bu da F2P insanlar için mümkün değil hatta para yatıranlar için bile oldukça zor. Kısacası güçlüler sürekli para yatırarak kısa zamanda gelişip güçlerine güç katıyor, para yatırmayanlar ise oldukları yerde sayıyorlar hatta eksiye düşüyorlar. Kendi tecrübelerimden yola çıkarak söylemem gerekirse bu oyunda sadece kendi emeğinizle çok büyük işler başarmanız ve keyif alarak oynamanız mümkün değil çünkü karşınızda astronomik boyutlarda gelişmiş oyuncular ver ve bunların sayıları da son derece fazla.Oyuna olumsuz vermemin en büyük sebebi budur. Ultra zengin bir insan bile olsaydım bu saçmalığa para yatırmazdım. Oyunu kesinlikle tavsiye etmiyorum, psikolojinize yazık, paranıza yazık ve en önemlisi asla geri getiremeyeceğiniz  zamanınıza yazık.

NO MAN'S LIES... Imagine, for a moment, the Universe was infinite.  Imagine the wondrous possibilities: the exotic flora and fauna, far-flung nebulae, the mighty wonders of the cosmos! Then play No Man's Sky, a universe which may have almost unimaginable breadth, but the depth of a broken sink you might find in the alleyway behind your nan's house.  I had the pleasure of visiting Minnesota once - after I left the Twin Cities I was fascinated to see how sparsely populated the rest of the state was, driving for hours between tiny towns.  After playing No Man's Sky, which doesn't a single city in an entire Universe, I suddenly felt that even Minnesota might be overcrowded! Play for under 2 hours, marvel at what you see - for you can see much of what the game has to offer, then decide whether you might be better off refunding this and buying something completely different but considerably more entertaining like Kingdom Come: Deliverance, Far Cry 5 or any other AAA title that takes your fancy - why not, that's the beauty of Steam and the bemusement that nearly two years after its disastrous launch NMS is still the same price.  Fair play to Hello Games, they have added such wondrous content as "freighters" - manned by little aliens no less! And there's even some combat (alas X-Wing vs TIE Fighter it is not), and crafting / building - after all in an 'infinite universe which is supposed to be explored why wouldn't you want to build a house on a planet you'll probably never return to! In a game with crafting, exploring, dog-fighting, and trading (well technically), it's a damning indictment that after a few hours the most fun you'll be having is naming the cookie-cutter flora and fauna on the latest cookie-cutter planet you're visiting.  I recommend picking something offensive, not obviously so that it gets filtered out automatically, or cried about too! TL:DR If you're feeling particularly flush and in a mood to see what all the fuss is, buy it and play for 1 hour 59 minutes and refund, then feel smug that you didn't pay full price on launch day and that you can pick up something (or things) fun for the same price.

Первое мое знакомство с Салли произошло, когда я рыскал на просторах всем известного китайского сайта в поисках   чехлов по 30 рублей. Тогда-то на меня и свалились эти самые чехлы с, эм, фейсом Салли Фейса, а также пины, футболки, костюмы для косплея и тд. В стиме у игры оказалось 97% положительных рецензий, а в «близких по духу» значились Downfall и Fran Bow, которые в конечном итоге и продали мне игру. И поначалу все было действительно неплохо. Визуальная часть, которая изначально меня зацепила, продолжала радовать глаз. Звуковые эффекты и музыкальное сопровождение создавали нужную атмосферу. Сюжет интриговал, оставлял задел на будущее, игра пыталась в саспенс! А это только первый эпизод, и дальше ведь будет лучше?  В дальнейшем, чем глубже я погружался в мир Салли и его друзей, тем больше разочаровывался. Во многих рецензиях люди отмечали толковые, живые диалоги, но, как по мне, со своей основной функцией они, к сожалению, не справляются. Любая тема, затрагиваемая главными героями, будь то смерть или семейные отношения, абсолютно не раскрывается, а обсуждение умирает в зародыше. Основная сюжетная линия из потенциально неплохого ужастика почти сразу скатывается в би муви с оценкой 5 на КП. Загадки здесь по большей части раздражают, чем вызывают какой-либо интерес. Некоторые из них откровенно являются рудиментами, служащим для искусственного затягивания игрового времени. Также по мере прохождения я неоднократно испытывал чувство дежавю. И действительно, если присмотреться, автор не чурается как использовать самоповторы, так и заимствовать чужие идеи. Здесь у нас и головоломка с дверьми прямиком из Prince of Persia, и повествование в виде допроса, как в True Detective, и ряд загадок из Cat Lady. Порой казалось, что разработчик пытается компенсировать свою творческую импотенцию ворохом сюрреалистичных наработок. Это отчетливо прослеживается в последнем эпизоде, где родители требуют внуков, а автор до сих пор не решил, кто ему больше нравится - мальчики или девочки.  По итогу, прохождение я бы сравнил с экскурсией по квартире клептомана-барахольщика: отсутствует четкая структура; что-то стоящее наверняка в ней есть, но под грудой мусора найти это сложно;   пройтись можно, но зачем?  Если же вы ищете чего-то мрачного и атмосферного, я бы советовал присмотреться к Detention, Fran Bow или работам Рема Михальски.

Упрощенный рогалик. Зачищаем заранее спроектированные комнаты от нескольких волн однотипных врагов, умираем, прокачиваемся, снова зачищаем, снова умираем... В играх такого жанра должна быть либо интересная система прокачки, либо обилие предметов и абилок. Тут же - упрощенная система прокачки, и малое количество предметов. Абилка всего одна. После смерти начинать приходится с первой комнаты - благо хоть прокачка остается. При подборе предметов нет сравнения характеристик - придется запоминать какая палка-копалка какой урон дамажит. Гринд по-видимому бесконечный, ибо никакой цели перед игроком не ставится. Неизвестно - есть ли тут боссы или финал - играть в это долго абсолютно не захочется. Управление WASD+мышь. Без мыши играть нельзя от слова совсем. Атаки не всегда срабатывают. Враги тупые почти полностью - застревают между стен, не могут обогнуть препятствие. Берут тупо количеством. Нет достижений, прогресса, итд... что делает идею бесконечного гринда абсолютно непривлекательной. Не рекомендую.

No tuve crasheos, no tuve bajadas de FPS (siempre 50-60 FPS en Ultra). ¿Entonces por qué el negativo? Veamos. Estoy jugando tranquilamente y entro en la ciudad en la que se realiza "La Prueba". Ahí, justo en esa maldita ciudad, comienzan los problemas: 1) Justo antes de que ocurriera esta Cinemática: Hablamos con Teersa, mientras hablo con ella veo "alegre y contento" (sarcasmo) como detrás de Aloy desaparece un NPC (de la nada). Y pensé "bueno, un error, está bien. No creo que vuelva a ocurrir" (fui un estúpido). 2) Mientras hablaba con Teb me percaté de algo: La sincronización "voz-labios" era desastrosa y para rematar el "volumen" de la voz de Teb descendió drásticamente de la nada (sin contexto ni nada). No fue un susurro, parecía que te hablaba a 700 metros de distancia. Ahí fue cuando dije: Ya está. Guardo, lo dejo acá y cuando se dignen en sacar parches lo volveré a jugar. Mi PC (la dejo por las dudas, por si alguien es estúpido y piensa "ay, se queja pero de seguro tiene una Potato PC"): CPU: Ryzen 5 2600X / GPU: RX 590 8 GB / RAM: 16 GB de RAM. Lo que he jugado me ha encantado. Espero que lo arreglen pronto.

Assim como todos da Franquia Souls traz um gameplay desafiador, Variedades de áreas, inimigos, armas, magias e feitiços, segredos, Sempre tem mais de uma forma de acabar com um Boss e resolver seus problemas, Vai te entreter por várias horas (e te deixar estressado) Mecânica melhor (em certos pontos) que seus antecessores. Bugs que vão te matar a qualquer momento (os mapas são repletos de Glitchs), Versão com maior número de inimigos do que na versão original tornando o jogo muito mais Injusto, Removeram a corrente de Baús Mimic*, Inimigos Buffados tornando a gameplay muito mais injusta e estressante baseado na versão original do jogo, Demora muito pra tomar o Estus Flask baseado nos jogos anteriores e posteriores da franquia (bebe como se estivesse degustando um vinho envelhecido durante mil anos). *Nos jogos anteriores da franquia (inclusive na versão original de Dark Souls 2) essas correntes mostravam quais eram Mimic e quais não eram. Geralmente não sou de colocar bonus porém para esse jgoo foi extremamente necessário, ja zerei Dark Souls 2 incontavéis vezes em varíos consoles e essa versão (Scholar of the First Sin) é de longe a mais chata, quebrada, injusta, estressante e entediante que ja joguei, não recomendo de jeito nenhum essa versão caso seja um jogador novo em Dark Souls, vc ira passar muita raiva desnecessaria e se questionar a todo momento do pq não gastou o dinheiro com algo util ao inves de gastar em algo que vai fazer vc quebrar todo seu Setup e tacar fogo na sua casa. A versão original de Dark Souls 2 foi a primeira que joguei e até então era minha versão preferida (Ganhando do DS1, Demon's Souls e DS3) porém após sofrer com essa versão não só mudei de ideia como passei a odiar esse jogo, se ja é macaco velho em Dark Souls e sabe pelo que vai passar pode até arriscar comprar e zerar esse jogo assim como eu fiz, porém esteja avisado que vai ser mais estressante que qualquer outro da franquia dado a quantidade de Bugs injustos que acontecem durante uma gameplay simples de 1 horinha, caso não tenha jogado Dark Souls 2 ou nenhum da Franquia Souls, recomendo que jogue a versão original com o Season Pass para ter acesso as DLCs, ou jogue outro da franquia em primeiro lugar pois caso contrario nunca mais vai querer chegar perto de qualquer jogo parecido com Dark Souls. A quem leu até aqui muito obrigado, não sou de postar review grande mas tive uma grande história com esse jogo, sei que poucos podem ler, mas preciso deixar avisa mesmo que pra pouco que essa versão não vale a pena e é Bugada e Injusta!

Ubi Montreal made this version? Yikes. This is still Splinter Cell, but very poorly stitched together in multiple ways; giving off the impression that this was an afterthought, or something that the lead designers weren't in universal agreement on. Considering that there are multiple versions of this game, each with different narrative experiences, the story is all over the place and seemingly glosses over significant plot points leaving you pretty bewildered. The Steam PC version is a buggy mess without some serious tinkering and updating. HD settings must be forced for current day tech, and the visuals still somehow doesn't hold up as well as its predecessor. Be prepared for a hellish experience until you fix the numerous issues! Otherwise, Double Agent provides a fairly bare-bones Splinter Cell experience with a twist, although the twist is often poorly executed and feels inconsequential after completion. Unfortunately I can't recommend this Steam version even with the fix caveat, as the game itself is still quite mediocre as a whole. 6.5/10 (Try the Original Xbox version, not 360)

It doesn't take long at all to see this game show it's flaws. It's a very early concept of a clicker, something I'd expect to see in the 2000's, not today. All menus slide in, and are hidden off the screen, but if you resize the window you will see all of them hiding, especially those up top. Bomb upgrades are necessary to proceed (necessary as in the sense that the game is pitiful playing without them), but are hidden behind only a paywall and a daily slot machine.  A clicker game with a good business plan hooks you in for a few hours, maybe a few days before they force a currency purchase on you. These guys didn't even bother to make the first 10 minutes enjoyable. Clicker games are a dime a dozen nowadays, so 10 minutes is all you need to see if it's crap, or just another carbon copy of something else. In the case of Idle Heist, it's both.

Игра представляет из себя некую машину времени, которая возвращает нас в эпоху аркадных автоматов и даёт прочувствовать то, что чувствовали игроки того времени. Однако игра получилась очень сырой, но об о всём по порядку. Мы играем за космический корабль, который должен уклоняться от летящих в него с противоположной стороны других кораблей. У нас есть три жизни за которые мы должны уничтожить максимальное число вражеских космолётов (в этом нам могут помочь различные улучшения). Жизни теряются при столкновении с неприятелем. Управление осуществляется только мышкой: двигая мышь мы двигаем корабль, ЛКМ стреляет левыми пушками корабля, ну а ПКМ, соответственно, правыми.  В главном меню только две кнопки: "играть" и "выйти", тоесть у нас нет возможности изменить какие-либо настройки, например отрегулировать сенсу или сделать музыку потише. После проигрыша сразу начинается новая игра, что немного раздражает.  Для того что бы понять как устроена игра много времени ни понадобится, Вам вполне хватит двух-трёх минут (хотя мне например не сразу удалось найти меню апгрейдов, которое открывается при нажатии кнопки Esc), следовательно многообразия ожидать не следует. Игра еле-еле дотягивает до уровня бесплатной игры на андроид и играть в неё на пк возможно стоит только с целью посоревноваться с друзьями.

I've been a player since the very beginning, and after 500h I'm sure not to recommend it. Few words? Bugs, bugs, cheaters, bugs. Developers seem to perceive people's feedback, and then they do the opposite. Introduce a new map? they remove the previous. Finding the new map super fun with awesome loot and action? they immediately nerf it to make you stuck inside a mediocre-looting spiral dying from flying people with no-recoil. Moreover, this game gives you no satisfaction rewards. Compared to other games like apex legends, where even without the battle pass you access legendary awesome skins with ease, here you get strange coupons to spend and buy other coupons to get access to mediocre cosmetics which dissolve over time. And this also costs money. Money AND battle pass? seriously? Make it free. And less buggy, please.

Kezdjük a lényegi részével,ami leginkább meghatározza a tartalmat,a multi playerrel.Ami nincs,vagyis van,de erős kézfogást annak aki össze tudja hozni,talál vagy összetud szedni hozzá játékosokat. A többjátékos opció nyújt lehetőséget új pályák megnyitására,ennek hiányában az egyszeri játékos, (mert,hogy többet elő nem veszi) kap egy pályát! Igen,egy nagyos kis pályát amit két szemvillanás alatt bejárhat. A kis pálya pirosban pompázik ami ügyes próbálkozás a hangulat teremtéshez,de még ez is kevés az ocsmány grafika elrejtésére. Aztán elkezdődik a játék,jó kis zúzós rock/metallal és szembesülünk a pocsék irányítással és a gagyi animációkkal. Startnál kapunk három kaszt,amik közül egy még játszható is, a baltás úriember,ezen felül dönthetünk, hogy pisztollyal vagy sörétessel akarunk hentelni,sajnos menet közben nem lehet fegyvert váltani. Minden karakter rendelkezik egy egyedi képességgel amit másfél percenként használhatunk,ami érdemes gyakran használni a túl erővel szemben. Visszatérve az irányítása,a karakterünket izometrikus nézetből irányítjuk és a műfajra jellemző irányítást is került a játékba,ami eleinte szokatlan,értetlenkedik az ember,miért nem üt,az ütések egészen addig nem működnek míg egészen közel nem kerülsz a lényekhez és nem rá nem irányítod a kurzort. Hullámok közötti szünetekben van lehetőség visszatölteni az életerőt,csökkenteni alapszükségleteinket. Bizony nem csak a HP-ra kell figyelnünk,hanem az általános állapotra is,ami ha eléri a 100%-ot, meghalunk.Körönkénti valutával nem is olyan nehéz rosszul gazdálkodunk főleg ha egyedül játszunk,nagyon könnyen elvisz az éhség vagy a szomjúság,életerőtől függetlenül.  Két dolog viszont nagyon tetszett az egyik a zene,a másik pedig a körök közbeni szünet,ahol hallani a közönség fujjolását!

Сразу скажу: 1) мне пополам на шум вокруг закрытия/открытия доступа Open IV; 2) сингл - был, для своего времени, богоподобен, и остается, по моему мнению, таковым и сейчас. Брала игру на старте на PS3, потом на PS4, и теперь, как следствие, в Стиме, теперь уже сугубо для онлайна.  Вот из - за него, родимого, отзыв и отрицательный. Все уже сказали до меня - заселье читеров, россыпь невнятных банов на пустом месте и глухая ко всему служба поддержки. У меня просто по непонятной причине вдруг перестал работать онлайн (нет, не из - за бана). Писала в саппорт трижды (!). В ответ - молчаливое презрение.  Я просто надеюсь, что подобная история не повторится в RDR2, коего я жду, но, опять же, сугубо из - за сингла.  Онлайн у Рокстар получается интересный, но крайне отвратительный.

Появилось такое чувство что разработчику совсем уже плевать , как на игру , так и на комьюнити . Начать можно пожалуй сразу с обновлений , они тут максимально редкие . Разработчик все говорил о "МЕГА" Патче , но что мы получили от этого "мега" патча ( то есть его первой части ) , это : SCP-079  ( самый бесполезный и скучный SCP , который между прочим уже был ранее в игре  ) , новый пистолетик для D-Класса , какие то фиксы багов , обновления движка и изменения обвесов для оружия . Вау . И это было в декабре прошлого года . На момент написания этого обзора разработчик обьявил о работе над новой аптечкой и SCP-500 , вот это великая работа , наверняка он там серьезно трудится что бы сделать игру лучше ( нет ) .  Но вы конечно можете задонатить ему на Патреоне . Он там между прочим получает ежемесячно по 3к$ минимум , хорошая сумма правда ? Но как таковых серьезных изменений в игре не было и видимо не будет . Если бы ему реально не было все равно на игру он бы наверняка пытался сделать ее лучше и за бесплатно , но походу просто  сел на донаты

Very bad impression in first few games.. Simply put its gameplay trash compared to FIFA, there's no control on ball whatsoever, no fluidity.. players take so much time to pass the ball that it gets snatched if you pass it in the last moments... only bcoz your player took too much time to pass the ball.. even when you pressed the button earlier. No proper responsiveness. Also it feels like controls are messed up, there's no accuracy on ball control, you do one thing but sometime you end up off the target bcoz of either inaccuracy or slow responsiveness. When you want to shoot the ball in the net after a pass through, your shot button will only response when your striker catches up & touches the ball, only then your player will prepare to shoot... which takes too much time to take the shot, obviously you don't have that much time your opponent's goal territory. If you press shoot button early (even while you are about to catch up the ball), even if your player is a few inches away from ball, your striker will give up the ball & let it go to either goalkeeper or outside, missing a very good opportunity to score as if player is not interested in scoring the goal at all... All bcoz of the lack of responsiveness OR gameplay mechanics are like this. Only graphics are "slightly" better than FIFA but i doubt anyone cares about graphics in a Football game, all that matters is a football game is "gameplay". And yeah these are the things i have observed in 3-4 games in just 50 minutes of gameplay.. i felt the difference right away compared to FIFA. FIFA is wayyyy much better, either in terms of responsiveness, accuracy, fluidity, moves, online system (Ultimate Team) etc..

Also ich bin ziemlich von diesen Spiel entäuscht. Ich weiss gar nicht wo ich anfangen sollte! - Alle Karten fühlen sich fast gleich an, so wie die Wege. Nur in Optischer gestaltung hat sich das Spiel gut gemacht. - Die Perks wurden Runen hinzugefügt. Die gegner sind schon ganz ok, aber als Veganer ist dieser Spiel definitve nicht weiter zu empfehlen. Übertriebener Blut im überfluss, was kein Mensch braucht. - Der Patriach ist ein schlechter Witz, ergibt echt kein Sinn darüber zu unterhalten.  - Der Sound ist ganz ok wen jemmand Hard Metal mag. Abbandon all kann nichts Toppen und immer wieder diese Elektrosounds, das geht manchmal ziemlich auf die Nerven. - Die Charaktäre sind auch fast alle aus einem Land, was die individualität angeht. Ich bin ziemlich entäuscht. - Der schwierigkeitsgrad ist extrem Leicht, was auf dauer keine Herausforderungen mehr bringt. - Die Waffen fühlen sich alle schwach an und einige Waffen haben den exakten Sound, was wirklich verwirrend ist. Ich habe absolute keine Ahnung was die Entwickler geritten hat. Am anfang dachte ich das die meisten Rewiev´s von Hatern stammen, so ist es aber nicht, und es stimmt wirklich das dieses Spiel ziemlich schlecht umgesetzt wurde. Alles in allen ein sehr unwürdiger Nachfolger von Legendären Ersten Teil.

Пустая трата времени. Чтоб собрать всех легендарных жителей, нужно открыть несколько тысяч(!) ланчбоксов. Без шуток. Я даже половины легендарных жителей не собрал. Все фразы героев на ВСЕХ заданиях не имеют смысла. Фразы умственно отсталых для умственно отсталых. В прямом смысле. В этих фразах видно отношение разработчиков к игрокам. Мы для них тупая скотина. В игре постоянно подсовывают негров или азиатов к вам в убежище. Чтоб убежище было смесью всех рас и состояло из межрасовых отношений. Чтоб никаких белых людей вообще не было. Все должны быть коричневой массой без рода и племени. Левацкие силы и стараются это сделать в США и Европе. Лимит по крышкам в игре 999.999. Я улучшил всё, что только можно было. Всех навязанных негров и азиатов выгнал туда, откуда пришли. Убежище стало только для белых. Преступность сразу сократилась. Количество краж и изнасилований достигло рекордно низких уровней. Все вооружены и могут отбить любое нападения извне. Настал мир и покой. Советую не тратить время на эту примитивную игру. Тем более не советую покупать ланчбоксы. ВСЕ миссии в игре невероятно тупые и не имеющие вообще никакого смысла. Я в нее наиграл более 100 часов лишь когда времени и сил не было, чтоб сыграть во что-то другое. Часто игра просто фоном была включена. Эти 112 часов я растягивал на несколько лет.

TL;DR: Career mode is good. Multiplayer is ♥♥♥♥♥. Not recommended unless you are league racing... F1 2017 was great. Career mode was developed a lot from 2016, and they have continued that onto F1 2018. Its getting more and more immersive, and with the new contracts system, interviews, rivals and adapting r&d etc. this year, career mode is the best it has ever been. If you are looking for a great single player racing game, this is it. Still some bugs and glitches, but it has been greatly improved since launch.  However, multiplayer is an utter disaster. Horrible netcode, i think pc is the best - i should probably say least horrible, cuz its really bad - Lots of glitches and bugs. You hit people on their screen but on yours there is lots of space. This game is supposed to be hosting the F1 Esports series, but in no way is it ready. Code"masters" need to step up their game in terms of the multiplayer experience, which HAS to be their main focus point for 2019. They cannot have another game with bad multiplayer, and especially not with esports. Honestly they should copy/paste this career mode to 2019, and only focus on improving online. I just cannot recommend this game, because of codies being ignorant, and dont even try to fix multiplayer!

ENG: Great game to kill time and the heart to yell at cheaters. Before buying the game there was quite a negative opinion about the game because of the news about poor optimization, lag, bugs. Bought the game and was not even surprised, it really turned out so. But despite the huge problems in the optimization of the game, timpley himself pleases, but the graphics exhibited at the "ultra" - is felt as"low". Despite this, play solo or in team - interestingly. If you are tired of your favorite game and you are looking for a game that will bring you a lot of negative emotions, it's time to start rolling in PUBG. If it was possible to get the money back for this game, I would do it without hesitation. RUS: Отличная игра для того чтобы убить время и от души покричать на читеров. До покупки игры был довольно отрицательного мнения об игре из за новостей о плохой оптимизации, лагах, багов. Приобрел игру и даже не был удивлен, всё действительно оказалось так. Но несмотря на огромные проблемы в оптимизации игры, сам тимплей радует, но графика выставленная на "ультра" - ощущается как "низкие". Несмотря на это, играть соло или в команде - интересно. Если вам надоела любимая игра и вы ищите игру которая принесет вам море отрицательных эмоций, то самое время начать катать в PUBG. Если бы можно было вернуть деньги за эту игру, я бы сделал это не раздумывая.

Claramente inspirado, entre outras coisas, no modo Zombies do CoD Black Ops, me interessei mais por ser um jogo brasileiro recheado de gaiatice sem me importar com os gráficos. Infelizmente o jogo está lotado de bugs (o que pode ser consertado rapidamente), erros de inglês, erros de português e uma dublagem que conseguiu ser pior que a do Brazilian Root. Dublagem essa que, na minha opinião, não fez jus à proposta de ser zoeira estilo pornochanchada. No modo gripados, sempre tomo dano antes de juntar o suficiente pra comprar uma pistola. E só consigo porque os inimigos simplesmente ficam andando sem sair do lugar. Isso quando não vagam sem rumo em direção às entradas e ficam por lá, me ignorando completamente. O modo história poderia ser melhor explicado. Por exemplo, me mandam usar o medidor de distância, mas o quê é isso? Como se usa? O mapa não mostra sua localização ou objetivos que já foram completados. Isso sem falar em bugs ainda piores do que no modo Gripados. Em certo momento os inimigos ficavam imóveis e invencíveis, impossibilitando qualquer tipo de progresso no jogo.  já sobre o modo online serei incapaz de opinar pelo menos por enquanto, já que ainda está vazio.  Poderia indicar pelo valor irrisório de R$4,99, porém não sei se compensa a não ser que seu objetivo seja ajudar o criador do game. Resumindo, só nos resta esperar por melhorias.

Я наиграл в эту игру 100 часов и готов высказать свое мнение (оно никому не нужно, но мне скучно и я написал этот обзор). - CS GO - это когда твой боевой настрой портит, школьник который постоянно орет и материться в микрофон. В CS GO достаточно много оружия, но не каждое из них может пригодиться. В основном вы будете играть максимум за 4-5. Карты хороши, но все равно вы будете играть на 4 картах: Dust 2. Mirage. Inferno и если повезет Nuke. Остальные или никому не нужны, или там дисбаланс. У вас в команде обязательно будут:  1) Школьник, который не умеет играть и при каждой смерти орет в микрофон. 2) Читер, но с ним ваши шансы победить такие же как без него. 3) Люди, которые берут AWP хотя на нем не умеют играть (но они стараются не умирать первыми). Во вражеской команде 1) Киберспортсмен, который сделает тебе хедшот из худшего оружия в игре. 2) Читер, но в отличии от вашего он всех побеждает. 3) Парень, который сидит в укрытии и перестреляет всех. - Я его почти победил!! Мне одного патрона не хватило!! - Да как он меня увидел!!? Я в дыму был! - Зачем он световую гранату!? Он ослепил всю команду и их расстрелял новичок. CS:GO Лучшая игра чтобы потерять друзей. 3/10 попаданий в голову.
